At the base of all human tissue is a form of skeleton or scaffold. We developed a broad technology platform that creates these scaffolds in a way that the body readily accepts, bridging the significant performance gap between the existing markets for biologics and synthetics.  Unlike competing solutions, we create and align a variety of FDA-approved fibers smaller than 1/100th the size of a human hair in multi-layer scaffolds that control cell growth and proliferation.  Our tissue integrates into the body quickly and without immune repression drugs. Our trachea technology and products were used for all the first five nanofiber human trachea replacements and can be used for a host of products including esophagus, tendon, bone, wound care, arteries and veins, intestine, etc, on a $20 billion annual global market.

Meta64 is a cloud-based content creation, sharing, and collaboration platform. It's built on a large tree structure, similar to a file system in the cloud, that can hold any type of content, including text, images, and all types of binary attachments. The main display area is a tree structure that is rendered in a unique document-like way with expandable and collapsible sections.   	Each node on the tree can be shared with other people or groups, and edited the same way a wiki is edited. The technology is like a hybrid between a document editor, a wiki, and a file system, having characteristics of each. Like Wikipedia and Facebook, Meta64 allows you to collaborate, edit and share information. Like a Wiki, each node in Meta64 has its own page address (url) so that any branch of the tree can be accessed at a unique URL. Each node also can display its "timeline", which is defined as the reverse-chronological listing of all nodes under it.  There's also full-text searching and lots more.

Sixty percent of our health is affected by our social needs. Our access to food, mental health services, and community resources all play a pivotal role in improving our health outcomes. Yet, the groups that are financially at-risk for patients don't have the tools or data needed to manage these needs or hit expanding quality measures under the ACA. This inability results in an additional $85b a year in Medicaid spending. 

Our platform allows Medicaid Managed Care Plans (insurers) and providers to effectively address the social needs in their population to improve quality while reducing the cost of care. We deploy a web-based tool to identify the social needs in a population and subsequently connect patients to the best resources to address their needs. We then automate follow up with patients via interactive texts and present this unique set of patient data back to staff via a population dashboard. Scalable case management for better managed care!

Droplet works in the same way a gardener would water his or her plants by hand - by watering only the plants. Not the mulch between the trees, not the fence, house or side walk - just the stuff that needs water. Different plants get different amounts of water. Droplet does exactly that.   	In fact, by skipping on watering all those areas that don't need water, the average Californian would save $682 a year on their water bill. And since Droplet is a small robot that anyone can easily setup, you can bring it with you when you move. It's a much better use of money than a traditional irrigation system.

Spire is a next-generation wearable that creates value throughout your *entire* day - not only the ~16% of the day when you are moving, but also while commuting, working at the computer, or just lounging around.   	   As the 1st wearable movement + respiration tracker, Spire tracks the only actionable bio-signal that reveals and controls emotion and stress: breathing.   	   Emotion affects how you breathe (see figure above). Deep breaths reduce cortisol (stress) and increase endorphins (positive feelings). Thus, Spire can both measure and actionably influence people throughout the day, leading to more productive work, healthier commutes, and better endurance.   	   Beyond being a missing feature in the health+wellness wearable sensor equation, accurate respiration monitoring also solves major medical issues in the clinical space (ie Asthma and COPD). Spire ultimately intends to be an FDA-approved spirometry-like device allowing us to address this market as well.

SaaS plug-in for eCommerce companies that gives them an unfair pricing advantage over their competition and makes price comparison sites irrelevant.   	  It’s simple, eCommerce companies put our “SKINNYprice” button on their product pages next to the “Add to Cart” button.   	  Now, think of the product price as the turnstiles of a slot machine. You press our “SKINNYprice” button an in exchange for watching a 30 second video advertisement you are show a random price from 1 to 99% off and then have 60 seconds to decide to buy or pass.   	  Now you can play this game as many times as you like an on as many products as you like.   	  You see, the inconvenience of watching an advertisement and how many times someone is willing to do this to get a great price is what will separate out the price sensitivity of each customer.   	  (Issued Patent and Trade Secret pricing algorithm)

Runners / bikers have had gadgets and apps for years that tell them about their progress. Action sports athletes have nothing. We're building quantified self for the action sports demographic. Companies like GoPro (valued at $2.25B) have shown that this demographic has disposable income and is willing to spend it to improve their experience.   	 Deep down our core expertise is sensor signal processing. In action sports like surfing, skiing, and skateboarding the interesting data comes from fast, complicated motion that requires more than just GPS. Often times what's interesting depends not on one's body, but on what the equipment is doing.   	 And while the thought of tracking G's may sound cool, that's not what users want. They want easy to understand, beautifully laid out data. We take data dozens of times a second from 9-axis inertial sensors +  GPS and make it easy to understand. Number of waves caught, number of tricks performed, how well they were landed, what the speed was, etc.

True Link is a fraud protection service that protects the elderly from black- and gray-market scams, a $100b/yr problem. The service is currently available on a Visa card issued by the company, but will be expanded to checks and credit cards issued by both True Link and third-party financial institutions. Issuing cards to 11m cognitively-impaired elderly people is an existing $1.9b revenue stream, and current issuers (Wells Fargo, Chase, …) license software rather than building it, so would partner rather than competing.   	When an elderly person swipes the True Link card, the transaction is routed over the Visa network to our servers. There, we compare it to personal spending limits, restricted categories, and a continuously updated fraud database. So when you're out paying bills, getting ice cream, or shopping with friends, True Link works just like any other Visa card. But if someone is trying to take your money, we decline the transaction, alert the family, and keep your money safe.

High performance in-space propulsion systems.
Current propulsion technologies do not provide sufficient performance for many applications; both scientific and reconnaissance.  Fusion based propulsion concepts offer much higher performance, however, these concepts require large energy/mass driver mechanisms that are not feasible on the scale of small satellites.  Alternatively, a radioisotope positron source will allow for a positron-based (non-ignition) fusion driver system of much lower mass and complexity. This propulsion system will provide an innovative means for spacecraft to achieve long duration, low altitude orbits, with “aircraft-like” responsiveness and flexibility. 
Our initial product will be a lightweight (<20kg), solid-state propulsion module with capability to produced 10-100mN over 5-7 yrs on orbit using less than 1kg of propellant.  Such a system would be launched on military ISR platforms, civilian telecommunication satellites, and scientific orbital payloads.

MetaCert was founded in 2012 by one of the original founders of the W3C Mobile Web Initiative to provide a developer-friendly way to add security to mobile apps.

The URL reputation lookup service is the first of its kind, making it easy for developers to embed a security layer inside their apps while opening up a new avenue of recurring revenue.

The patent-pending service, which is designed to run URLs against MetaCert’s Safe Browsing database on a global scale, prevents phishing websites from automatically loading malware onto a consumer’s smartphone or tablet without their permission.

With the number of BYOD initiatives on the rise and an increase in mobile malware, now is the time for developers to offer consumers more security.

Shoto is an app available for iOS and Android that lets you find the unseen photos that you and your friends have collected from the moments you shared together.

For those of us that don’t like taking too many photos - Shoto can work using just one photo from your camera history or, if you already have the app installed, it checks you into events where your friends are even if you didn’t take a single photo.

Starting from your first ever smartphone photo, Shoto creates a collection of albums that are waiting to be “discovered” by finding all the common memories between you and the people you most care about using your phonebook and the location of the photos.

Sagoon Inc. Launches Social App “Secret”

Bollywood star Manisha Koirala sent out her first secret message to the world using Sagoon Inc.’s new social app.

WASHINGTON, DC, July 6, 2014, Sagoon Inc., launched its social messaging app – Secret – during the ANA Convention at Sheraton Tysons Hotel, Virginia July 6, 2014. 

In the hotel’s Premium Ballroom, Bollywood star Manisha Koirala opened Sagoon’s Social app “Secret” before an audience of thousands and revealed her secret message to the world. Simultaneously, the Sagoon team displayed the key features of its applications. Manisha Koirala flew to Washington from India in order to participate in the ANA Convention.

 “We were not aware of the great minds we had who were capable of building such an amazing product,” said Koirala, as she sent her secret message. “I believe that this app will help people develop strong bonds with family and friends, and lots more. I love this product and encourage everyone to use it.”

Dash built a technology solution that turns any car into a “smart car".

Low-cost hardware purchased from any manufacturer can be self-installed under the dashboard, paired via bluetooth/wifi to your smartphone, storing data in the cloud. Works on all cars after 1996.

The proprietary Dash algorithm uses a variety of driver safety/efficiency metrics to generate the "Dash Score." Score can be improved based on driving behavior, as well as, shared/compared with friends. Higher scores may also pre-qualify drivers for special offers and discounts.

Wovyn is an extensible hardware and software platform for easily connecting virtually any wired or wireless sensors to any software platform.   	 Wovyn Emitters are hardware devices that allow sensors to emit standard REST Webhooks, and control of relays, etc. using standard Web Services APIs. These are turn-key commercial solutions allowing any software developer to easily interface to the IoT ... no Arduino hacking required.   	 The Wovyn Loom is an IoT "gateway/router" that can translate our REST Webhooks through configurable rules into sensor data event streams to user defined endpoints, using a wide range of user selected protocols. This allows Wovyn Emitters to talk to numerous existing IoT platforms.   	 The Wovyn Portal allows users to configure the rules by which sensor data and events are reported to the numerous industry standard protocols and the platforms we support.   	 Wovyn is creating building blocks for the IoT!

BioEnergy Pro, LLC is a start-up company that has evolved out of the existing enterprises of Verdanté BioEnergy Services, a bioenergy consulting firm. The new company is focused entirely upon IT solutions supporting the biomass industry. The single biggest challenge today is for geographically dispersed bio-refineries to obtain the required amount and quality of biomass feedstock to operate the facility efficiently. Biomass feedstock is any biological material that meets specification for a technology to convert it into energy. Examples of biomass feedstocks include crop residues such as corn stover, sugarcane bagasse, purpose-grown grass crops, and woody materials such as chips and sawdust. Biomass feedstocks are converted into energy by directly burning to produce steam for heat and power and well as refining into liquid fuels/products. Biomass is not yet a commodity because it is highly variable, dispersed, and unquantified at a scale that translates to financial market protocols.

eldonReader is an alert system. You subscribe to the topic that you're interested in, eldonReader checks regularly to see if there are new results for your query and If there are new results, you get them right in your eldonReader feed.   	Although we’re inspired by Google Alert,  we consider ourselves as an enhancement. There are some big differences in the way we manage the alerts. You won’t receive for example a bunch of emails everyday. When a new article matches your keyword, we just +1 your unread count for that specific query. You can also like, save for later and share stories on your social networks. And unlike Google Alert, the user doesn’t receive a chunk of the article, instead eldonReader offers the ability to read the whole article right on the platform. It means no more missed stories, a cleaner inbox and a better organization of your tracked topics.

Minority Seeds is an Accelerator that provides Pre-Seed Funding to Minority Entrepreneurs. There's a huge gap between Silicon Valley and African American Startups.We believe a big reason for this gap is Pre-Seed Funding. Angel Investors and Venture Capitalist say,”If your family and friends don't believe in your Startup then why should we?” The fact is it's hard for Minority Entrepreneurs to get Pre-Seed Funding from family and friends for a tech Startup.   	This is largely due to minority communities not being familiar with Startups. So it's easier to get help if you're trying to open a Hair Salon or Barber Shop and much harder if you're asking for funds for a tech Startup. Plus, many Minority Entrepreneurs don't have family and friends with an expendable 10, 20 or 30,000 dollars. Pre-Seed Funding is very important because it helps you go from an Early Stage Startup to a viable Company to present to Angel Investors and Venture Capitalist for larger funding.

The SEAL SwimSafe™ is a wearable rechargeable in-water swim monitor and drowning detection device. Leveraging patented SwimSafe™ technology to detect a swimmer in distress, it notifies parents, caregivers and lifeguards by issuing alerts in time for a rescue.

Electric Signal uses speech recognition to create websites. Ever since the web's inception, there has been two choices for developing a website: memorize every HTML tag and possible attribute, then slog away on a keyboard, or use a clunky WYSIWYG. Most professionals use the former while web page creation tools use the latter.   	What we are trying to do is allow the computer to parse verbal language into software commands that will allow users to actually dictate their own web site easily and effectively. The user no longer has a reason to be intimidated by technical documentation, nor do they need to rely on a professional for simple static websites and blogs.

SupportPay is the 1st automated child support payment platform that enables parents to share child expenses & exchange child support/alimony directly with each other.   	In the US, there are 55 million parents that live apart. 39 million exchange over $200B/yr in child expenses & child support/alimony. (most hear about the 16M who don't pay) Globally there are over 298M parents who exchange $900B/yr. After a parent has an order, there has been no standard way for parents to manage this conflict ridden process. Since child support is not just a single monthly payment but also a broad collection of shared expenses (medical, education, childcare, etc) parents must continually manage, communicate & negotiate over these expenses. The process is complex, time consuming & stressful.   	SupportPay eliminates child support conflict providing both parents transparency while saving time & money. Parents can now spend less time managing child support & more time raising happy, healthy children.

RE-Trax creates transparency in commercial real estate by crowdsourcing from tenants what they are paying in rent and allowing users to search by radius what other tenants are paying in rent based on several categories. TextUs.Biz is pioneering the first “SMS 2.0” platform providing personal, two-way, business text messaging by leveraging the business’ existing landline phone numbers to send and receive texts.  Our coined phrase, “SMS 2.0” is the natural and technological evolution of business text messaging by breaking away from impersonal, robotic, 5-digit, short-codes and harnessing the capability of the 23,000,000, landlines and 800 #s, that businesses in North America already own and use everyday.

Splitforce (splitforce.com) is A/B testing for mobile apps and games.   	With Splitforce, app developers can test different versions of their native apps, track how each version is driving user behavior, and pick a winning version. Anything you can code, you can test - texts, colors, button/ad placements, layouts, even price points and game mechanics.   	People who don't know about Splitforce resort to hacking their own solution, either from scratch or by piecing together existing tools. PWRstation solves two problems :   	1) Solar PV installations remain expensive. This is not due to the cost of panels, which have significantly decreased over the last year, but rather due to what the PV industry refers to as hardware cost (not the panels) and soft cost (system design, installation labor, etc.)   	2) There are many reports of safety concerns during fires across the US, specifically in CA & NJ. The National Fire Protection Association is getting involved.   	Besides the 25% reduction in installation costs versus current market pricing, the PWRstation ( patent pending) provides more room to operate as it is connected to the fire alarm system and folds automatically in case of a fire.   	The PWRstation is the only "firefighter friendly" solar PV system available today as there are no electrocution risks.  When the panels are folded they are enclosed in a ceramic non-flammable housing and any electricity production is halted.

Eko provides physicians with certainty when diagnosing heart conditions. We’ve built one of the world’s first stethoscopes that can automatically detect heart murmurs. Doctors currently have the almost impossible task of trying to hear minute differences between heartsounds, which results in frequent misdiagnosis and undetected heart abnormalities. Through a physician’s smartphone, the Eko software compares a patient’s heartbeat to a database of thousands of others and provides almost instantaneous feedback to the physician. Eko gives every physician the power of a cardiologist in their pocket. Eko’s smartphone application also allows for powerful integrations with existing medical infrastructure. Doctors can share recorded heart sounds with other physicians around the world, attach a heart sound to a patients medical record, or even email the heart sound to the patient themselves. Eko opens up unique new opportunities to improve collaboration, reduce costs, and improve outcomes.

We all know someone, a friend or family member that has been arrested or charged and as a result might have led to a conviction. Unfortunately, there is a stigma attached to any person applying for a job with a criminal record. Requesting applicants to disclose on a application charges and arrests that never led to convictions, unfairly sets them up for predisposed judgment by the employer.  The mission of Look Past Jobs is to bring together individuals that have criminal records and employers that will consider all candidates fairly based ONLY on charges that led to actual convictions.   	If an individual is charged and it never led to a conviction, this charge still shown on their background check.  While that person has been cleared by the justice system the charge has not been cleared from their record.  When they seek employment a charge that was cleared is still divulged which is completely unjust. The system is flawed and LPJ is a proper and fair way to consider candidates.

The Ricochet is a small air launched reusable space plane much like the X-15 rocket plane designed to orbit small satellites (1100 pounds) into low earth orbit. It is carried internally in a modified Lockheed L-1011 airplane and is dropped at 40,000 ft. uses it's rocket motors to fly into orbit and deploy the satellite(s). Then fly back to land on a runway like a airplane.   	These small satellites currently have a five to seven year wait to ride piggyback on a rocket carrying a large satellite or never be launched at all because of high launch costs. The Ricochet will eliminate the long wait for a ride into space by using a airline like schedule of one launch per week and making the cost of the launch more affordable. These satellites serve the following markets: telephony, tv/radio, data, remote sensing (weather), scientific, etc.

We have developed a unique approach to chat.   	Do to the Siloed nature of Chat, within Apps, no universal addressing system for Chat has yet been developed. So, unlike voice and email, chat is not a universal platform.   	With voice and email there are single namespaces that works on ALL devices. I can call or text anybody without knowing their carrier or which phone they have. I can email them without needing to know which email client the run or what OS it runs on.   	With chat, there is no common namespace. WeChat, WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, LINE, Kik, KakaoTalk and others all have their own namespaces, and proprietary protocols. So to chat with a friend, I have to first know what app they use, install that app, and then know their ID inside the app.   	What if chat had a universal global namespace? What if in order to Chat with an individual or business all one needed was their Chat address or Name.   	Well… we have created it. It is called Chat Center

The ForSure suite brings the strength of public key cryptography to email, messaging, and team status updates that are as secure as they are easy to use. Small and medium businesses now have enterprise-grade communication tools that scale painlessly with each new user.

AuraWallet is a multi-cryptocurrency management tool for mobile users, which is currently in development for the iOS, Android, Blackberry, and Windows platform. HopeLink is the most efficient communication exchange between nonprofits and their supporters.   	Customer: Any organization (international development, private schools, museums, advocacy groups...) who raises support for a cause.  The organization will use our mobile app to collect data, pictures, and media which HopeLink will store and manage within its cloud service. That information can be accessed along with many workflow tools for management through our web services and is linked to their CRM system via an API.   	Gathering critical information from the field and reporting progress to financial supporters is a costly and slow process for nonprofits. SmileBack is a location-based mobile game that provides a fun and simple way to meet new people. When two users match, the app lets them chat and awards a voucher for free drinks. We’re building “Google Now for Hospitals”, to significantly enhance hospital safety and efficiency.

In an environment where information-driven decisions can mean the difference between life and death, that information is often dispersed, disorganized and slow to access. 

To address this problem, we are building a software platform that integrates with a hospital’s data sources, uses location tracking and data analysis to determine each care provider’s current tasks and priorities, and streams critical task-related information to their smart glasses or handheld device.

Information about care providers, patients, and medical tools are seamlessly integrated and intelligently delivered to the right person at the right time... to inform decisions, increase operational efficiency and improve patient outcomes.

Our first two products focus on the operating room: VitalStream streams live vital signs to the surgeon's Google Glass. VitalVideo streams live endoscopy video to Glass and tablet.

Medytex is a uniquely efficient patient feedback system. We use the latest technology (mobile application) to create short surveys for healthcare providers. Patients are able to answer by selecting easy to read icons available in different languages. On the back-end, clinic administrators can view the survey answers and comments in terms of easy to view charts based on feedback and demographics.

We provide a more effective service, because of the same day feedback. We are able to reach a wide spectrum of patients, unlike currently used methods. Clinicians are then able to view and increase patient satisfaction immediately. Our patient survey is an initiative to go green by being paperless. It is also more cost effective for providers.

Our technology is creating a more efficient and creative mobile ecosystem.   	 Rheti gives developers the ability to create interchangeable app components, and lets non-developers assemble these components visually. Our patent-pending IDE is an Android app, allowing users to build apps on their devices using touch commands.   	 Rheti learns from user behavior. This allows us to analyze and recommend app components to users (as they build), as well as supply partners with measurable data regarding mobile trends.   	  All parties benefit.   	 -Developers are able to focus on creating innovative features rather than tasks like frontend development, API integration, and debugging. Coding a Rheti component takes a fraction of the time it takes to code a full-fledged app.   	 -Non-developers are able to make apps with a degree of customization and functionality much greater than previously available.   	 -Partners receive information that allows them to make the right creative decisions.

Ello is a social network and communications platform created by Kidrobot founder Paul Budnitz, designers Todd Berger & Lucian Fohr, and developers Mode Set.   	Originally built as a private network used by a group of influential designers and programmers, Ello has evolved into a fast, elegant, and technologically advanced social network built specifically for influencers. Maintenr is the vision of Aleksey Korzun, an auto-enthusiast from New York City. Bcoiner is an international digital wallet service that allows you to securely use and accept Bitcoin.  Bcoiner is a global, trusted and valued service provider for digital wallets.  Bcoiner can be accessed from anywhere in English, Spanish, Arabic, Russian, French, Portuguese, Chinese and Korean.

LDS provides the only passive non-contact biometric sensing system that monitors the vital signs of target individuals. This includes babies in cribs, adults with cardiovascular and related disease, residents in care facilities and patients in medical facilities. Existing solutions have limited capability, are impractical to use, require trained staff and are expensive to deploy.

In the US parents spend more than $48MM annually to monitor only the motion of their sleeping children. More than 80MM Americans suffering from diseases like COPD, cardiovascular disease, chronic respiratory failure and obstructive sleep apnea have no practical way of monitoring the progress of their disease.

We can monitor multiple individuals within a defined space and can read their respiration and ECG simultaneously. Our system is low cost and requires no special training on the part of the user. Our solution is patent pending.

Niche is the first private, location-based photo sharing application of its kind. We will be known as the company that re-defined "the social network" through user privacy, creativity and efficiency.  

Niche is for the students that hang out at sporting events, concerts, afterschool activities, or at one another’s houses and archive pictures in those locations and only have the pictures shared with their most trusted friends. 

Unlike applications like Snapchat where memories last a few seconds, the extra privacy provided by Niche, based on geo location, allows these friends to archive these memories in a fun, easy and interactive way.  You don’t need to waste time trying to sort through pictures figuring out which ones to send and to who.  You don’t need to wonder who might be accessing these pictures.  

We are a micro-social network, giving personality to the places that matter most.

It's time to find your niche.

The Word's business plan is to have a data center that stores every word in every language to compare a spoken word to voice files saved in the system. So there well be a file labeled "Hello" and millions of "Hello's" well be record so when you speak "Hello" there will be a 80% probability that you said "Hello" and not "Cat" which would have a .001% chance of being correct.To translate your word "Hello" will be linked to the corresponding words in every other language.  "Hello" well easily be translated to for example "Hola" in Spanish or "Bonjour" in french.       The Word offers 3 choices, voice to text, voice over internet calling, and video calling.If you call Russia you can get Russian automatically translated into your language and your language translated back into Russian.   	  Half the money will go to purchasing IBM servers.The remaining funds will be used to hire personal.   	  The Word will make it easy and simple for people to communicate across different languages.

Isentio offers unique online software solutions to facilitate analysis, interpretation and management of DNA sequencing data. Isentio's RipSeq® product is the fastest, most user-friendly and complete solution for DNA identification of clinically important pathogens, making identification consistent and accurate.   	RipSeq enables sequence-based identification from both mono- and poly-microbial samples, a unique feature that results in enhanced problem solving qualities. The bacterial identification time can be reduced up to 90% and answers can be provided where other methods fail. Fast, precise pathogen identification will also support selection of optimal antibiotic regimes, with the potential to reduce health care costs.   	50k Foot View of Isentio: •SaaS product + curated proprietary database •Clinical AND research lab utility •Existing global customer base •2 filed and 3 provisional patents

Tripstr makes it incredibly easy to turn the hundreds of photos and videos you take on your trips into beautiful, interactive triplogs. We do this by taking advantage of the rich metadata in smartphone photos, combined with beautiful design and UX that turns an hour-long process into minutes. In doing so, we are attacking the travel industry from a unique angle, i.e. through the emotional memories we capture on our phones.

Our customers are travel companies (tour operators, resorts, cruise lines, agents) that are desperately seeking a social media strategy that results in increased referrals and lead generation. We partner with these companies in a B2B2C model where we co-brand user triplogs with travel company brands.

Tripstr’s team is engineer-led with experience launching a successful social photo-sharing app (Quilt), and a long-time travel industry veteran who built and sold one of the largest student travel agencies in the US to a $4B global travel conglomerate.

www.copymethat.com   	Adds a button to your browser that lets you copy any recipe from any website. Copy Me that detects the full recipe, removes all the extra text and ads, and copies it to your personal account. Here you can tag it, edit it, search through the text, add it to your shopping list, and share it. Never lose a recipe again.   	Copy Me That is already up and running with more than 300 active users. It is far better than any similar product at detecting recipes and is easier to use. Works on smartphones, too.   	See what people said on Reddit: http://www.reddit.com/r/recipes/comments/1qwcxb/i_made_copy_me_that_to_copy_and_manage_recipes/   	Future features include printing your own recipe book, meal planning, ability to multiply recipes and perform unit conversions, downloading of recipes as PDF files. Sprig provides healthy food on-demand. Anytime you are hungry, you can order a locally-sourced, healthy dinner option directly from your smartphone. It is as easy as calling an Uber, and meals are $10. Once you order, it takes 20 minutes to get to your door. All meals are cooked by Executive Chef Nate Keller, who was an executive chef at Google, where he grew the culinary program from 400 to 40,000 employees.

The average customer ordered 2.8 times in their first 4 weeks. It is in the App Store as "Sprig: Dinner on Demand".

This is what makes Sprig unique:
1) Real-time. Customers order and get their food within 20 minutes on average.
2) Hot without degrading quality. We spent 6 months on operations and culinary research to figure out how to keep the food quality high even through the delivery process.
3) The food. Restaurant food is unhealthy, especially delivery. It's full of salt, butter and oil. Our food is seasonal, local and good for you.

ParallelX is a Hadoop as a service provider that accelerates Hadoop jobs to run up to 500x faster without any additional development. 

To achieve this, ParallelX consists of a (1) compiler that translates the Java code developers have already written to OpenCL, and (2) a GPU cloud to execute the OpenCL code. By executing Hadoop jobs on GPUs as opposed to CPUs, ParallelX is hundreds of times faster than current Hadoop implementations. Since one GPU is the equivalent of many CPUs, we offer ParallelX at a competitive price.

The Constituent connects citizens with candidates and incumbents while providing access to open government data, all in the name of better representation.

The Constituent allows citizens to easily find ongoing political fundraising campaigns in their district and state and gives them the opportunity to quickly donate to their favorite candidates, but the interaction doesn't stop there. The Constituent also serves as a one-stop shop for candidates and incumbents who want to meet campaign fundraising requirements that range anywhere from $5K -$400M per seat.  Whether they're running for Senate or Sheriff, candidates and incumbents can raise funds from politically active citizens in their district, state, or entire country and can easily organize their supporters by utilizing our platform's messaging features.

Spogo rewards sports fans for making correct predictions during live games.   	Users answer real-time questions as they watch--anything from "Who will win the game?" to "What color Gatorade will be dumped on the coach's head when the Superbowl comes to an end?" Correct predictions earn points, which can be exchanged for REAL rewards (like food, beer, tickets and gear) from over 60 locations across Boston, Providence and NYC.   	While 88% of viewers are on a second-screen device while they watch TV today, only 22% of those viewers are doing something related to the live broadcast. That’s a huge problem for venues, networks and advertisers. Spogo serves as a second-screen marketing platform to drive awareness and revenue for these properties affected by the viewer attention deficit problem we’re seeing today.

The Virtuix Omni™ is the first ever virtual reality platform for moving freely and naturally in virtual worlds, compatible with the Oculus Rift and any other future head mounted displays,

Virtuix successfully raised $1.1 million on Kickstarter for the Omni in June 2013, closed a $3MM seed round in April 2014 with investors including Mark Cuban, Tekton Ventures, Maveron, Scentan Ventures, StartCaps, and Scout Ventures, among others, and has sold more than 3,500 units to date. 

The Omni has been featured in tech and mainstream media including ABC's SharkTank, BBC, FOX, NBC, Discovery Channel, Forbes, and more.

The Omni is a patent-pending omni-directional treadmill that solves the 20-year old problem of locomotion: how do you physically walk around in the virtual world while being confined within the limited space of your room? The Omni is the first and only omni-directional treadmill that is affordable, compact, and enables the user to walk, run, and jump naturally in 360 degrees.

Iodine mines clinical data to help consumers make better decisions about drugs. We crunch open government datasets (FDA, CMS, VA) to create targeted, actionable tools that drive better decisions, better adherence, and better outcomes.

Iodine addresses a massive need among Internet users: 23% are searching for drug information, and half of these are unsatisfied by what they find. Market incumbents WebMD (150M page views/month) and Drugs.com (50M page views/month) are designed to *not* serve user needs - they're designed to serve ad inventory and hide the info users seek.

Iodine's web and mobile products are engineered to target two clear market needs: 1) help consumers navigate the side effects, efficacy, and cost concerns that drive 90% of non-adherence (a $290B problem) and 2) help consumers find a drug that works faster, reducing the trial & error that wastes $145B annually.

With expertise in analytics, behavioral science, and design, Iodine is solving this problem.

Agile Devices aims to remove a major time bottleneck in a wide variety of catheter-based interventional procedures, resulting in improved patient outcomes and large cost savings for hospitals. Patients benefit from shorter procedure times, especially in time-critical emergencies such as stroke or acute arterial bleeding. Faster procedure times also allow treatment in patients who had would have otherwise fallen outside of their therapeutic time window. Physicians are attracted to our device by the improved ease-of-use over traditional microcatheters and maintained compatibility with other interventional equipment.  Hospitals benefit from lower costs per procedure, which could lead to savings of $1.8+ B/year for hospitals in the US upon complete adoption.

We provide farmers spectral data to optimize water and nitrogen application. Specifically, we use UAVs/ aerial photography and spectral image processing to monitor crop variables like - 

(1) Nutrient status
(2) Water stress

We make the data actionable (eg, when should you apply water, where are clogs/leaks in the irrigation lines) and send it over the cloud to farmers. Our business model is data as a service; we deliver the data periodically in exchange for recurring revenue. 

This year is expected to be the driest in Californian history. Farmers across California and the world face resource crises due to climate change, droughts, regulation, and other factors. These farmers can use our data to optimize crop management decisions like fertilizer application, irrigation schedules, differential irrigation, and more without any upfront capital expense.

IdentaChip is a hardware and services company that provides technology which eliminates the vulnerabilities brought about by mobile computing and the reliance on passwords as a security credential. Founded by UCSF scientists and Stanford and Cambridge technologists, our mission is using big data to understand the human microbiome. We’re all covered in trillions of bacteria. Chiron Health is a secure web-based service that connects physicians with patients via videoconference for routine follow-up appointments.

While many physicians believe telemedicine will play an important role in the future of healthcare delivery, the technology is currently limited primarily to academic medical centers and large health systems. In addition, given complicated state medical board regulations, HIPAA privacy concerns, and difficult reimbursement, the majority of physicians in the U.S. simply don’t have the resources to offer telemedicine services to their patients who need it most.

Chiron Health changes this dynamic by providing a secure technology platform that leverages the existing computers, tablets, and mobile devices that physicians and patients use every day, and by providing a high-touch service component that handles all of the regulatory and administrative complexities of practicing telemedicine—including full reimbursement from private payers.

3D printing should be about printing stuff, not tinkering with a printer. That's what Ez3D is all about. Most printers are built for hobbyists and electronics enthusiasts tinkering in a garage. We are creating printers that help you get printing.   	Our hardware has a few unique features to it.  The main distinction is our Z-axis design. Most printers use a long screw to move the build table up and down. Low quality screws can lead to poor quality prints, though, so we've replaced the Z screw with a belt system that allows for rapid movement and smooth prints.   	Our software also helps 3D printer users in several aspects. Not only does it include filament inventory management, but also provides a parts library and Thingiverse integration. Our software is also the only software with "print recovery," allowing you to "rewind" a failed print to attempt to recover it.   	And finally, we're making it affordable. Starting at $375, our printer is one of the most affordable out there.

Sanguine is a technology-enabled company innovating at the intersection of personalized medicine, biobanking, and biomedical research. It has a simple and attractive, proven business model. Sanguine collects blood samples and associated medical data from patients diagnosed with specific conditions. It processes those samples to extract biospecimen such as cells, serum, plasma and DNA, and stores them along with the medical data. It then sells the biospecimen and data to academic and pharmaceutical entities for research purposes.   	 Problem & Solution: Traditionally, research companies need to wait for physicians to set up appointments with patients and to find some willing to sign up. Patients go to Sanguine because Sanguine offers increased transparency in the research process, showing them where samples are used and how they advance biomedical research in areas they care about.

As another year unfolds, memories of Partition float further back in time. Many thousands risk disappearing forever this year, leaving unfilled gaps in the collective memory of our cultural inheritance.  We teach and empower citizens around the world to record memories of Partition on video. We believe the process of recording a story builds trust and empathy, as well as sharing of knowledge in the most intimate way possible. 

Join us before it is too late and the memory is forever lost.

KetchUp is a mobile app that solves the problem of distracted driving. The KetchUp mobile app works by collecting data from multiple sources such as your email, social networks, music and location. Our technology uses that data and builds a personalized radio station that is informative and entertaining. Our core belief is that by providing an awesome user interface (in the form of a mobile radio station), drivers will not have the need to check email while driving.

Inventalator is a crowdsourced development community that uses a prediction market to forecast the future commercial potential of user submitted invention ideas for physical technology products.

Our mission is to leverage the power of the crowd to reduce the cost, risk, and complexity of invention for the individual. Floret is a fun (gamified) platform for exclusively online romance. Something like the movie "Her" but way more fun and between two actual people.
Floret, is different from anything you've ever seen in 2 main aspects:
1) Gamification: Our top priority is to provide a fun experience, removing any friction in meeting new people for romance. At the core of Floret, is our dating game which is inspired by a famous problem in economics and mathematics called Stable Marriage Problem. I got the idea of building Floret, while reading an academic paper on just another boring day of a doctorate student.
2) Online Romance: If you are around a teenager or young adult who is dating someone, you can notice most of the communication is on mobile platforms rather than actually going on a date. I believe, the online experience is preferred to offline meet ups for the new young generation. With Floret, we aim to encourage a new romantic experience, which we call exclusively online romance.

PIPR_Description: HAKU is visual browser for the semantic web.  HAKU provides a new way to discover and stay connected to the content, ideas, and people that matter most. Imagine a browser that connects you with ideas that you love, not just advertisements you ignore. Money2Ethiopia.com (M2E) was founded in Seattle Washington in 2013 by members of the Ethiopian Diaspora, who were confronted by a basic problem. There were simply no safe, legal and cost effective options to send money to Ethiopia. The Ethiopian Diaspora population here in the US incur significantly higher fees using Western Union and MoneyGram then do other immigrant communities when sending money home. These higher fees are a common theme across much of Africa due in part to a lack of competition among the major money transfer companies operating in these developing markets.

M2E provides the 900,000 Ethiopian Diaspora in the US a fast, reliable, low cost and convenient way to send money to loved ones back home. Our goal is to become the leading online and mobile platform application used by the Ethiopian diaspora to send money from the US to Ethiopia. We take pride in being close to our customers, speaking the languages, and serving as a tool for economic growth in Ethiopia.

Problem: A Patient need a medical procedure done: Insurance does not offer coverage for the procedure, the patient can't afford the procedure out-of-pocket, and the patient does not qualify for third-party financing. There are two options: (1) The Medical Provider does not service patient's needs and patient finds services elsewhere (2) Medical Provider rolls the dice and trusts the patient to payback in monthly installments. Both options are high risk to the provider and at least one of the options denies the patient service.  Answer: Arch Advantage bridges the financial gap by offering a cloud-based solution, the ARCH Smart Engine (patent pending) that utilizes non-traditional "big" data to assess a patient's payment worthiness (regardless of their credit history) to generate a customized payment plan based on a patients individual risk. The Smart Engine then sets an automated schedule that services the full life-cycle of the payment plan from origination through final payment.

One Billion Years Later/ One Billion Years Ago (OBYL & OBYA) is a media franchise where the story is told across multiple platforms, near simultaneously, in which one of the platforms is real space. By purchasing a video game, book, or other related products at different price levels, customers are participating in the commercial space industry, either directly or indirectly.  Indirectly, they are providing capital that will be used to develop a permanent human presence in space. You’ve automated your marketing, now automate your product demos! Automated video product demos that deliver personalization to each prospect.   	Anybody that has worked in software or tech sales knows that product demos are a huge time sink. In fact, the average closed sale requires 3-6 product demos in order to engage the entire buying panel. At 45-60 minutes a demo, this severely limits your sales team's ability to handle more leads and scale the business.   	DemoChimp is software that automates the product demo and provides visibility into the entire buying panel. With DemoChimp, prospective customers can get a personalized product demo and share it with other stakeholders in the organization. Because closed sales now only require 1-2 live product demos, sale teams can handle a 3x increase in leads, in addition to being provided with the analytics necessary to engage the entire buying panel in more a meaningful way, begin closing conversations sooner, and shorten the sales cycle.

Mahana is a mobile app and associated service for restaurants.   	Consumers download the Mahana app, connect it to their Facebook account, and select their dietary preferences.   	Mahana places iBeacons at the entrances of restaurants. As a consumer walks by with the app, the app signals that the consumer has entered the restaurant.  Consumer’s picture, name, dietary preferences, and previous visits are displayed on the restaurant’s POS terminals and on the Mahana manager app, allowing the staff to greet the consumer and customize their experience.   	Restaurants and their managers can send invitations to try new menu items, attend special events, and even secure a table during peak times.  Invitations are targeted and segmented based on the consumer’s current location, what the consumer ate, drank, how often they visit, and when they last visited.   	Mahana's consumers can use the Mahana map to explore participating restaurants to discover unique dining experiences.

Our mobile app: Locket, lets you browse and build secure, geo-fenced data bubbles in physical places and at specific times. When you enter a bubble, Locket displays specific UI cards (like Google Now), widgets (for controlling physical objects and nested micro-apps) and local maps. The app responds to different user needs, such as VIPs, first-timers, repeat visitors and employees, to display curated information and create custom experiences.   	 When you build a data bubble using our customizable themes, you can specify what data is shared with each type of person, add physical objects for users to control and monitor analytics through a dashboard.   	 Our hardware: Mantle, adds a hardened security layer by running an embedded server wired directly into router. With Mantle, you can create self-contained data bubbles that don't require an internet connection.

In 2014, the medical profession remains tethered to an antiquated paging system. Doctors still carry around those garage door opener-sized pagers the rest of us did our best to recycle in the mid-1990s. Like you still see on TV and movies, they receive shorthand pages from the hospital, which alerts the user to find a phone to call in and receive the information they need. This leads to miscommunications and clinicians wasting valuable time awaiting responses. A study by CISCO estimates that over $10 billion in value has been lost due to inefficiencies in medical communication.   	     There are two reasons for this: 1) the security and privacy standards within HIPAA regulations and 2) institutional inertia endemic to large hospitals when it comes to implementing a system-wide technology solution.   	     We believe Medigram is the company poised to solve this two-pronged problem for many healthcare providers and the beneficiary of significant value for themselves (and investors) along the way.   	 Opportunity   	     In the medical field, physicians and medical staff continue to use outdated methods of communication such as pagers and fax machines. In an industry where every second counts, using antiquated methods of communication can mean dramatic differences in patient care.  Clinicians often resort to texting, which violates HIPAA regulations as SMS messages are not encrypted or secure. These penalties can cost over $10,000 per text and put an entire hospital at risk. Medigram solves these problems by providing one of the first convenient and secure ways for medical teams to communicate, within the guidelines of HIPAA. The increasing drilling rig activity on US land has resulted in an increased demand for economic and managed liability drilling waste solutions. In Texas, environmental regulations allow O&G operators to dispose of drilling cuttings waste on site, however, few operators do so due to apprehension of long term disposal liability. The disposal liability stems from drill cuttings exiting the wellbore saturated in diesel based drilling fluid. This has resulted in years of transporting drilling cuttings waste to an offsite disposal site. Drill Cycle will capitalize on the new market of onsite disposal for its South Texas clients by reducing their capital spent on disposal, reducing short term liability of transporting waste, and reducing long term liability of disposing of high oil content drill cuttings on third party managed landfills.   	The O&G play that Drill Cycle will target initially will be South Texas Eagle Ford Shale. Drill Cycle services will be twofold; (1) dispose of drill cuttings on site and (2) recover diesel from the drilling waste. To do so, Drill Cycle will acquire equipment and material required to process drill cuttings from an initial 10-15% by weight oil on cuttings to a final product of less than 1% by weight.  The equipment utilized will be mobile and will process drill cuttings waste on the drilling pad site. The mobile units will process the drill cuttings waste into two separate streams of solids and liquids. The solids will be disposed of onsite and buried thereafter.  Diesel reclaimed from the separation process will be sold back to the customer for reuse.   	Drill Cycle’s services will be a first in South Texas oilfield. Drill Cycle services will reduce the $/bbl their clients spend on disposal by 30 – 50%, reduce their client’s short and long term disposal liability, and reduce equipment required to recover costly drilling fluid while drilling.

Remediation of Nevada, LLC is changing its’ name to Native American Mining Solutions (NAMS). The company will continue on the same mission, but will re-register and establish itself as a Woman Majority-Owned business. Cynthia Daily is going to lead the company as its’ Executive Director. Mrs. Daily has always been the driving force behind the operations, and is of Native American decent. She has the perceptive insight of following and honoring how the Native American addresses mining. Establishing a successful and safe mining operation that will provide a strong base for jobs, while protecting mother-earth is her primary objective.

The company has identified properties that contain minerals of direct importance to the National and Economic Security of this Country. In recent years, the United States has found itself increasingly dependent on the import of many strategically important metals and minerals from countries such as China, despite having a wealth of these commodities within our own borders. After an initial extended period of research, the company determined the most viable location to begin its’ first phase of the project, and specifically evaluated mineral deposits with excellent accessibility for year-around production.

The company has performed its’ first processing of heavy sand by utilizing a Keene Magnetic Separator, and was able to process 1000 lbs. of raw feed that was separated by a gravity concentration recovery. The concentrate was further analyzed, crushed and leached, and then by fire assay produced 1.15 grams of Gold and 1.95 grams of Silver. The company was also successful in sending 320 lbs. of raw feed to MTI for their metallurgical work-up and testing to produce a heavy metal concentrate and preform a bench scale test to produce typical Magnetite, Titanium, and Zircon products. The company’s next step is to establish its’ mill site for 10 ton @ hour Demo Plant to be placed into operation.

Our goal at Sustainable Microfarms is to reduce the pain points of every hydroponic gardener by manufacturing an affordable consumer product that is pre-programmed to automate key growing conditionions such as nutrient dosing and pH balance.  

Our product, the Genesis Controller, uses digital sensors placed in the water reservior to provide detailed information about plants to a microprocessor inside the Genesis Controller.  The unit is able to evaluate in real time what nutrients and pH levels plants need and automatically maintains a perfect equilibrium that results in higher quality organic produce.

Becuase the Genesis Controller utilizes hydroponics, it is able to use 90% less water, 70% less fertilizer, and acheive increased harvest sizes of 10X-30X compared to growing in soil.

Our first product is called ChangeTip. We’re making payments easy for people to tip each other via social networks - just leave a comment that mentions @changetip and an amount, and ChangeTip handles the transaction.

Some interesting uses:
* You tip someone on Quora for giving a high quality, thoughtful answer.
* When someone produces an inspiring video on YouTube, you donate to them
* Instead of a blogger using Google AdSense, users could tip them to see the site without ads for 30 days - with 1 click
* When a user contributes a patch for an Open Source project that solves your problem, you can leave them a tip on Github

Bitcoin is particularly well suited to online tipping because of anonymity and low transaction fees. Using social and viral growth hacks to drive the adoption of digital currencies, ChangeCoin will be in a strong position to disrupt Western Union, PayPal, Visa/MC and even Google AdSense with it's global micropayment infrastructure.

StyroPower is a company specializing in the creation and manufacturing of equipment built to solve issues with recycling plastics, particularly Styrofoam. After two years of development and two prototypes we are at the stage of going into production and have pre-sold units. Expanded Polystyrene (EPS), commonly known as Styrofoam™, is a valuable material in the food service and other industries.  Each year tens of millions of tons are used for packaging, storing, and serving. Seventy-six (76) percent of all EPS produced ends up in a landfill. Despite its usefulness, EPS suffers from limited options for recycling.  The difficulty in recycling lies mainly in problems with transport of this valuable material. The very characteristic of light weight to volume ratio that makes EPS so useful, is its' main drawback for transport to a recycling station. StyroPower solves this problem by densifying the EPS material into a plastic block with a density of greater than 30lbs per cubic foot. The condensed block has a high energy value and can be converted into fuel, used to generate electricity, or remolded into construction material.

PureShield Inc. is presenting an investment opportunity to acquire an innovative technology in the antimicrobial industry.   PureShield is seeking additional partners to assure PureShield attains a leadership position in the antimicrobial products industry.   To achieve this vision, additional financial and business resources are necessary.
PureShield is the owner of four EPA registrations for a highly unique antimicrobial technology.  Product Sales produce GM % of 70%.   The technology utilized is completely dissimilar to that found in other conventional antimicrobial products now available for use in the market place.  
Distinctively Unique Technology
The technology employed by PureShield products is entirely unique to all other antimicrobial products and disinfectants. PureShield products mode of action is to remain “bound” to the applied surface. They work as a surface protectant, inhibiting microbial growth on the applied surface without the use of poisons or heavy metals. The concept is analogous to how ScotchGard® protects fabrics from dirt and moisture or Clear Coat protects today’s car paint from environmental damage. Our surface protectants shield surfaces from microbial activity. Due to the products being bound surface protectants, the benefits are never depleted, thereby providing long-term residual protection. All other antimicrobial/disinfectant products currently available employ an “unbound” leaching technology, meaning that they are not bound to the applied surface and therefore the benefits of the product diminish over time. In addition, the EPA allows it to be applied to almost any porous and non-porous substrates.

PIPR_Name: (TABLE) The Association of Bar & Lounge Establishments
PIPR_Description:
The Association of Bar and Lounge Establishments (TABLE) will serve as the premiere
U.S. trade association for establishments serving spirits, as well as venues with
beverage service as the axis of their business model. TABLE will supply its members,
establishment owners and vendors, with marketing tools, education on best practices
and business skills, and will create a platform for sharing information and resources
within the industry. This will increase financial success among members, advance their
business skills, and create a trusted resource where one is needed.

Strategic Goals
1. Support members with information and assistance through events, publications,
and best practices.
2. Create technology marketing tools specifically designed for meaningful
communications between members and their patrons.
3. Encourage new product development and new services by opening a central
channel of communication between vendors and establishments.
4. Promote industry responsibility and career advancement through education
programs and skills training.
5. Expand the market for owner and vendor members by engaging consumers
(informing them of what member establishments can offer them, and collecting
feedback on their interests and experiences), encouraging increased beverage
distribution, and promoting an interest in new products and services.

World Energy LLC has completed research and pre-prototype development of two monumental achievements in science that will change the course of energy production and safeguard the environment on this planet. A third breakthrough has also been completed and the products are now on the market.

We are now at the crossroads in the aviation industry. The evolution of flight has come full circle. We have gone from the Wright Brothers’ Famous Flight at Kitty Hawk to the final flight of the mighty Concorde. 100 years. That is all, a short amount of time in the big scheme of things. But we have failed to make any significant progress in the past 20 years. We seem to be at a standstill. Their is little direction from anyone. Everything is in place if someone could just see the big picture. Is funding the real issue or is it leadership? Who will take the next giant step forward in aviation? The future is clearly in the high speed flight regime for the masses.   	The question is: Do you want to join in and be part of the dream or do you want to sit on the sidelines and watch it happen? Because it will.  You won’t have to tell your grandchildren about the chance you once had to be a part of the real future.  The future is now.

One square meter of rainforest equals 1 monkey, 10 plants, and 100's of insects. Every second 4000 square meters are destroyed. What if there was a we could prevent that?   	Cuipo's Solution: Why not buy thousands of hectares and give individuals the opportunity to make a difference by saving the rainforest 1 meter at a time? When a customer buys a product there is hang tag with a unique code that allows them to redeem (and save) a meter and specifically view it on Google Earth through the Portal. We are building hardware & software to (re)meet ?a basic human need: shelter. CareConnect patented platform solves all EHR integration issues. It works with any of the existing hospital systems and integrates them with any EHR. Essentially, it allows any system to talk to any other system. It can also consolidate and migrate large volumes of records into EHR quickly and cheaply. CareConnect enables the hospitals to qualify for EHR program 4 times faster and at a fraction of a cost than any alternative.   	Medicare/Medicaid launched EHR (electronic health record) program that offers financial incentives to hospitals that meet program requirements and penalizes those that do not. The problem is that hospitals have 20-50 different systems in various departments. Those systems contain millions of records that must be maintained for 30 years. All these systems are not interoperable with the new centralized EHR. That is the where value of CareConnect is realized.

We are building the Netflix of news. To avoid the costs associated with advertising our product, we are starting out as a traditional social media platform to get users and content. Our customers can have piping-hot food delivered to their door in 30 minutes from any restuarant, even the ones that don't deliver-all through a service for USC students, by USC students.

Our goal is to one day have a full-fledged iPhone and Andriod application to streamline the entire Envoy process. We imagine a time where a student can order exactly what they want from any restaurant on campus with a few simple taps, be able to track their food being prepared and delivered to them, and not have to ever deal with cash or even credit cards during the entire process.

Knox makes paying online faster and safer for consumers and cheaper and simpler for merchants.  

Knox Payments connects banks and merchants allowing consumers to pay with their online banking (without transferring personal information). When a merchant adds Knox to their page, all the consumer has to do is click "pay with my bank", choose their bank, securely login to their online banking, choose an account, and press pay. That's it! Knox does the rest. A merchant can also request information such as name, address, phone, and email to send receipts or ship goods to the consumer without asking them to enter any additional information.

Because we use the consumer's existing online banking login info, there's no need to make a new account to use Knox. And because we are the first "good funds" ACH payments, we charge only $0.18 per transaction! Knox is much safer than credit cards, because NOBODY gets any of your information without your permission - it stays with your bank.

Elecyr provides local energy independence for homes and businesses. The combination of solar power, smart batteries, and high voltage DC power distribution makes this possible.   	  The problem with solar power is that the sun doesn’t shine all the time. Almost all solar power today gets sent back to the electric grid as kind of a virtual battery. This no longer works. Even now, in some places, half the power is generated from rooftop solar and the grid has no place to send it. As a result, the market for solar power combined with energy storage is projected to grow, during the next four years, from $100M today to $2.8B. 35% of this market is storage with residential energy storage projected as $735M in 2018.   	  Unlike systems designed for short time backup only following power outages, Elecyr’s systems are designed for energy independence. Elecyr power systems are autonomous islands, powered primarily by solar power and backed up if desired by power from the electric grid or generators. The company’s initial customers are the US Army for forward operating base microgrids, residential Zero Net Energy, and 380 volt datacenters.

We are an early-stage biotechnology company that designs and markets blood tests to monitor changes in the chemosensitivity profile of cancer patients during the course of their chemotherapy. We intend to market our laboratory-developed test under the name ClearPath DX. Our first blood test is for pancreatic cancer. We believe that by proactively monitoring changes in the chemosensitivity profiles of these patients, we can dramatically improve their overall survival.   	Our office and laboratory facilities are located at the Shady Grove Incubation Center in Rockville, Maryland. We expect to move to new facilities in April 2014. Since our inception in 2010, we have achieved significant progress in the development, validation, and commercialization of our assay including critical milestones in sales, prospective clinical trial results, and securing intellectual property rights.  -Sales: In 2013, more than 200 pancreatic cancer patients paid out-of-pocket for our assay to help guide their chemotherapy treatment resulting in $337k in revenues. -Clinical Trial Validation: In a prospective clinical trial at Memorial Sloan Kettering, we demonstrated that pancreatic cancer patients who received a chemotherapy treatment that our assay identified prospectively as “sensitive” had an overall survival twice as long as patients who received a treatment that our assay identified prospectively as “resistant”. -Intellectual Property: We have filed provisional patents relating to our software analytics and the gene-sets used in the primer assay design for the chemotherapeutics.   We have raised $975K from angel investors through two rounds of funding with the last round in January 2012 .  We currently are seeking $250K in the form of a convertible  note to fund the initial commercialization of our blood test .

GP Holdings is a group formed to raise investment capital for design, development and manufacturing of emerging & innovative designs in the 2-wheeled vehicle industry. Many small- to medium-sized motorcycle manufacturers have new products designed for global distribution but lack the financial resources to bring their products to market. These companies require capital to turn their ideas into tangible products; most employ high-level designers and engineers to create these products. 

In return for investment capital, GP Holdings  and its investors gain a large percentage of company equity and rights to distribute products in select markets, including the USA, the single largest motorcycle market in the world.

One such company currently seeking capital  is EBR, Inc in Wisconsin. This company was established in 1983  by a former engineer of Harley-Davidson motorcycles, and has a history of building innovative sport motorcycles for markets around the world; over 140,000 bikes have been produced with revenue of $1.5Billion to date. A network of some 150 dealers distributes their products internationally. This company, including product inventory and machinery, is currently available for sale.

Another company is PEP Moto Italia, owner of 4 motorcycle brands and an engineering consulting group. They have been producing high-performance motorcycles since 1958, and have International Grand Prix motorcycle racing experience. PEP Moto has secured exclusive rights to use of new clean-burn engine technology  in 2-wheeled vehicles worldwide. The parent company is seeking funding for production of new models, using in-house design, assembly and marketing services for these products. PEP Moto has plans to establish a network of 'boutique' stores in major global markets to distribute their products, similar to the model Tesla Motors uses.

It is in the areas of product design & manufacturing, and engineering consulting, that GP Holdings seeks capital to pursue.

Today, we have many online resources at our disposal to get noticed.  The challenge is in getting introduced--getting an impression across to your audience that cannot show through on social media, email signature, job resume, business card, or website profile page.  Those formats are static displays which do little to differentiate you or your business from billions of others who use them.  A technology exists which perfectly bridges these gaps: video.  However, the vast majority of individuals and SMBs do not possess the time, money, or expertise to produce quality video content themselves.  With those barriers removed, what could you accomplish with a commercial…for you?  The market is in need of an appropriate solution.  The technology is video; the solution is IntroToMe.com.   With a public launch targeted for May 2014, IntroToMe will enable people with no video production experience to fully produce, maintain, and easily distribute a quality, 1-3 minute video introduction of themselves or their organization to their target audience. Unlike online video hosting sites such as YouTube, Viddy, Vines, etc., IntroToMe is a tool rather than a toy.  For a small monthly subscription fee, we provide planning tools, templates with pre-written content, coaching on shooting video segments, automated editing, hosting and publishing that can be incorporated into all online and traditional media.   This all-in-one platform approach defines IntroToMe as a unique, early-to-market product that brings the proactive power and reach of video marketing to people and businesses without the long, steep learning curve or expense of production.   In addition to our three initial target markets of Service Providers, Job Seekers, and Individuals/Organizations, we are designing a Corporate module which will dramatically reduce the time and expense of the hiring process, and benefit everyone from Applicant to HR Manager to Hiring Manager.

 What are some of the benefits of the Dropstor? It is easy for customers to use since you don't have to build ramps or throw items over the side for waste. The patented ramp allows for increased rental income compared to a standard dumpster.  For waste haulers, the patented ramp allows for removal of excess material when a dumpster is overloaded. Waste haulers could have additional back hauls.  Having 2 container doors, barn door and ramp wall, gives drivers easier placement options on a site  and allows for quicker turn around time.  For contractors the benefits include: reducing job site repair and clean up, reducing material waste, allowing  for on site bulk material storage and easy access with a wheelbarrow or machine.

Years of experimentation and understanding the science have led MIFTI’s scientists to conclude that the staged Z-pinch fusion approach will change the landscape of electricity production globally by providing a net energy gain from ten to fifty times the energy used to create the process.

Argon Credit Corporation is a consumer credit lender, servicing the United States market. We have strategically positioned ourselves to utilize several methods of client acquisition. Our first source, online generated leads, will rapidly provide us with borrowers, generating instant revenues. Second, we are building a base of retail partners. These businesses rely on customer financing to fuel their own revenues. Third, we will utilize SEO (search engine optimization) and drive borrowers directly to our web site application page, www.argoncredit.com. Our rates and terms vary from 1-3 years at 30-95% interest depending on credit history. Our clients consist of the near-prime borrowers that are average working Americans in need of cash, generally between $500 and $20,000. We established a credit facility for investors. This facility  buys the loans Argon Credit originates. A description of this consists of investor capital entering Argon 1 credit facility. The facility has no liabilities or employees. The facility buys the loans that Argon Credit originates for a small fee. Argon Credit assumes all liabilities and servicing of these loans. The payments all go to the facility. In turn the facility pays investors a 10% annual rate of return  and  30% of the profits.  Argon Credit takes a security interest in the checking account that provides an ACH withdrawal for automatic monthly payments.  Argon Credit uses in house underwriting and computer approval algorithms, throughout the approval process. By using our compressive approval process we expect to limit default losses to 6%. Please see our website for the Private Placement Memorandum and Subscription Agreement  information at  www.ArgonCredit.com. Argon 1 is currently seeking accredited investors only. Argon Credit is entertaining other terms for larger capital investments. We are open to different equity and debt structures. Please call us to discuss an investment in Argon Credit Corp.

Senor Sirloin seeks to become the largest top quality sirloin meat taqueria retail chain in the nation.  Senor Sirloin will glorify Mexican tacos as the ultimate and highest experience in Mexican food concepts. The company will aim to become the largest American retail chain which sells 100% true Mexican tacos Al Pastor.

For those of you who have eaten authentic tacos Al Pastor in Mexico City, Can Cun, Guadalajara, Cabo San Lucas at el “El Fogoncito,” “El Farolito,” or other upscale taquerias you can get an idea of what Senor Sirloin aims to become. Our main serving will be top sirloin quality meat tacos Al Pastor cooked in the "trompo," or standing broiler, with bacon, pineapple or mango and chipotle sauce. Senor Sirloin will also sell tacos de arrachera (carne asada), spicy pork (barbacoa), carnitas, chicken, chorizo, cabeza (head meat), chicharron (green pork), veggie tacos (grilled vegetables), and tacos tapatios (flautas-taquitos) on queso crema sauce which has a secret recipe.  Our secret sauce recipes include pineapple sauce, mango sauce, peach sauce, papaya sauce, fig sauce, lime sauce, and other out of this world sauces.

The company will sell Mexican glass bottled drinks such as Fanta, Sprite, Mexican Coca Cola, Jarritos, and others brands. Prominent Mexican and American beers will also be offered including hard Mexican liquor and tequila. The company will make its profit primarily from the sale of tacos, bottled soft drinks, liquor and beer. Each taqueria will sell $1,279,000 per year with 70% gross margin, and 20% net profit per store. Each store location will have very low cost overhead, and no more than 10 employees.

The company seeks $375,000 in investor funding to open its first 4 to 5 Senor Sirloin taquerias in the Sacramento metro area. Our objective is to grow organically throughout California, and throughout the United States in 5 to 7 years with 500 locations, and complete an IPO when the company reaches $600 million in annual revenues.
