Imagine a world where it costs $1.00 to fill up your car. A world where your home is heated by a fuel source that is consists of 95% water. A world where your business saves upwards of 1500% on energy costs. A world where alternative renewable energy is independent of climate and location. A world where we are reducing the carbon footprint for future generations.   Rooted from MIT and NASA, our team developed a technology (US/Intl Utility Patent: US8590496) that will forever alter the global landscape of the energy sector and global economy.   Whereas overcharging a battery to generate enough hydrogen energy to propel a piston had been conceptualized in the past, no one had been able to efficiently manage and recycle the hydrogen needed to create enough sustainable energy to successfully power an engine. That was until an errant wrench would strike our engine casing in a way that caused a slight shift in the energy current, which allowed us to control the flow of hydrogen energy.

Osblue 3Data is the first database system based on 3D data technology. 3D data is both intelligent, self managing and more secure. Conventional database management systems manage data in one dimension of data. This one dimension is organized as a collection of related tables consisting of rows and columns. They were designed to manage the simplest kind of data; structured data. Existing database management systems were designed on the 1970s, in a time when computing power was a fraction of what it is today and storage was prohibitively expensive. Additionally, these systems were designed 30 years before the internet created the demand for information portability, and the need for data to exist with a measure of independence from the system that create it.   	3Data is a modern database designed for today.  Data, views and actions are managed as a single object, reducing application complexity and increasing security and portability.  3Data will enable new kinds of modern applications.

Storelli is the first and only brand focused exclusively on designing and manufacturing innovative protective gear for soccer. Storelli has the rare opportunity to a) create a completely new category in the sports market, and b) own this category in stores and minds of consumers. With an injection of capital and the resources required for marketing and R&D, Storelli is positioned to become the newest and next big brand in soccer.   	 WHY PROTECTION IN SOCCER: Soccer is the most played sport in the world- every year more than 80mm active players are at risk from suffering preventable injuries in US and Western Europe alone. The great majority of these players are youth, with  parents sitting on the sidelines anxiously hoping their child doesn't get hurt. At the same time, coaches and the players themselves hate injuries and would love to avoid them, and even retailers are hungry for new categories of products to increase the spend per customer. In sum, EVERY stakeholder in the market is highly motivated to stop soccer injuries and thus want to see Storelli succeed.   	 COMPETITIVE LANDSCAPE: Despite the market demand for a solution to injuries, no brand focuses on this need: the major diversified sports brands (e.g., Adidas, Nike) do not focus on protection in soccer. The niche sports medicine players (e.g., McDavid, Shock Doctor) do not focus on soccer. Storelli is the first and only brand to make a market in soccer protection, explaining the speed of its uptake to date and future potential. The ASK Campaign is a mindfulness-based approach to transforming education from the inside out.

ASK stands for American Student Knowledge. The goal is to shift the reform movement from focusing solely on the future by providing educators tools to make critical progress TODAY. ASK is a responsive and preventative, immediate and longterm solution to the question of what a "good education" means in a modern world. 

The two ASK Workshops are: MODERN (Mindfulness and Media literacy, Organizational logic, Diversity appreciation, Emotional intelligence, Resource awareness and eNvironmental sustainability) and CREATE (Creative Expression of the Arts through Education.) 

Hour-long workshops can be incorporated into any preexisting curriculum and conducted on a daily, weekly or monthly basis.

Purpose: This is a purchase and rehab opportunity for a small multifamily property in Richmond Hill, New York. The proposed business of Super Intensive Stacked Raceway Shrimp Farming is a new technology developed at Texas A&M University by Dr. Addison Lawrence. We have secured an agreement with Royal Caridea L.L.C. to build a production facility in Western North Carolina. Our objective is to produce one million pounds of fresh organic shrimp and market it locally, with the intent to expand production as we move forward. Cost of building and operation until revenue can be realized will be in excess of 9.5 million dollars. We will be seeking investors and looking into Small Business Administration USDA loans for funding. Payback for this project is estimated to be 3-4 years with an average selling price per pound around $7.50 per pound.       Market competition is imported foreign head-off frozen shrimp. The US imports 5.5 billion dollars of shrimp annually from south East Asia, India and South America. Food safety is a major concern with foreign product. The ecological impact in producing countries has caused a decline in production in many of those countries. A devastating pathogen called Early Mortality Syndrome (EMS) has ravaged many production facilities completely wiping out shrimp production. Cost of shrimp has been escalating over the last few years and no relief is in sight. US pond farming has been on the rise, but is limited because of the low production rates and limited seasonal harvest. The production facility we propose is able to produce one million pounds of shrimp per year in staggered harvest in a climate controlled environment with automated feeding system, post-larvae nursery tanks, re-circulating filtration system and computer monitoring of critical metrics. The 20 stacked raceways will be constructed and consist of 7 rectangular ponds of 6-8 feet wide by 56 feet long  that will produce 428,000kg of shrimp annually.

Ameriss is a commercial LED lighting company that imports and distributes cutting edge LED technology, expanding from its central base in Kansas City, Missouri.  The major hurdle LED lighting has needed to clear before it could begin its market takeover in earnest has always been cost. While blue chip companies such as GE and Philips have made the investment to make household LED bulbs affordable, there has been no such commitment made to the commercial sector. By operating on low overhead and cutting out all middlemen between the manufacturer and consumer, Ameriss has made affordable commercial LED solutions a reality. In addition to supplying high quality, low cost LED lamps and fixtures, Ameriss has developed a suite of tools making lighting audits and quotes easier than ever before for our partners, thereby ensuring rapid expansion and market penetration through high installer adoption rates.  In the last month alone, Ameriss has closed sales in excess of $250,000 dollars, with an average profit margin of over 40%. Currently Ameriss is restricted to project financing, allowing inventory to be ordered only as deals are closed. While competing on price alone has proven to be a successful model, Ameriss is also positioning itself to address the second most pressing need in the industry, availability. With the proper funding, Ameriss will be able to stock a full line of inventory in its warehouse and distribution center in Kansas City. With this central location, Ameriss will be able to deliver its products anywhere in the US in a matter of days as opposed to the weeks or months lead time that is currently standard for the industry.

DfR is a technology development and licensing company. Our primary function historically has been to provide consulting services in the areas of PCB design, assembly, MEMs packaging as well as advanced (high density/high speed) semiconductor packaging with an emphasis on signal integrity, reliability, thermal performance and manufacturability.   	Recent developments in the areas of PCB manufacturing and signal integrity have led us to our current licensing opportunity. We have patent/s pending for a unique technology that enables very precise control of a drilling machine for back-drilling of PCBs while simultaneously providing in process parametric (signal integrity) data.   	In simpler terms, we have invented/designed a means for the drill bit to determine (within microns) the distance from the end of the drill bit to the underlying substrate by using a specific type of electronic sensory  signal (very high frequency) that we send down the drill bit. In addition, for one specific application (PCB via drilling) we can make signal measurements to provide electrical response data about the via itself.   	While via drilling in PCBs is a very specialized field with a narrow market it opens doors to other applications/markets  involving precision machining and drilling as well as precision sensory surgical robotic control and/or feedback. There are also likely to be unforeseen markets driven by the current technology development.   	DfR is currently in the process of changing it's business model from a consulting company to a development and licensing company. We are open to discuss other business arrangements including the formation of a new entity or partnering with an existing business for this purpose. We recognize that our specialty is in the technical space and are hoping to partner with businesses and individuals with more of a business background who can help us structure the business as we grow.

CompBlue has been created to provide workers compensation insurance to blue collar companies. Funds from investors will be used to bolster required reserves and serve as "collateral" for the issuance of additional insurance policies. Insurance is a cash-intensive business by nature and as such, there are no plans for the company to have the need to tap into funds that have been invested. CompBlue will "rent-a captive" from an existing highly rated insurance carrier which will provide the coverage and strength necessary to get the product to market - under the name of CompBlue. CompBlue essentially purchases the insurance at wholesale and sells it to the public at retail. CompBlue collects the premiums from its customers, pays the wholesale cost to the carrier, and passes the net revenues from the margin on to its investors. Reserves/Collateral enables CompBlue to write $4.06 in retail policies for every $1.00 in reserves. From the $4.06, $3.00 goes to pay buy the wholesale policy and $1.06 is retained by the LLC for operations and distribution to investors. Within the framework of the wholesale policy, premiums paid for the coverage (wholesale cost of goods) are used to provide (1) income to the carrier, purchase administrative, infrastructure, and claims processing (approx. 25% of premium); plus re-insurance as required by law (approx. 10% of premium); (2) pay any losses from injuries to covered workers (19%-55%); with the remaining funds (10%-46% of premium) (3) being retained by the "rent-a-captive" as additional reserves/collateral for future policies (Retained Captive Earnings). Each policy issued is collateralized once at inception, with the same collateral in force each year the policy is renewed. For example: $25k collateralizes a $100k policy in year one. That same $25k continues to collateralize it year by year. In 10 years that $25k has collateralized $1mm in premium. The high investor returns come from the power of renewing policies.

Full Circle Technologies has developed a chemical-mechanical process to take old tires free of steel and fiber, devulcanize and turn it back into soft pliable rubber that retains up to 80% of its elastic recovery, tensile strength and performance properties. The process is clean and environmentally friendly, does not create any emissions, effluent or byproducts of any kind. The finished product is a round, devulcanized rubber pellet called Ecorphalt whose main market is the asphalt pavement industry, where it is added to liquid asphalt to make a less brittle, more flexible, and longer lasting road surface.   	Many states have passed legislation that requires old tires to be used in asphalt pavements, In addition, the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act (ISTEA) of 1991, Section 1038 mandated the use of rubber modified asphalt pavements in a certain portion of federally funded highway projects begun after 1995 with continuous increases in subsequent years.   	The Ecorphalt product will be sold to petroleum terminal companies. State Departments of Transportation (DOT), however, must approve any raw material product in asphalt pavements.

The Booming Biometrics Industry

In recent years, we have seen a huge shift in accessibility of biometric technology, and BRIVAS has contributed towards making biometric systems more lightweight, mobile, robust and private. Microprocessor speeds and deep computation capability have just recently provided and environment for much greater accuracy. There are a number of reasons why interest in biometrics has increased dramatically in recent years. The development of organised crime, hacking, and terrorism have been hugely influential factors in sparking popular interest in biometric security systems in particular. There was a point where biometrics was seen as a creepy, until people realised the benefits to security and public safety. Businesses and organisations can benefit from biometric technology in exactly the same way - increased security with better user experience than username/passwords, access cards, keyfobs, pin codes and other costly hardware and labor intensive systems.

Green Energy Corp. is a leader in software and services enabling the development and deployment of microgrids.   A microgrid combines multiple Clean Technology and Renewable Energy generation resources into a single power resource where electricity is produced and delivered directly onsite and can be configurable as a stand-alone system that can be inter-connected to a larger grid, or operate "islanded" when the utility grid is not available.  Microgrids are able to be connected to the utility grid to purchase power from the grid or sell power back to the grid as conditions dictate.  Microgrids encompass multiple types of energy generation resources, storage systems, and efficiency programs, allowing for optimal utilization of renewable energy resources and facilitating advanced energy management, demand response, and load reduction solutions, equating to often cheaper, more reliable, scalable and future-proof energy systems.

Green Energy Corp's subscription-based software platform, The GreenBus™, is the backbone for the renewable energy sector to scale and rapidly deploy microgrids and complete Ecosystems, while the GEC's Utility-specific Middleware allows for developers to connect microgrids to utilities. The “Maas” (Microgrids as a Service) package provides a suite of end-to-end solutions for engineering, financing, construction, operations and maintenance, making Green Energy Corp. a single-source microgrid solution. 

We are the leaders in the design of microgrids, and have developed software specific to the operation and optimization of microgrids, which is unique to the market, and we hold the only system-wide patent for microgrids in the U.S. 

Green Energy Corp. continues to gain rapid expansion and deployment of its GreenBus™ software platform and MaaS, and a recent Navigant Consulting article listed Green Energy Corp. as a "top game-changing data management company" in renewable energy.

Our Founder’s airline operational experience was essential in developing a product that eliminates the researching, identifying, and the tracking of an unknown passenger.  Partnering with SITA/WorldTracer, producers of the luggage recovery software of 400 carriers worldwide, we provide supplemental luggage tags passengers can attach to their luggage thus preventing permanent loss.  Our tags can be purchased via a Zoom System kiosk located in large airports, or promotional display stands located in smaller facilities.  After successfully registering the tag through our kiosk or display stand, the tag will represent the customer’s direct contact information and facilitate communication between the passenger and his/her carrier.   Carriers using the SITA/WorldTracer claim software, will have the ability to directly contact our passengers through their existing luggage recovery program.  Using our unique PBX ID numbers, agents around the world are able to send text messages and/or email updates directly to our customers concerning his/her delayed luggage.  In addition, airline agents can request additional information from the passenger by submitting a request to call him/her directly.  PBX will be the first U.S. based supplemental luggage tag to partner with the SITA/WorldTracer and plans to provide high quality customer service to passengers in the coming months and years..

We make it easy and affordable to create a virtuous circle in which social responsibility drives sales, and business success catalyzes social good.   	Cause marketing service that directly and measurably generates social media, sales, and end-user data. This is an outstanding opportunity to purchase a 192-unit garden apartment community located less than eight miles from Downtown Orlando and three miles from Metro West.  Rivergate Partners will acquire the property for $9,450,000 million or $49,219 per unit, which is a 6.99% cap rate on current in-place income, adjusted for an increase in taxes and insurance acquisition year 1.  Financing - Rivergate Partners will place new Fannie Mae debt with the following loan terms: 5 year term, non-recourse, and principal amount of $7.61 MM (77.62% LTV) at a rate of 4.75%.  Cash on Cash Return - The 5-year cash flow is projected to an average of +/- 9.17%. The entity expects to distribute a 7% annual return in the initial year commencing in August 2014.  Capital Stack - The total capitalization of this acquisition is $10,347,480. With the debt at $7,619,000, the total equity portion of the capital is $2,728,480. The total capitalization has a debt to equity ratio of 77.62% to 22.38%.  Capital Expenditures - Rivergate Partners has identified $548,100 in property capital improvements necessary to make strategic improvements and to maintain the asset through the holding period: Upgrade interior fixtures of the leasing center, select roofs, parking lot seal coat and stripe, sidewalk repairs, lighting, landscaping, signage and some unit upgrades. This will be fully funded at acquisition. Submarket Fundamentals - Market Rent Growth provide by Marcus and Millichap indicates submarket year over year rent growth is projected to be the following: 2013Q2 0.5%, 2014Q2 2.0%, 2015Q2 0.5%, 2016Q2 1.5% and 2017Q2 2.4%.  Strong Orlando Location - The Greater Orlando metropolitan area has a population of 2,134,411, making it the 26th largest metro area in the United States. Beacon Hill is approximately 8 miles from downtown Orlando and Universal Studios and approximately 21 miles from Disney World, which provides tourism, jobs, hotels, restaurants, and shopping for the area. Orlando is also home to some of the nation's largest digital media companies, with more than 1,200 companies and 30,000 employees. Beacon Hill is right next door to West Oaks Elementary School. Other schools in the vicinity are Robinswood Middle School, Ocoee High School, and Valencia Community College West Campus. Health Central is located about 3.5 miles from the property, providing easily accessible healthcare option for residents. Beacon Hill is also near some of the nation's most prominent retailers such as Walmart, The Home Depot, Lowe's, Sam's Club, CVS/Pharmacy, Walgreens, and Winn-Dixie. Value Add - An enhanced upgrade program including: refaced cabinets, countertops and select new appliances, flooring, lighting and fixtures will be put in place to help support NOI growth through the reduction of concessions.  Acquisition Below Replacement Costs - The asset was developed in 1999 with nice curb appeal and a unique mix of 2 and 3 bedrooms. Replacement cost for an asset similar to Beacon Hill LIHTC is at a minimum, $100,000 per unit if a site were available in the local submarket.

Earth Paints Collection Systems is a latex paint recycling company dedicated to the collection and recycling of post consumer latex paint. once paint is collected we seporate it by quality and color, bulk it into 55 gallon drums. some good paint gets sent to a manufacturing plant where it gets cleaned, reformulated, quality controled and poured into gallons with our lable. Earth Paints Collection Systems just entered into an exclusive agreement, leasing a patented technology that will take our collected post-consumer latex paint and extrude it into a new plastic. there are 2 types of plastic we are consintrating on. first is HDPE using our patented formula we can product more HDPE plastic using less raw material, saving manufacturers on their bottom line. second plastic we want to consintrate on is PMMA using our formula with PMMA plastic make the PMMA plastic stronger. example; the computer industry uses Poly carbonet in the making of keybboards, phones, copy machines etc.. by taking our paint and mixing it with PMMA the plastic turns out stronger than the Poly carbonate at a much lower cost.  there is also latex paint recycling legislation that is spreading across the Country which will get us access to much more paint to secure our expansion.

Photetica has developed a patented science delivered via a medical device that provides a unique low level laser technology; the company's focus is treating patients that are currently under going cancer treatment.   	 Patients undergoing chemotherapy potentially face a variety of side effects -- nausea, sleeplessness, pain, CIPN (chemotherapy induced peripheral neuropathy-- one of the most common reasons for discontinuing chemotherapy), hair loss and a compromised immune system often resulting in a reduced white blood cell count that could be responsible for the temporary or permanent termination of chemotherapy.  According to www.ons.org (2011), CIPN is caused by five major drug classes: Taxanes, Platinums, Vinca alkaloids, Protease inhibitors, and Anti-angiogenesis agents.   	 Cancer patients can be prescribed drugs for pain, nausea, sleeplessness and for boosting the white blood cell count. These may treat some side effects of chemotherapy but they do nothing to repair damage to the peripheral nervous system which is severely damaged in approximately 30-40% of those patients that enter chemotherapy treatment (American Cancer Society).

So you might be asking, what is Quiet Punch?  Quiet Punch is the first of its kind to offer a quick and easy boxing workout from the comfort of your home.  When we say home we mean an apartment or maybe you live in your office.  Wherever you reside, as long as you have a doorway then you can use the system.  Quiet Punch is easy to setup, takes less than 1-minute, and has been carefully engineered to be easy on the joints yet withstand tremendous force.   	 The system consists of 2 lightweight bars and 1 lightweight punching bag.  The whole system weighs less than 10lbs.  Quiet Punch looks to become the first product to simulate a boxing workout without having to go into a gym or more specifically a boxing gym.  If you happen to be a boxer already, even better!  You can work on the snap of your jab and your cross, you can even work on some step-overs into a hook.   	 Quiet Punch is the first of its kind to hit the market attempting to make punching more mainstream. Never before has a product like this been created to offer punching in the comfort of a home, but more specifically an apartment.

Launch Angels combines the expertise of our management team and investment committee to identify opportunities through our expansive networks and through equity crowdfunding portals to build a fund of approximately ten companies. Investors benefit from access to venture deals without the hassles of research, paperwork, and tracking, and our open investment process which allows for visibility into our deal pipeline and Investment Meetings.   	The value of a diversified portfolio is well understood. Many accredited individuals we’ve spoken to would like to allocate a portion of their portfolio to early-stage/venture investing. But to date, angel investing has been inefficient, clubby, and time consuming, so it’s underrepresented in the typical portfolio.   	Launch Angels is a new kind of venture capital firm that enables accredited investors to become equity holders in Launch Angels venture funds — which then fund pre-screened, private companies. We invest across multiple sectors and all stages of a company’s development, and seek to leverage our expertise in equity crowdfunding to support entrepreneurs while providing a unique investment opportunity for individual angels looking to diversify their portfolio. The result is that deserving companies get the capital they need, and investors get unprecedented access to the seed stage companies they want.   	Women have made great strides in business and proven they can build and run successful businesses. Yet women entrepreneurs are still impacted by unequal access to capital.  We at Launch Angels understand the gap in raising capital for early stage women-led businesses, and this fund was formed to allow our investors to directly address that issue.  The capital raised by this fund will begin to be invested shortly after the fund closes, and investors in the fund will own a portfolio of select women-led, women-backed and women-friendly investments in about 12-18 months after close.

Conversio Republic is the world's first social demand app that allows people to pledge money for plans on alternative energy, high wages and renovation at businesses. 

-- So far people can only pledge to Restaurants, Grocery Stores and Gas Stations.
-- A marketplace will be setup where people can cash in "points" in exchange for pledging at stores
-- People will be able to pay with the Conversio App on their phone's. A quick scan and people are tracked for their spending purchases and recieve credit on the marketplace.

It works like this, someone selects a business, measures the squarefeet, selects focuses (various changes they want), they see the associated costs and then upload the plan. People are then able to pledge a portion of their monthly budget to the plan. Once the plan has more than enough pledges (or backers), the company is contacted and offered the chance to implement the plan and be tracked for how well they implement the plan.

True Link protects elderly people from predatory and fraudulent charges. One in five elderly people has been the victim of financial fraud – a total loss of $52b a year according to a recent Stanford study. We offer seniors and their caregivers a customizable Visa prepaid debit card with individualized controls that specifically protect against the types of fraud affecting the elderly. You can watch our customers describing the problem at https://www.youtube.com/user/TrueLinkCard   	From senior living to retirement savings to health insurance to adult diapers, companies have made billions adapting mainstream products for an aging market. The message is always "be prepared with extra protection, so you can live happily and independently longer." Banking is the only major industry where this hasn't yet been done. It's inevitable that someone will make a billion dollars adding independence-preserving safety features to a normal debit card marketed to the aging population.

Research Stir, SPC is a social purpose company (SPC) with a goal to empower and supercharge the biomedical research productivity in an unprecedented way. We provide a high demand internet platform for biomedical scientists to share Biological Research Materials (BRM). As experienced biomedical scientists ourselves, we know very well that biomedical research discoveries could be achieved exponentially faster if existing BRM from finished projects could be easily acquired to other projects. No such platform exists today. In a typical biomedical project majority of time and funds required, are spent just on the design and generation of requisite BRM. Such duplication of time and financial expenditures is also very undesirable from the social purpose point of view. Connecting the BRM providers with BRM recipients through a uniform and global internet platform, and maintaining of current and ever growing database of available BMR, can quickly become a game changer in biomedical research.

This is an unparalleled risk management tool for movie makers.

The script is the foundation of a movie, we use a proprietary neural network to forecast box-office performance based on the script, before any production decisions have been made.

We predict which of these "startups" has the lowest risk and highest ROI potential. Steel Wool has developed a unique and direct approach to profitably and aggressively combat the disruptive influences that are disintermediating and destroying margins in the music industry.   Under one roof, a company has been created that provides Artist Management, Record Labels, Production, Music Publishing, Touring, Sponsorship and Social Media services.  All the elements necessary  to provide full and a la carte services , to both talent and the fan base, in nimble, cutting edge, and profitable environment that continually encourages creativity

The Opportunity 

High interest rate lenders provide commercial borrowers with loans that fill a borrowing gap between traditional banks and private equity capital providers. These loans are typically 1 – 5 year terms with interest rates of 12% - 18% and $1M - $50M in size. When lenders achieve desired returns earlier than loan maturity, they have a compelling opportunity if they can sell these loans to re-invest their principal into new loans.

Overview of the Strategy 

Global Acquisition Partners Income Fund, LP selects and purchases individual performing commercial and industrial loans from high interest rate lenders. The Fund does not purchase loan pools. Our investment strategy is to hold loans for yield, thereby mitigating the risk or reliance on liquid credit markets. The Fund portfolio pays investors a quarterly income averaging a 12% annual yield. Our investment strategy is simple, effective and transparent. 
 
The loans we select: 1) are secured by the borrower’s commercial assets; 2) undergo strict underwriting criteria with the added benefit of hindsight - the borrower’s loan payment history; thereby, reducing the risk of write downs or loss of principal. 3) $1 - $10 million principal balance. 4) loans to smaller middle market companies with revenue of up to $75 million and from almost any industry from anywhere in the United States. We only purchase loans of socially responsible companies. 
 
What Sets Us Apart

A balanced approach to risk, steady attractive income without volatility from stocks or bonds.  

Our Key To Success

Risk management. The Fund spreads all invested capital equally across the portfolio, thereby, reducing capital at risk of 5% - 10% per loan. We diversify by purchasing loans from many different industries so your capital is never exposed to the risk of any single industry. 

Please let me know if you are open for a 10-minute intro call or would prefer a Fund Summary sent: 
Email: philj@g-acq.com or call (310) 626-0040.

Why We Started This Company   	 THE PROBLEM . . . .    Everyone knows that the 401(k) retirement system has failed Americans. How many people lost their life’s savings, jobs and homes? In the financial crash of 2008-09, the average loss of equity was a devastating 34% for 401(k) accounts. Because most 401(k)s primarily hold traditional mutual funds, stocks and bonds, the financial crash eviscerated 401(k)s. American corporations and employees lost because they were not allowed to move their retirement funds into a safe haven.   	 What Sets Us Apart    	 THE SOLUTION . . . .   The only commodity that did not crash in 2008/9 was GOLD in a RETIREMENT ACCOUNT! Gold can be used in 401(k) portfolios to protect purchasing power, reduce portfolio volatility and minimize losses during a severe market crash. It also offers stability against a shrinking dollar. Without changing the existing plan, gold is finally available to corporations as an option in a 401(k) administrative plan. Gold has already seen a 65% growth since 2009. Help us change America!   	 Our Keys to Success    	 We are passionate. We think differently. Gold is our North Star. We are tested and proven, viable and scaleable. We are pivotal. We can outsource. Until now, precious metals such as gold and silver were never allowed in current 401(k) plans. With this new protective option, retirement funds no longer need to reside in the same old traditional vehicles exenterated in 2008-09. Employers and employees can now protect their hard earned 401(k)s with tangible, physical gold and silver.

Knightscope is developing technology that will predict and prevent crime with an innovative combination of large-scale robotics, predictive analytics and social engagement. 		 		Imagine a friend that can see, hear, feel and smell that would tirelessly watch over your corporate campus or neighborhood, keep your loved ones safe and put a smile on everyone passing by. Imagine if we could utilize technology to make our communities stronger and safer…..together. 		 		Introducing the Knightscope K5 	 	 		The Knightscope K5 Autonomous Data Machine utilizes a combination of autonomous technology, robotics and predictive analytics to provide a commanding but friendly physical presence while gathering important real-time on-site data with its numerous sensors. 		 		Data collected through these sensors is processed through the K5's predictive analytics engine, combined with existing business, government and crowdsourced social data sets, and subsequently assigned an alert level that determines when the community and the authorities should be notified of a concern. 		 		If an alert is pushed, the K5 machine will turn on all of its sensors to not only allow the entire community to review the data, but to contribute important real-time information. Our approach alleviates any privacy concerns, engages the community on a social level to effectively crowdsource security, and provides an important feedback loop to the prediction engine. 	 	 		Knightscope’s quickest avenue to commercialize the K5 technology is in outdoor environments at corporate campuses, shopping centers and with private security companies. Tedious and monotonous monitoring will be handled by the K5 leaving the strategic, “hands-on” activities to security personnel. 		 		Knightscope has also received numerous inquiries proposing a variety of use cases where the K5 would make a positive impact. These offer substantial future growth opportunities in areas including, but not limited to, schools, hotels, auto dealerships, stadiums, casinos, law enforcement agencies, seaports and airports.

There are 5 crucial features within the SAS safety system that will aid in your personal and family safety.

PIPR_Description: Why We Started This Company    	THE VISION: SafeNode Technology Inc. envisions a world where individuals are equipped with pre-emptive / early-warning information and tools that expose threats challenging our lives, and by raising awareness to achieve Peace of Mind. The formulation of advanced technology, trusted threat data, and active community involvement working in concert, is imperative to our safety.   	What Sets Us Apart    	SafeNode, the first comprehensive personal threat solution providing early warning & real-time threat/crime information designed to raise awareness enabling users to make daily location-based decisions to avoid and prevent harm to themselves or loved ones. SafeNode, a family locator threat solution is intended for moms & dads that want to know where their children are and if they are safe, business professionals traveling to unfamiliar cities or locations, and monitoring elder loved ones.   	Our Keys to Success    	SafeNode combines a mobile family locator experience with innovative threat rating technology, based on a proprietary geo-spatial framework and unique threat algorithms that integrate local and state police crime data, all designed to signal users whether an area is safe or unsafe. This innovative, advanced intellectual property will set SafeNode apart from competitors. SafeNode offers a mobile app running on a smartphone or tablet device, as well as, utilizing a complimentary web portal.

We were frustrated with the amount of unwanted advertising seen on our computers and mobile devices. The tracking and profiling of Internet users to target these unsolicited advertisements is unacceptable and a complete invasion of privacy. Rather than use devious means of profiling Internet Users to target online advertising, why not let these Users profile themselves? Then Users will only receive information they are genuinely interested in. Hence, Rewire was developed…
Purpose: Most Internet platforms generate revenue by forcing advertising onto Users, while providing a service that has nothing to do with advertising. Rewire is different, it does not need to force advertising onto Users because its service is already based on advertising. Rewire is the first “User-Demand” advertising platform allowing Users to control advertising. Rewire allows Users to choose the information they wish to receive from their selected businesses and when they wish to view it.

PIPR_Description: We started GiraffeG4 Systems to address a common problem for tall trucks and recreational vehicles.That is their propensity to crash into bridges, trestles, trees, and awnings, and cause expensive damage to their vehicles, and the structures they hit. Invented by a truck driver, we knew there was a need for an in-cab, programmable warning system that could alert a driver if the obstacle he was about to pass under was too low.
Purpose: GiraffeG4 Systems is a one of a kind product. It is the only product in the Heavy Duty Truck Market (7 Million on the road) and Recreational Vehicle Market (300.000 units sold/yr) that addresses the problem of tall vehicles hitting overhead obstacles. It has won several awards as a best"new" product at various Truck and RV shows. It was named as "Product of The Month" in the leading RV Magazine Trailer Life. GiraffeG4 Systems LLC has two United States Patents #8212660 and #8207836.

Life is not a still photo or a six second looping video. Life is motion. Dial is a social media application that allows users to capture and experience that motion like never before. 

Current social media applications lack physical user interaction, users can only view a single photo or watch a short video. There is zero interaction with the content.

Imagine capturing a dog’s tail wagging; If you were taking a photo, you’d never see any motion. If you captured a video, you’d see the dog wagging his tail so quickly it wouldn’t be very meaningful. However, Dial brings the ability to capture and experience motion like never before.

PIPR_Name: ARE Telecom Incorporated dba/ ARE Telecom & Wind
PIPR_Description: ARE Telecom Incorporated is a steel tower and foundation producer for the small wind energy and telecommuncations markets.  A Minnesota-based C-corp, it was founded in 2013 by the founder and employees of its predecessor company, American Resource & Energy, LLC (ARE).  ARE spanned from 2008 through 2013, and focused primarily on serving the small wind power market. ARE Telecom will now serve both the global telecom and small wind power markets with unique self-raising poles and concrete-free foundations as permanent and temporary solutions for growing industry needs.   	ARE Telecom is a specialist in the design, engineering, manufacturing, and delivery of specialized monopole towers for small wind turbines, telecom towers and for other uses where industry standard monopole and tower systems are problematic due to unique geographical and logistical limitations.  Making ARE's products so unique are its patent-protected foundations and pole raising systems.   	ARE has designed, engineered, manufactured and provided its systems to residential, commercial, and government customers around the globe.  The Company designs and engineers products in-house and manufactures them via Valmont, a US-owned ISO 9001 plant with US utility-grade steel. Its products have been used as short-term solutions for sporting events such as the Super Bowl 2013, and permanent solutions throughout the world.   	There is a growing and largely unsatisfied need for towers with portable above-ground foundations and raising systems in the telecom market. ARE Telecom has been created specifically to target the telecom industry with sales and leases of tower and foundation systems as permanent and temporary solutions.   	The Company is the only firm in the industry that offers a complete suite of products including foundation systems, raising systems, and poles. Although ARE Telecom is new to the telecom market, it is an internationally recognized brand name in the small wind power market.

BioHealthonomics Inc. is a clinical stage biotechnology & healthcare company dedicated to developing and commercializing high-impact, effective and side effect free therapeutics that address critical unmet needs in the treatment of migraine headaches, Parkinson's disease and Alzheimer's disease.

The company will develop both a product (histamine dihydrochloride) and a proprietary protocol (patent pending) for the treatment and prevention of migraine headaches, Parkinson's disease and Alzheimer's disease. 

The National Headache Foundation estimates that US businesses lose $50 billion each year because of absenteeism, reduced employee productivity, and medical expenses caused by headaches. (JD Bartleson, Treatment of Migraine Headaches, Mayo Clin. Proc. 1999; 74; 702-708). In the U.S., more than 30 million people suffer from migraines, according to a 2001 report from the Health’s National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke. It is the 12th most disabling disorder in the US.

their journey.

PIPR_Name: Great Neck, NY Luxury SF Construction
PIPR_Description: This is a first lien position loan with a personal guarantee. The project is a cash-out refinance and construction opportunity for a luxury single family property in Great Neck, NY . The developer is midway through construction and has self-financed the project up to this point. The developer currently owns the property free and clear, and is requesting a loan of $550,000 in order to cover some of the costs associated with work that had been already completed and to complete construction of the home for resale. Patch of Land will administer two disbursements associated with this loan. The first will be at closing for $275,000 and the second $275,000 will be disbursed upon evidence of receipts and photographs following the completion of heating, plumbing, electrical, HVAC, foam insulation and substantial sheetrock work. The developer purchased the property with an older existing dwelling for $465,000 in December 2010. He has so far personally paid for the demolition and has used approximately $200K of his own funds to rebuild.   	An independent third party appraisal commissioned by Patch of Land shows an After Construction Value of $1,400,000, which equals an After Rehab Loan To Value (ARV) ratio of 39.29%. This is in line with the data we found during our due diligence process. Due to an appreciating market, the developer estimates a final sales price of approximately $1,650,000 for a Loan To Value (LTV) ratio of 33.33% and in fact is currently listed for sale at this price. Our research shows the residential market in this suburban commuter community outside New York City has been strong recently and currently supports an upward trend in property values. This property is located in the 11021 zip code of Great Neck.

Why We Started This Company    	Nearly 600,000 people will die from cancer in the United States this year. Pharmaceutical Companies are producing the same "me-too" type of drugs that have had virtually no direct impact on the cancer death rate for the past 20 years. OncoStem Biotherapeutics has identified the true cancer genes that initiate an individual's cancer. We are developing a new class of drugs taken by mouth that will treat each individual's cancer in a personalized way without the toxicity of many current cancer drugs.   	What Sets Us Apart    	OncoStem Biotherapeutics is developing novel targeted cancer therapy. Prior targeted therapies have shown varying degrees of efficacy in certain cancer types. We have a unique, proprietary Bioinformatics based drug discovery platform that serves as the source for the development of a whole new class of personalized targeted cancer drugs to be administered by mouth.   	Our Keys to Success    	Experience, passion, fortitude and a new perspective on the cause of cancer and how to go about curing it.

Sanguine is a technology-enabled company innovating at the intersection of personalized medicine, biobanking, and biomedical research. It has a simple and attractive, proven business model. Sanguine collects blood samples and associated medical data from patients diagnosed with specific conditions. It processes those samples to extract biospecimen such as cells, serum, plasma and DNA, and stores them along with the medical data. It then sells the biospecimen and data to academic and pharmaceutical entities for research purposes.   	Problem & Solution: Traditionally, research companies need to wait for physicians to set up appointments with patients and to find some willing to sign up. Patients go to Sanguine because Sanguine offers increased transparency in the research process, showing them where samples are used and how they advance biomedical research in areas they care about.

Geostellar is America’s first and largest online solar marketplace, helping homeowners secure the best deal on solar energy by comparing and tailoring a variety of installation and financing plans. Through advanced simulations on an intuitive social platform, Geostellar lowers the cost of solar, making it more competitive with conventional electricity. The result is more accessible, affordable and plentiful clean solar power for America.   	Homeowners enter an address and the average cost of their monthly electricity bills, then Geostellar’s advanced “Big Data Geomatics” technology presents a clear comparison of the benefits and costs of solar leases, loans and cash purchases.   	For homeowners, Geostellar significantly reduces the cost of solar energy and makes it easier to go solar. Solar energy is the most promising means of lowering utility costs, achieving energy independence and reducing greenhouse gas emissions.  	 	For solar providers, Geostellar reduces the substantial cost of customer acquisition. Solar financing and installation companies can target specific customers based on solar energy production potential, demographics, location and investment risk.  	 	Corporations, non-profits and associations can use Geostellar to create and manage bulk-purchasing solar programs for employees and members.

Suntek invents materials that capture and control sunlight. Suntek’s newest product is Cloud Gel, a unique glazing material that automatically controls the amount of light and heat let in through skylights. It makes skylights less expensive than electric lighting by eliminating air-conditioning costs.    	 Suntek's Low-E is an invisible coating on windows that reduces heating and cooling costs, thus saving 3.7% of world energy - as much as all wind and solar electricity. But it was developed and marketed for 0.1% of their costs. Popular Science magazine called Low-E “one of the 100 most important inventions in the last 100 years.”   	 Currently, skylights are energy consuming, unreliable sources of illumination because the amount of light they let in depends on how bright it is outside. Cloud Gel makes skylights a reliable and practical source of illumination by keeping the amount of light they let in constant throughout the day and from winter to summer. This eliminates air-conditioning costs on hot days, which makes skylight illumination cheaper than electricity. Cloud Gel skylights can be 60% the size of normal skylights and provide the same illumination. This pays for the Cloud Gel, so it is effectively free.

Kricket is a solution to noisy neighbors at universities and apartments.  With Kricket, you are able to anonymously text your noisy neighbor the message, “Please quiet down”, and “Thank you". The message is sent from our Kricket phone number, so you remain anonymous. 

We work directly with universities and apartment complexes. They pre-enroll all of their tenants/students in our service. Then we create a custom digital floor plan of their residents buildings. Residents can select a standardized message, and the message is sent to all members of the neighboring room. Off campus, sign-up is free and we require the user’s email, phone number, and residential address.

We also give the university/apartment complex access to Noise-alytics, a heat map for noise. This allows them to see the messages being sent in real time, and can monitor all the activity without actually getting involved.

We help developers optimize per user revenue in their mobile applications. Our customers are any mobile app developers that want to improve the effectiveness of the offers they make to users in mobile applications.   	Our value proposition is to help developers maximize revenue via automated in-app offer management using predictive/prescriptive analytics.

PIPR_Name: Kissimmee Home in Gated Golf Community
PIPR_Description: This is a pre-funded REO purchase and rehabilitation opportunity for a large single family home located in the gated Remington Golf Club community in Kissimmee, Florida. The property is in need of minor renovations that are mostly cosmetic in nature. As an REO, the property was listed for $169,900 and attracted several offers. After a successful bidding process the developer is purchasing the property for $180,000. In addition, the developer is providing $67,500 (37.50% of the purchase price) as a down payment. The developer is requesting a loan in the amount of $144,000 in order to purchase, renovate and prepare the home for resale.   	  An independent third party appraisal commissioned by Patch of Land, shows an After Repair Value (ARV) of $241,000 which equals a Loan To Value (LTV) ratio of 59.75%. This is in line with the data we found during our due diligence process. However, due to strong market knowledge, the Developer estimates a final sales price of approximately $290,000 for a Loan To Value (LTV) ratio of 49.66%. Our research shows the residential market in this community outside Orlando has been steady in recent months and currently supports an upward trend in property values.

This is a pre-funded purchase and rehabilitation opportunity for a 2 family property in Passaic, New Jersey with a popular development team familiar with the investors on Patch of Land.  The development team of Max Sevilla and Jose Pena are back with another exciting deal. Their last project fully funded within days of the offering.   	This current property is in need of minor renovations that are mostly cosmetic in nature. The developer is purchasing the property significantly below market value for $90,000 (As Is Value of $140,000 gives $50,000 of built in equity) and providing $10,000 as a down payment plus an additional $10,000 for closing costs and points. The developer is requesting a loan in the amount of $135,000 in order to purchase, renovate and prepare the property for resale. There will be two disbursements associated with this transaction. The first will take place at closing in the amount of $112,500. The second will be disbursed upon evidence (pictures and receipts) of a significant portion of the renovations have been completed in the amount of $22,500.   	An independent third party appraisal commissioned by Patch of Land, shows an As Is Value of $140,000. The appraisal also shows an After Repair Value (ARV) of $225,000 which equals a Loan To Value (LTV) ratio of 60%, and is in line with the data we found during our due diligence process. Our research shows the residential market in this community outside New York City has been steady recently and currently supports an upward trend in property values. Further research indicates total market rents of $2400 a month can be achieved after renovations are complete.

The mission of OpenPlacement is to make care transitions easy and to become the primary discharge planning tool of hospitals and Skilled Nursing Facilities in America. OpenPlacement engages patients early in the care transition process ensuring patient choice and reducing administrative work for case managers which equates to time and cost savings.   	Today, when a patient is being discharged from a hospital or skilled nursing facility (SNF), the discharge planner and/or family rely primarily on a stack of brochures, old printed “lists” and hours of phone calls in order to locate care providers that fit the particular needs of the patient.   	OpenPlacement is a real-time information system, which gives patients and families the ability to search in any geography, filter by various needs and availability and contact directly with post-acute care which significantly enhances and streamlines the discharge process.

Wiz Maps is developing unique forecasting models and mobile data mapping technology that fixes the huge disconnect and risk between a property and the surrounding environment, which helps real estate professionals and businesses, with local intelligence and frequently updated growth patterns of critical data like population and income growth. The Problem of Today’s Technology –  Current location search and commissioned based agent models assume two things (1) the buyer knows where they want to buy or invest and (2) by driving around or using stale yearly macro city (or MSA) data, buyers can learn about the local markets.  These false assumptions lead to a long and laborious selling or buying cycle and extreme risk.   	  The Problem of Risk and Lost Opportunities – Current risk models are antiquated, filled with false assumptions, do not take into account local market conditions or trends, and fail terribly. Most critical location-based data is neither online, nor available to brokers or investors, in a usable format.  Businesses need accurate local predictive models, to properly assess todays and tomorrows risk. Without knowing the future and what affects hyper-local markets, businesses and commercial real estate investors, are left uninformed, and the $15 Trillion commercial real estate market in the fog of risk.   	  The Solution is Wiz Maps and the right strategic business partners

Whenever news breaks the Internet is flooded with content. First-hand pictures and videos, reaction, and even intentional lies and propaganda are all published at incredible rates. The information produced creates a firehose too big for anyone to drink from, and without a verification process no one really knows if what they're seeing is accurate or not.   	Grasswire solves this problem by constantly pulling in social media about a chosen topic and displaying the things that are gaining traction in real-time. Users can then collaboratively curate (upvote) and fact-check the content. The Grasswire engine takes their inputs and creates a self-updating, autonomous news source.   	Imagine the Internet forming one giant newsroom, deciding what's important and what's accurate in real-time, and collaboratively producing a thoroughly vetted news website. That's Grasswire.   	Grasswire is the news by all of us.

We are currently in the pre-revenue stage and expect rollout by Q2/2014.   	 Customer Problem   	   California was the first to legalize the medical use of marijuana in 1996 and to authorize dispensaries or collectives for patients to obtain their medicine in 2004. Patients need to get a recommendation (not prescription) from a state certified physician which is usually valid for 1 year.   	  When registering with a dispensary patients have to produce their recommendation along with state issued ID or Driver's License. These are then typically copied or scanned so patients have an easier time gaining access at future visits. The same process has to be repeated with every dispensary the patients want to enter.   	 Business Highlights   	Our focus lies on fundamentally improving the patient experience first and foremost 	There is no cost to the patient 	Plan to join the other 25 companies listed on the OTC within 6 months

Premium Precious Metals LLC (“PPM”) is a precious metals (gold, silver, platinum, etc.) recycler located in Hollywood, Florida.  The Company makes wholesale purchases of scrap metals, jewelry and coins containing precious metals from jewelers, pawn shops, dental offices, other entities and / or individuals (“Suppliers”), exclusively in the United States.   	      PPM weighs, melts into composite bars, assays and pays Suppliers for their product.  PPM then sells and ships each day’s production to a Massachusetts gold refinery which further refines the composite bars into .999 pure bars of gold, which it sells to investment banks / funds, commodities exchanges (i.e. COMEX), sovereign wealth funds, hedge funds, jewelry manufacturers, etc.   	      Recycling of gold has taken place for at least 2,000 years and today is more important to the world's gold supply than ever before.   Recycled gold refers to gold that has been recovered from fabricated products. melted, refined and cast into bullion bars for subsequent resale into the gold market. It accounts for 36% of average annual gold supply.  The predominant source of recycled gold is jewelry in the developing world.  The supply of recycled gold fluctuates year to year and can respond to significant increases in price volatility and changes in economic conditions, in addition to higher prices.   	      The recycling of gold helps protect the environment while helping to fulfill increasing demand for the metal.  Studies note that the toxic substances used which are used to extract the gold from rock in the mining process, including mercury and cyanide, pollutes both air and the water around mining sites.   	      Since its inception in October 2013, PPM has generated over $28,000,000 in revenues and has achieved and sustained daily production run-rates exceeding $250,000 of material.  PPM is a profitable enterprise.   	      PPM is owned and operated by a 30-years veteran of the gold recycling business.

"The King of Vodka"

King Cayuga Vodka is made on a farm with organic local white wheat from the Fingers Lakes and spring water that has naturally flowed through limestone. Through the use of state-of-the-art technology in conjunction with old world techniques, King Cayuga is developing the best vodka in the world.  
 
The Name and Logo

King Cayuga Vodka gets it's name from being produced in King Ferry, NY right next to Cayuga Lake.  The royal logo of a duck fitted with a crown pays homage to the Cayuga Duck, found only in the Cayuga Lake area.
 
The Distillery

The distillery has received Double Gold and an award for "Best Vodka" from the New York International Spirits Competition. Likewise, it produced the alcohol used in the brand that won Double Gold and "Best Vodka" in the San Francisco World Spirits Competition. By using only local organic ingredients, a controlled slow fermentation system, as well as a complex distillation and filtration process that takes place 10 times, King Cayuga is creating the purest and best tasting vodka in the world.

Creating The Vodka

Vodka this good has never been on the market before. King Cayuga Vodka is made with the utmost care and patience, making use of all new technology and machinery. While some vodkas only ferment for three days, King Cayuga rests for two whole weeks in a controlled high-tech tank. This results in a much purer alcohol before it is filtered.
 
Environmentally Friendly

The wheat that goes into King Cayuga Vodka is 100% natural, organic, and local, conveniently situated on the same farm that homes the distillery. Any waste that is produced from the production of vodka is recycled into the farm for use. Also, the bottles are sourced from the fingers lakes area, less than an hour away. These three things cut down on our carbon footprint and help sustain American jobs.

PIPR_Name: Tropical New Construction in the Florida Keys
PIPR_Description: This is a pre-funded new construction opportunity for a large single family home located in the town of Marathon on Grassy Key, Florida. The developer purchased the double size lot on 8/3/2012 with his own funds for $40,000 and recently began construction by using $60,000 of his own funds. In addition, the developer will pay approximately $12,000 in points and closing costs out of his own funds. The appraiser estimates 16% of construction has been completed to date with site excavation, concrete pilings, and exterior walls complete. The developer is requesting a loan in the amount of $140,000 in order to complete construction and prepare the home for rental.   	 There will be 3 disbursements scheduled during the construction period. The first will take place at closing for $40,000, the second for $40,000, and the third for $60,000. Each will be disbursed upon evidence of work performed and verification by site inspection from an appraiser. The terms of the loan allow for the developer to request an extension of up to an additional 6 months beyond the 12 month term (for a total possible loan duration of 18 months), if needed. If an extension is requested, we will charge the borrower 2 points and split the points with investors. Once construction is complete, the developer will obtain conventional financing to pay off this loan.   	 An independent third party appraisal commissioned by Patch of Land shows an After Repair Value (ARV) of $500,000 which equals a Loan To Value (LTV) ratio of 28%. This is in line with the data we found during our due diligence process. Additionally, the appraisal shows the Site Value of $60,000 and an As Is Value with current improvements of $130,400. Our research shows the residential market in this community in the Florida Keys has been stable with supply and demand in balance and currently supports an upward trend in property values. The average list price for this zip code is approximately $650,861.

1.	According to Gallop Poll  security fears are the number reasons people are not using them (55% of the 17,000 surveyed).

3.	According to Fortune " Access to loyalty rewards from brands is the most wanted features from consumers, and it’s the one least integrated in mobile payments today,” notes Forrester Research analyst Thomas Husson, in a recent blog about this topic. Indeed, approximately 57% of U.S. adult smartphone users want access to loyalty programs and rewards through mobile wallets, according to his firm’s ongoing Consumer Technographics surveys.

Then there is Nudipay who has addressed these pain points with Nudipay;

1.	No security issues because none of your identifying information is stored on the app or transmitted to the merchant.

3.	We have two built in loyalty. One from the merchants to their customer and one from Nudipay to our consumers (just like a reward credit card).

We plan to launch in two U.S. cities Denver, CO and Portland, OR.  One of the reasons being that their is a large undeserved market in these two keys cities that can boost Nudipay's launch.  

This is an opportunity to join the revolution when it comes to payment systems, we are not duplicating the others, we are blazing our own trail.

We provide a variety of mini-GPS modules (hardware) that can be tracked anywhere in the world through our database, website, cell phone app, and GPS server. Our GPS module(s) are currently in 3D modeling and prototyping phases with delivery in August 2014. Our GPS server, website, database and phone app is under development and 80% complete. A few of our products and services strategic advantages are that the units have high-quality, low cost, miniature-sizes, and portability to attach to any asset, object, person or pet that needs to be found, tracked or located.   	Our product roll-out plan for 2014-2015 includes all of North America. Our 2015-2016 roll-out includes South America, Europe & Africa. Our 2016-2017 roll-out includes Asia, Australia, and Antarctica with global coverage by 2018.   	We define our market in the consumer & business technology sector including satellite, GPS modules, micro-chip, semi-conductor, internet, WI-FI, with both hardware and software components. The total US consumer electronics technology revenue market size was approximately $203.5bn in 2012, and is projected to grow to $207.7bn in 2014 (U.S. CE Sales and Forecast, January 2014). We currently hold 0% of this market and believe we can capture .01% of market share by FY ending 2014 (approx. $20.8mm). The number of U.S. licensed drivers with keys exceed 210mm ($6.3bn) and registered cell phone users exceed 325mm ($9.7bn).

Each day in the US, approximately 1 billion calls are placed to businesses across the country. But because telephones cannot collect user data, this valuable information about customers — their frequency of calls, their demographic profiles, their social media profiles, and much more — are lost.

Kixie's open telephony service enables businesses and their applications to automate marketing, enhance customer service, and optimize service delivery through deep integrations with CRM, ERP, Marketing Automation Software, and other business applications.

Notizza is the next generation social media site that was built with one goal in mind, to give voice to the silent majority.  To allow citizens of a community to rally behind an idea that most people agree with to then do something about it.  It allows citizens to enter their thoughts, opinions and ideas in a database for everyone to see and vote.  Those opinions that gather the most agreement votes rise to the top of the display and thus indicating the true will of the people.  What makes Notizza different from the competition is the ability to display opinions based on the proximity to the user that entered it.  This allows people to see opinions entered by citizens in their neighborhood, city, region, state and country.  In this manner, Notizza can highlight issues that are affecting citizens where they live.

We are an automotive industry service company that installs, sells, services, and inspects automotive lifts and other equipment like: exhaust systems, oil systems, air systems, tire machines and air compressors. The best part of Automotive Lift Service is that it has been operating since 1986.   For 28 years, Jay Smith the original owner has built a positive reputation and a loyal following in the market place.  Jay's only fault was his ability to hire and expand the business.  Stacey & Lori Mack purchased the company a year ago and have had great success in increasing sales in that short time.  They have hired and trained staff and are ready to expand to a regional powerhouse.   	There are a few small players in this business, but no one has taken a regional or national position.  Located in south central Pennsylvania we are within 400 miles of 40% of the USA population and have the ability to hire, train, and develop quality service people for our customers.   	We have established some key relationships with design groups, dealerships, and manufactures to help us expand rapidly. We recently had a conference call with our large dealership group and was given all five new store projects they are building.  Two have started ground work.  These five stores will total over $1,000,000 in sales and labor for us in the next twelve months.  Also, with our new consignment  relationship with a key manufacture we are launching a retail website and sales group that will take our company to the next level.   	After running negative cash flow the first six months, Automotive Lift Service will be profitable this year.  Even at the mid point we are showing a profit and will be profitable going forward.  Now is the time to join us.

Why We Started This Company  	Mobile game development has been democratized, and indie developers are now able to seize the upside of the rapidly growing $24 Billion industry. But, despite their newfound potential, many indie teams fall short when it comes to marketing. We started this company so we could flip the process, and allow marketing and consumer insights to inform the development of games that are as appealing to the average smartphone owner as they are to the stereotypical gamer.   What Sets Us Apart  	While many game development groups focus primarily on creating large-scale games that sustain millions of users over extended periods of time, we focus instead on leveraging marketing insights and celebrity/brand partnerships to create viral periods of gameplay tied to trending moments in pop culture. Underscoring everything we do is our commitment to developing mobile games that educate, entertain and inspire the 100+ million Americans who play them.   Our Keys To Success   	The core formula for our success is creating games that are as appealing to the stereotypical gamer as they are to the passive smartphone user who only occasionally downloads apps. By building games that appeal to both sides of this spectrum, and ensuring that everyone who plays our games walks away having gained something useful, we feel our games and business will have unique appeal to a growing demographic within the mobile gaming industry.

Pureflection Day Spa & Hair Studio is a company looking to position itself in the mid-to-high end market segment of the $46 billion a year salon and spa service and product industry. This segment has a large vacancy for a national brand, since most businesses in this segment are individually owned or regional operated with only a handful of locations. Currently the low-end market is dominated by national brands, such as Cost Cutters, Great Clips, or brands such as Massage Envy. Consumers in this market segment are looking for high-quality green or organic products administered by highly trained service providers. High-quality green services and brands are the fastest growing segment of this industry. Through our unique strategic partnership with the Aveda brand, our signature training, and synergistic business model, Pureflection will provide consumers the quality of service and products they desire which is currently lacking as an industry standard.   	Pureflection will focus on the development of our flagship Aveda lifestyle salon & spa models. This location will offer salon and spa services from haircuts & color to massage, facials, and body treatments. This location will be approximately 4,600 sq. ft. and generate gross revenue of $750k - $1.5 million with net profit margins of 8-22%. We will position our services as 5-star value at 4-star prices through our use of our VIP membership program, which will provide a more consistent cash flow model than the typical standalone salon and spa model. Additionally, services and guest experiences are positioned to exceed our competitors’ and our clients’ expectations, by providing many low-cost, value-added, complimentary add-ons to our services and experiences. These complimentary add-ons will provide us with a unique selling advantage in the marketplace, and thus distinguish us from the competition.

Tycoon is a real estate crowdfunding platform where people can group-fund real estate deals posted by those looking for capital (for as little as $1000).   	The way real estate investing works today provides a great opportunity for disruption.   	Traditionally, investing in real estate has been expensive. Typically you need tens or hundreds of thousands of dollars to invest, creating high barriers to entry and making it difficult to follow the first rule of investing; to diversify.   	When you hear of a great investment opportunity outside of your area, it is difficult to overcome the risk associated with investing in a new market. Existing investment vehicles like REITs are much like mutual funds, unexciting investments that provide little connection to or pride of ownership in the portfolio of properties. Finally, many existing investment opportunities are exclusively open to the accredited investor, and not the masses.   	Tycoon is here to change things.

Options Away (fka BitBend) revolutionizes the way people research, plan and book travel by providing a level of flexibility not yet available in today's travel booking life cycle. Options Away leverages the concepts and technologies of the financial options markets and applies them to the travel industry; giving consumers the ability to hold a flight for a period of time while they finalize their travel plans. Backed by multiple patents in the airline options space, Options Away markets directly to travel planners with a low-cost item (Option) that can help inspire travel and motivate a buying decision. Partner airlines can sell an option on their seats, thus leading with a much lower cost item than the traditional airline reservation process. Finally, partners such as OTAs, meta-search, travel technology providers and travel planning sites can offer value add via integration with the Options Away pricing and option management system or through the licensing of our patent portfolio.

BuzzBar represents the first time that ice cream and alcohol have been combined into a novelty ice cream treat. .   What Sets Us Apart  	BuzzBar is the only alcohol-infused ice cream bar on the market. The product is all natural and does not contain any high-fructose corn syrup. Seven flavors are currently available with three more to be released later in 2014. Five of the flavors are ice cream dipped in dark chocolate to create a rich thick shell. The other two flavors, as well as the three bars coming later this year, are alcohol-infused, all-natural fruit sorbets that are low calorie, guilt-free indulgences.   Our Keys To Success  	BuzzBar is an experiential product that adds to the fun at a wide variety of entertainment venues including concerts, sporting events, poolside dining, hotels, resorts, movie theatres, bars, and casual dining restaurants. Consumers love our ice cream and sorbet bars infused with just the right amount of alcohol and once they experience it they are seeking to buy it from retailers and through our online store so that they can bring the BuzzBar experience home.

PIPR_Name: Three Property Refi & Rehab in Northern California
PIPR_Description: This is a pre-funded refinance and rehabilitation opportunity for two single family properties plus a 3rd unencumbered property in Sacramento, CA with an experienced developer.   	   Two of the properties are midway through complete gut renovations and extensions while the 3rd property is fully renovated and ready for resale. The developer purchased each of the 2 properties under renovation separately in late 2013 while the 3rd property was purchased months earlier. 148 San Antonio Way(Property #1) was purchased for $345,000 and 2700 Creekside Lane(Property #2) was purchased for $285,000 for a total of $630,000. The developer is requesting a combined loan of $660,000 to refinance out of their current respective loans and to cover points and fees of approximately $30,000. In addition, borrower is paying from their own funds an extra $36,445 to cover other transactional costs and to take out the lending partner.   	   Total combined estimated renovation costs equals $200,738. The developer has already spent approximately $40,000 in construction costs Property #1 and $6,625 on Property #2 (total of approximately $46,625 between the 2 properties) and will spend an additional amount of $154,113 from their own funds for the remaining renovation of the 2 properties, $54,707 and $99,406 respectively. What Sets Us Apart  	  Through its market-tailored web-based platforms, Payment Partners provides a multi-tiered, full-featured, customizable solution for users on both sides of this problem – community-based organizations and their constituencies. PPI products are the only online websites offering different stakeholders separate access to an organization’s parent menu to create their own items, generate their own reports, and have funds deposited to one or different bank accounts for the organization.   Our Keys To Success  	  Pay4Stuff products are the only platforms available on the market today to offer organization leaders:  --The opportunity to customize their menu, control what, when and how their items appear.  --Access for numerous stakeholders--to the same menu for parents--with different logins and revenue streams  --Dozens of subcommittees or organizations from the same institution the ability to provide items on one seamless menu….parents go to one place!  -- Fantastic customer service, customization, features

Ohana is a small business networking site, a "Linkedin for Small Business."  Ohana offers small businesses the ability to connect to other businesses in a B2B social network. We enable businesses to extend their reach to other businesses and build their own ecosystem.  This enables new opportunities for sales revenue, supplier savings, branding, marketing and customer contact.   	Ohana means family and community in the Hawaiian language.  We believe that businesses have their own “family” comprising of other businesses in an ecosystem that is essential for survival and growth.  Ohana provides the right platform in age of social media, connections and engagement for small businesses to leverage and compete.   	What makes Ohana unique is that it enables businesses to build their own network of customers, partners, and suppliers easily, then create opportunities with contacts, introductions, & presales transactions such as quoting and deal management.  Ohana offers more than other familiar businesses such as a classified directory, review site, or static profile page.   Value to businesses continue after an initial introduction with powerful functionality and tools to enable interaction and initiate transactions which can lead to greater revenue and productivity.   	Ohana's massive investment upside lies with organic growth and global markets.  This is unique from other closed CRM systems or current business sites.  With market validation by various SMB organizations as two Chamber of Commerces, a City Economic Development Board, and a private business partner, Ohana is off to a great start starting in July, 2014.
