The opportunity is modeled after corporate giant Cisco who connects the large enterprises with B2B networking.  Ohana connects small businesses and has the vision for massive scale.

Why We Started This Company  	MWR was created to offer excursion rail transportation with an enhanced level of service not currently available in the Midwest. Complete travel packages including lodging, onboard food & lounge service, special events and wine tasting are just a few examples of our ability to create a relaxing getaway. Our restaurant was created first in 2011 to establish a positive cash flow and provide the base for our commissary. Note: We contract Amtrak to pull our train on their own scheduled trains.   What Sets Us Apart  	We offer all inclusive trips to select destinations and meal & wine trains. MWR is the only common carrier of it's kind. All trips are onboard vintage railcars restored with modern amenities and includes at-seat service with wine from the Midwest. Our dining car prepares a unique menu of freshly sliced sandwiches made to order, complete with plenty of hot & cold side dishes. Our lounge service provides live entertainment and both regional and national brands of beer.   Our Keys To Success  	MWR is uniquely qualified to succeed due to the following reasons: Our President has decades of experience in the industry including over 18 years of railroad operations and management, and over 13 years in the food service industry. We are located in Chicago, which is the central hub for Amtrak which operates 56 trains a day on 16 routes which allows for a large market of frequencies and destinations. Our target demographics are high earning, well educated, affluent individuals.

The clothing is meant to show others that they are involved in exercise activity and thus approachable by anyone else wearing a "Workout Bunnie" T-shirt or tank top. Personal funds to set up the website and clothing is already in tow. Sales of t-shirts, tank tops and paid members and advertising will be source of revenue but impossible to accurately gauge until site is up and running. We have a lot of experience in this kind of business and we definitely have knowledge needed to succeed in this niche market. Tixers is changing the way tickets are exchanged.  With Tixers, you can exchange tickets you're unable to use now for tickets you can use in the future.  Ticket holders receive instant credit for their tickets and can use those credits for other sporting events or concerts.  Those who do not have credits on the site can name the game they want to go to and purchase tickets as well.  Millions of tickets go unused each year and Tixers is trying to eliminate this problem.  Tixers is different than competitors like Stubhub because Tixers guarantees some value immediately and is aiming to create a network that allows ticket holders, primarily season ticket holders, to "share" tickets among one another.  Tixers primary customer are corporations and small businesses that purchase season tickets that they often let go unused.  Revenue is generated through processing fees when sellers redeem tickets (similar to frequent flyer mile redemption fees) and on a spread based upon demand.

Why We Started This Company  	  Customer feedback is vital to making a business work. When customers share their story, they’re not just sharing pain points. They’re teaching you how to make your product, service, and business better. Yet customer feedback seems to be an afterthought to most businesses. As a result, only 4 in 10,000 customers currently provide feedback. We started Wyzerr for people like us who want to share feedback regularly with a business but don't want to spend 15 minutes filling out a long survey.   What Sets Us Apart  	  Wyzerr collects more data in a shorter amount of time than any other customer feedback survey out there. It’s a platform that is more consistent with the digital age of today: fun, fast, and easy. By making our feedback process look and feel like a game, Wyzerr can obtain up to 20 detailed answers in under 60 seconds. Aside from our interactive user experience, our secret sauce is the technology. We ping customers with a Wyzerr survey while they are still in the store at point-of-sale.   Our Keys To Success  	  Our team is the key to our success. Wyzerr is made up of a group of innovators whose greatest talent is execution and creativity. We're passionate people that aren't afraid to make sales calls, or pretend to be a singing telegram company delivering flowers in order to get into the offices of the corporations we want to work with (video on YouTube!). We build products that give meaning and importance to the individual voice, ultimately making communities a better place to live in for everyone.

Why We Started This Company  	While watching what was obviously a first date gone bad, friends and I thought, "Wouldn't it be great if we could text her, telling her to ditch her date." For about 6-months, that we're things lie, but then I thought, "OK, sit-down, and take a look at this for real, and see what it would take." The more I thought about this a a business opportunity, and not just as an app, I realized there are many instances where people in a room need a platform to connect with other people, they don't know.   What Sets Us Apart  	Because we looked at this opportunity as a business, and not just an app, we developed a back-end platform, that will allow people to create different types of profiles, i.e. social, networking, career, professional, etc., and use our proprietary search technology to search and match those profiles. We can then create a portfolio of applications, each targeting a different market segment of a population. This creates a pipeline of products allowing us to service more than one customer need.   Our Keys To Success  	The first key to our success if raising the funds we need to build our applications on other platforms, build our team, and new features to our products, and grow our customer base. Growing out customer base is key, because only then, will our customer have reasonable chance of finding someone; leading them to pay our monthly subscription fees.

Why We Started This Company  	 "Pono" is Hawaiian for righteous. What righteous means in the case of PonoMusic and its founder, Neil Young, is honoring the artist's intention and listening to music the way the artists intended it to be heard. Neil and Pono are on a quest to revive the magic that he been compressed out of digital music.   What Sets Us Apart  	 The quality of digital music can be compromised anywhere in the chain from the studio recording until it reaches your headphones or speakers. We at Pono believe that the only way to reverse the drift to poor quality music is to provide a farm-to-table solution with an end-to-end ecosystem. PonoMusic provides a platform for the entire music listening experience - from the original master recordings, to the PonoMusic.com Store, to the awe-inspiring PonoPlayer.   Our Keys To Success  	 Outside of our Community and quality of our Player, our biggest competitive advantage is our visionary founder, Neil Young, who is joined at Pono by his long-time manager and fellow Pono Board Member, Elliot Roberts. This means Pono's reach extends beyond the music labels' vaults to the artists' personal vaults, where a sizable catalogue of studio masters resides. Furthermore, the PonoPlayer is the result of over a decade of effort from some of the brightest designers in the audio industry.

WealthyLife™: Exceeding Common Core Standards with financial literacy fantasy games   	WealthyLife – Finance Made Easy™ courseware is a financial literacy focused multi-platform, multiplayer fantasy game for K12 and Higher Education classrooms. For schools, families, and institutions who are dissatisfied with existing financial education resources, WealthyLife is the only financial literacy gamification edtech curriculum product. It is intended to reduce reliance on instructor financial understanding and complex textbooks with dynamic interactive content that intuitively engages students to heighten understanding.   	Using an augmented reality and human-computer interaction, WealthyLife takes students on a journey from birth to retirement in 20 modules that include Credit Stacker, Whack-A-Broker, Charging Wall Street, and others. Each module is modeled after a Common Core Standard like earning income, budgeting, saving, investing, banking, using credit, mitigating risks, etc.
First lender to do a mortgage loan from start to finish from a smart phone!

StereoVision Imaging, Inc. is a 3D facial recognition company which has developed patented binocular optics and proprietary image enhancement software enabling users to obtain significant improvements in the accuracy and range of existing facial recognition engines.  Our powerful imaging software algorithms work under challenging environmental conditions, indoors or outside,in shade or direct sunlight; the technology works with uncooperative subjects – ideal for covert surveillance.   	We have two groundbreaking products which are ready for commercialization.   	3DMobileID™ is our Wireless Face Recognition Binocular System.  With a range of  up to 200 meters, and weighing less than 2 lbs. – this is a rugged, but light-weight hand-held device.  It is also wireless – so images that are captured are wirelessly transmitted to back-end servers.  The System is Secure, as it uses Military grade encryption for data protection.  The technology is Accurate – delivering up to 40% improvement in image quality, reducing the risk of “false-positive” matches.  And it is Fast – response time < 15 seconds.  This technology has been tested and validated by various agencies within the Department of Justice and the Department of Defense.   	  3DCapture™– is a Real Time, Facial Image Capture, Enhancement and Identification Software system.  It combines our patent pending image enhancement software with almost any fixed surveillance camera system, converting existing 2D face surveillance systems into sophisticated “3D-like” systems.  This technology works with both 2D and 3D surveillance cameras and can handle video streams up to 15 frames/second.  The software is compatible with leading facial recognition engines (e.g., Cognitec, NEC or L-1) and is a cost-effective means of upgrading existing facial recognition technology.  It enables real-time, accurate identification, ideal for Retail Theft Deterrence, Gaming applications, Access Control  or VIP Identification.

Tressa Graves possesses the unique ability to make grown men stink of fear. The characters she brings to life make you feel a distinct familiarity, seeming so real, you believe they will reach out of the book and grab you. Tressa has been compared to such writers as H.P. Lovecraft, Edgar Allan Poe and referenced as the Tennessee Williams of Horror. She weaves entertaining tales where violence becomes harrowing and suspense threatening, slinging guts and gore with the best of the boys. Urban Drones opened its website on December 2011 as a retailer of drone parts, with a ten thousand dollar investment. In the first year of business (2012), with no extra capital injected and zero dollars spent in marketing; sales grew to over $112,000. Without the financial strength to hire employees and an inadequate location to, our growth was unsustainable. So we decided to formulate a plan for sustainable growth and success. We found that the  issue with the drone industry is that there isn't a place where a user can purchase a professional drone that is truly ready to fly. The successful introduction of the DJI Phantom proves that this market aches for solutions that don't require a lot of technical skills to operate. Farmers, surveyor, 3D mappers and the need of many other professionals are not being met. That's where Urban Drones comes in. We have now pivoted to serve a bigger market. Instead of offering parts to the DIY community, we're offering fully ready to fly drones for the agriculture, surveyor, industrial inspection, film, 3D mapping and many other industries. We're curating and integrating new and evolving technologies into fully ready to fly drones. There are thousands of developers creating drone hardware and software solutions. Many don't get traction because their inability to offer these solutions as ready to fly products. We understand the issues that  drone developers face, because they are the same issues we encountered during the development of UrbanDronesOSD (on screen display) and UDLRS (Long Range Control System) By partnering with key developers Urban Drones offers tremendous value to the end user, by pairing the proper hardware and software in a package that is completely ready, for almost every application. Our online store allows professionals to see real life examples of how the technology we offer can be used in their application and a comprehensive list of components like batteries, ground stations and spare parts.

With FitFIT goal tracking tool and fitness point system, members get rewarded and stay focused on their goals while having fun with a closed group of friends or every member within the FitFIT Community via member created games or FitFIT created competitions.

Members can be anyone with access to the internet. Our initial target audience is busy business folks as well as stay at home parents: people that struggle to make it to the gym on a regular basis.

We design and manufacture power and cooling systems for targeted market applications. In particular, we offer direct current (“DC”) power systems, DC hybrid power systems and DC solar hybrid power systems for military, renewable energy, marine, automotive, oil field, and telecommunications applications. Our solutions provide reliable and low-cost energy for applications that do not have access to the utility grid (“prime power”) or will continue to power applications in the event of utility grid failure (“back up”). 

We consider our DC power systems as solutions that integrate a DC generator with automated controls and remote monitoring, all of which are typically contained within an environmentally regulated enclosure. Our DC hybrid power systems integrate lithium-ion batteries and a battery management system. Our DC solar hybrid power system adds photovoltaic and other sources of renewable energy. 

Our business model is to provide a complete solution for our customers’ needs thereby removing our customers’ need for internal engineering and additional consultants and suppliers. We manufacture a majority of the components we use and 100% of the assembly of our products is performed at our factory in Carson, California, in order to control our intellectual property, keep profit margins strong and reduce production lead times. 

A complete business plan will be released to interested investors after signing a non-disclosure agreement. We are willing to review your NDA or you can sign ours.

Trifecta Investment Partners will handle every aspect of the investment process from start to finish.   We do all the heavy lifting so investors can be at ease knowing their capital is in safe hands. Physical store retailers have little idea of who the shoppers in their stores are or what they are considering, prior to purchase. They only know if a shopper bought something.   	 CloudTags solves this by allowing physical store shoppers to create digital collections of everything they interact with via beacon-powered tablets, provided by the retailer. Sales associates can assist shoppers and if so, we track their customer assistance via individualized NFC tags on their badges that they tap on the customer’s tablet. The store and sales associate get attributed credit for sales that are later completed online, if the sale originated in-store. This also enables retailers to properly track and attribute sales across online and offline channels. Here is the example in Made.com: http://vimeo.com/103937106   	 Ultimately CloudTags knows what physical store customers consider and how to re-engage them with content related to those products, via email. We call this method "in-store remarketing."

Purpose   	  100% Organic & US produced Jumbo Shrimp - Self sustained and zero waste. 	  Net Zero AquaLife San Diego will produce the highest quality shrimp organically, in a controlled, closed-loop and environmentally-friendly facility. By combining a patented intensive production raceway system with proven sustainable technologies, Net Zero AquaLife will consistently produce organic shrimp of superior quality and quantity at a low cost of production. The project facility and systems are scalable, replicable, and due to their closed loop configuration. The “carbon neutral” cluster model is self sustained from an energy and water consumption perspective and all waste is recycled.   	 Customer Problem   	  The U.S. currently imports over 91% of its seafood. Half of these imports originate from outdoor aquaculture “farming” programs in Asia and Latin America. Unknown to the consumer, these imported products, as well as the main portion of the US based shrimps, are susceptible to disease, contamination, pollution, pharmaceutical substances, and a host of other impediments to food safety. In addition, many of the antiquated shrimp farming and marine harvesting approaches degrade the fragile coastal environment in which they are located. Developed and developing markets around the globe will benefit from finding a means to source reliable, organic, and sustainable seafood.   	 Business Highlights   	100% compliant to leading organic food chains and organizations 	100% Organic while very profitable 	No waste, No water consumption, No energy consumption - high profitability

Over 99% of the shrimps in US, are susceptible to disease, contamination, pollution, pharmaceutical substances, and a host of other impediments to food safety. Developed and developing markets around the globe will benefit from finding a means to source reliable, organic, and sustainable seafood. This is what we deliver.    	What Sets Us Apart   	Innovatively combining state of the art commercial super intensive shrimp production and clean tech solutions to responsibly, economically, and profitably meet the growing demand for organically grown, locally-sourced and Non GMO seafood. We do this while emitting no waste or pollution and not consuming any water or energy.    	Our Keys To Success   	- Green labeled shrimp and 100% organic jumbo shrimp (everything found in the US today is labeled Yellow or Red). - No waste, 100% energy sustainability with no water consumption (closed loop). - Environmentally friendly and highly profitable. - Break even after 4 months operation. - World class team and management from Harvard, MIT, Virginia Tech etc.

It all began with a book. When co-founder Ivana Lo Stimolo had finished reading Anne Fogarty’s Wife Dressing, The Fine Art of Being a Well Dressed Wife she couldn’t help but feel a special connection to Anne. While certain parts of the book have a vintage flair about them most of the advice dished out is still very much valid today. Anne’s opinionated views of fashion, attention to detail and use of quality materials resonated greatly with the Milan native. 
After a few discussions about the book and Anne’s design career with her partner Greg Halvorsen it wasn’t long before he had scooped up the rights to the Fogerty label. By September of 2013 Anne Fogarty, Inc was once again a registered corporation in New York with it’s headquarters less than a mile away from Anne’s original atelier. By January the company had both a design team and a production agreement in place. 
The new Anne Fogarty collection will not follow the traditional fashion calendar but will be offered in 6 mini capsule collections over the year; one every two months.  The reason for this is it allows more flexibility to meet changing consumer patterns and creates a certain level of urgency: buy now or you will not find it later.  It also provide the opportunity to introduce more unique collections, such as a holiday dresses in November or summer dresses in July.  
The mini collections will be sold on line via proprietary editorial content, such as our own magazine.  The fact that Anne Fogarty was relevant and designed for over three decades provides a wealth of material for publishing and marketing purposes.  The online store will be incorporated into the published material instead of a traditional online store format. To compliment the online sales the company will look for a brick and mortar partner, such as a department store or national apparel chain.  The partnership could be exclusive so as to provide a seamless experience for the customer between online and in-store shopping.

The idea of Alyeska Hermitage Ownership is a new lifestyle accommodation, an adventure opportunity included wellness with the mission to make people healthier and happier while on vacation. It will create the first luxury tree house resort in the wilderness of Southcentral Alaska. Visitors seeking for adventure and relaxation shall forget the stresses and strains of everyday life and simply ease their souls.
Recognized for its premium fixtures, iconic wildlife set to the backdrop of the stunning Alaskan landscape, including lake and river scenery, and a location surrounded by the Alaska Range with views of Denali (or Mount McKinley) - the highest mountain in North America the Alyeska Hermitage WildernessStay is an all-season abundant playground. Thoughtfully designed in keeping with traditional architectural forms and built with uncompromising attention to detail, every aspect of making your adventure vacation an unforgettable experience has been considered. Varied for all types of adventure-seekers and nature lovers, our guests can enjoy exhilarating mountain biking, river rafting tours or action-packed sport fishing, to name a few of our offered adventures. The landscape is picturesque for the nature photographer and during winter ultimate heli-ski in the Tordrillo Mountains is offered. Take part in romantic sled dog trips or get the heart racing during exciting skiing tours on the historic Iditarod Trail.
As an extraordinary treehouse resort, the Alyeska Lodge  should not only become the very first choice for remote wilderness lodging in Southcentral Alaska, but more importantly resembling a “home far away from home” for its visitors, encouraging them to happily return. In this regard, guests have the opportunity to gain ownership of a single treehouse on a vacation ownership basis.  In this context, the project is referred to as Alyeska Hermitage Ownership.

“Help stem the flow of attacks!”, “Help shorten the detection gap of each breach!”, “Help detect our data being stolen before it goes out”, “Help keep attackers from returning", "Help restore consumer trust through our policy”, "Help increase value of all these millions of $ of tools bought that are still being bypassed, hourly" 

Pragmatik IO is past completion of the prototype that’s meant to complete an actual response to these Industry challenges. Our methodology is the missing link to the defense-in-depth strategy of active-defense. To respond with as much force exerted by an attacker is turned back onto them in equal force, similar to the Japanese Aikido martial art. Every CISO over the past twenty years has asked for the above answers to make business operations better. We are finally delivering our game changer, after all you have the right to fight-back within your digital backyard and private property.

Our network security system sits between each endpoint across the network, shifting your IP driven user workstations and endpoint devices throughout the network. “Akin to the constantly moving Grand staircases at Hogwarts the school for wizards in the films, Harry Potter". Attackers never before have been confronted with a Gauntlet placed before every possible point and strep across a victim enterprise. They will fail to understand the enterprise is gaming them just like the 'street corner hustle of "cup & shells game" where our instrumentation is the hustler and the network devices are our hustle. An attacker will never be able to predict where a device will appear next... crippling attacker tools fundamentally designed around static targets for over two decades. Attackers will be unable to map your networks, maintain covert connections, or spread across the network with the ease afforded to them for over two decades. Our network security engine Cyberflage(tm) will protect networks by making the advance of the attacker unbearable.

PIPR_Name: 74 Mead St. Single Family Fix & Flip
PIPR_Description: This is a prefunded purchase and rehabilitation opportunity for a single family home in Newark, New Jersey. The developer is purchasing the property for $60,000 and contributing a down payment of $25,000. The developer is obtaining the property through a Sheriff’s Sale and title will be delivered free and clear. The property is in need of renovation in order to prepare it for resale. The renovation budget is estimated at $65,000. The developer is requesting a loan in the amount of $118,000 for the purchase, closing costs, renovation costs and reserves. The developer typically finds end buyers quickly as evidenced by the 51-53 Cedar St and 469 Avon St projects currently under agreement, and has expressed confidence in putting this project under contract promptly.   	An independent third party appraisal commissioned by Patch of Land shows an After Repair Value (ARV) of $210,000 which equals a Loan To Value (LTV) ratio of 56.19% and is in line with the data we found during our due diligence process. Our research shows that the residential market in this community outside New York City has been stable recently and currently supports an upward trend in property values.

URH2 is a Renewable Energy Integrator specializing in landfill gas to energy and low-pressure hydride fuel cell technology.  URH2 hydrogen production is patterned after the DOE’s BMW South Carolina factory project and the DOE’s California Tri-Gen distributed power generation systems.  URH2 will produce and market renewable hydrogen and low-pressure hydride fuel cells.  Urban Renewable H2, LLC (URH2) URH2 was established to address the growing markets of hydrogen and fuel cells.  The initial focus will be on forklifts and related material handling applications.  The market for fuel cells and hydrogen is experiencing high growth. With the recent advances in new technology, URH2 is able to take advantage of a unique opportunity to produce and market renewable hydrogen and low -pressure hydride fuel cells.  The DOE recognizes the need for research, development, and demonstration of the emerging waste -to energy -technologies.   	Investment funds find the rapid growth of waste-to-energy market attractive. As well as a way to mitigate volatile energy markets using Power Purchase Agreements. There is a heightened public and private sector interest in utilizing waste as a feedstock renewable energy. There is a steady supply of credit worthy customers helping to fuel the growth as well. Renewable Energy Sources, such as landfills or wastewater are the only fully sustainable “end-game” for clean "green hydrogen" since they offers multiple benefits when compared to other alternatives, such as fuel diversity, high level of energy security, clean and low greenhouse gas production emissions.  URH2 has the ability, technology and people to do that.  Waste to energy has become a high priority for Fortune 500 companies, as well as the DOE & DOD.   There are 600+ Landfill possibilities, and 1000 wastewater projects in US alone, 2000 landfills worldwide.

Parrable is a revolutionary mobile advertising platform with a proprietary, cookie-less tracking system (IP filed) that empowers advertisers for the first time ever with enhanced targeting, retargeting, and attribution on mobile web.  Parrable's technology is disruptive to mobile advertising in its use of data to find, buy, engage, measure, track, and personalize messaging to consumers on their mobile devices.  This innovative technology can enable programmatic trading on mobile web, allowing new levels of efficiency in the industry and driving revenue for both the buy and sell side of the digital advertising landscape.  Parrable's Hawk API is a highly scalable product based upon Parrable's robust technology foundation that can easily be integrated into any existing advertising platform and publisher's mobile site.   	Not only does Hawk allow attribution, targeting, and retargeting capabilities it does so in a non-invasive and consumer friendly way.  Any information our tracking methodologies collect is first party information provided by people - at no point do we buy personal information through 3rd parties or collect Personally Identifiable Information (PIIs) such as names, phone numbers, or emails.  Not only that but we believe in absolute transparency not just as a buzzword but as a business model.  We allow anyone to go on our privacy page and not only see exactly what information is linked to their mobile device but we offer them the ability to change that information or opt out of our tracking system forever.  We believe that when people see that we truly only collect information that makes their mobile web experience more personal they will enthusiastically opt in and tell us more about what they like, but our opt out is easily accessible and it works.   	What all this means is that through our proprietary tokening technology we can finally offer advertisers programmatic mobile buying.  Our method is more accurate than cookies, less invasive than cookies, and works across publishers enabling a more personalized and relevant experience for consumers wherever they go.  Its not just better for the consumer - our tracking offers levels of actionable marketing insights to the industry and brand advertisers that have never been seen before in any advertising space - not just mobile.  we don't just believe that this technology will disrupt the mobile advertising world - we believe it has the potential to disrupt the advertising industry on every level, and change the game forever and for the better.

FlixChip Corp. (FlixChip.com) has created the first global entertainment media specifically designed for use with the nearly 1.5 billion mobile devices in the world.  This proprietary and disruptive innovation is called MuviChip™, and it enables consumers to watch entertainment on their smartphone, tablet or computer without downloading, streaming, or managing storage space.  MuviChip fills the void left by traditional physical media and current digital solutions in an increasingly mobile world.

MuviChip is a one-of-a-kind USB drive that contains a DRM (Digital Rights Management) protected file of a movie.  Only MuviChip delivers a fully portable and accessible entertainment experience to the mobile consumer without the limitations of DVD, Blu-ray, downloading and streaming.  The movie on MuviChip can be played on almost any mobile device, and movies purchased on MuviChip are added to the consumer’s digital library.

FlixChip Corp. has also developed ChipTab™ and Muvifi™.  ChipTab connects MuviChip directly to virtually any mobile device.  Muvifi is a wireless media hub that creates its own secure local wireless network and transmits the content on MuviChip to up to five wireless devices simultaneously for independent playback.  Muvifi does not require an internet connection.  MuviChip, ChipTab and Muvifi make entertainment truly mobile - anywhere, anytime, on any mobile device, even when internet connectivity is unreliable, congested, expensive or nonexistent.

FlixChip Corp. made the strategic decision to launch the MuviChip ecosystem using theatrical blockbusters from major movie studios because it’s the most effective and efficient way to achieve a critical mass of consumer awareness, education and adoption.  The company is also actively pursuing domestic and international commercial partnerships with telecoms, automobile manufacturers, consumer electronics manufacturers, airlines, and global consumer brands for the use of its technology.

Emerald City Beer Company (ECB) is fanatical about creating the Seattle Lager—a style, culture and taste that is Seattle beer.   	Across America, the craft beer industry is flourishing!  Washington State, most notably Seattle, is a top 5 craft beer market  that is under supplied with local lagers, ranking 11th as a state in breweries per capita.   	Most beer served in the US today is a lager style, pilsner, however, most craft beer is focused on ale styles.  Ales are a flavorful and bold contrast to lagers, but are certainly not intended to be crisp & easy drinking like pilsners. ECB makes craft lager beer for those who want it all, flavorful & easy drinking!   	ECB primarily targets the young and social crowd, individuals with an active social life, and often stressful professional life, who frequent a wide range of venues for entertainment including, restaurants, bars, sporting events, concerts, outdoor activities and various community events.   	ECB has some exciting goals for the next year! We currently offer a year-around lager, and two of four planned seasonal lagers. Our year-around lager is the only style available today in 16oz aluminum cans. The plan for the next year is to release the final two seasonal lagers and put all four of the seasonal lagers into cans. We'll then release a variety pack of ten 16oz cans that includes all five different beers styles and 4-packs of the individual style when in season.   	ECB currently contracts the large production batches of beer with another local craft brewery in Western Washington. This allows ECB to better focus resources on building demand for our beers, instead of investing in supply assets that make them. In the next five years, we aspire to reach 15k barrels of annual production, qualifying us a regional craft-brewery. At these production volumes, it'll make sense for ECB to either sell it's brands to a larger brewer, or to build-in it's own facility, so to recapture the production margin for our investors.

Revenue for the trailing 12 months from August, 2014 was $444,700 with an average of 72 units per month sold.  With an objective of capturing 5% of US and 2 ½% of World market within 5 years, WCTG is seeking $300,000 in convertible debt to purchase inventory and support sales, marketing and other working capital needs. IP protection has been secured with patent pending status in 85 jurisdictions.  US patent issuance is expected in early 2015.  RHYNO is UL Certified for North America, PSE for Japan, Hemologation for Israel and is CE for Europe.
The market for the RHYNO is the estimated to be 1M designated 1ST Responder and law enforcement vehicles in the US, and 4M worldwide.  At an average price of $750, the estimated worldwide market is $3B. 
Competitive tools like the fire axe and manual or reciprocating saws are crude, unwieldy and dangerous.  Many users despise them.  RHYNO has received excellent market acceptance with 1,400 tools currently in-use in all 50 US States, all 10 Canadian Provinces and 3 Territories as well as 29 other countries in Europe, Asia, Middle and South America and Australia.
The management team consists of the founder/owner, Al Vangura, along with a seasoned group of sales, marketing, accounting, design and legal professionals.

We are a small boutique mining consulting firm assisting small to medium size mining companies structuring their operations to reach the export markets. We offer technical, commercial and financial support. Our holistic approach allow us to package solutions that meet requirements of the off takers. Due to the inherent conservative nature of large corporate companies, they do not extend themselves to take supply side risk.  On the other hand the miners being new do not have the banking support to collateralize on payment instruments when they sign contracts with steel mills. This leave many miners seeking high and low for bridge funding (purchase order funding) to service contracts. As we understand the risk and management of these deals, we are in a unique position to profit from these transactions  provided we can provide the purchase order funding. By supporting the miner we can offer a full service deal structure for the end buyers, similar to then they buy from large mining companies.   	This involves our company taking the Letter of Credit from the end buyer and processing it, to extend an LC to the miner, an LC to the shipping company and then control all payments based on delivery of tested and cleared minerals to a free trade zone where we can take title to the product in smaller volumes while paying the miner based on smaller volumes delivered. This provides oxygen to the miner and allow them to work with us to manage the delivery of large contractual volumes that they otherwise would not be able to service. Once we have 90% of the minerals under our name we call the vessel which implies a 20% mobilization fee. Once the vessel is loaded, we can claim the buyers full LC. This purchase order funding approach can generate 10 to 30 USD/MT depending on mineral type. Based on 35,000 to 100,000 MT per month resulting in revenues streams in excess of 350,000 USD/shipment.

Full-sized, lightweight, and portable kayak that can be folded into a compact case.   	 In recent years, kayaking has become an ever increasing past-time, not just for extreme sport enthusiasts, but for everyday individuals. Women and men of all ages have picked up the sport as a true hobby. While the market has grown significantly in recent years, a major drawback to the kayak has always been its portability. A full sized kayak measures ~12ft in length and can weigh anywhere from 30lbs-80lbs. For individuals without access to a large vehicle or expensive attachments, the thought of transporting a kayak is complicated; that's where Oru Kayak comes in.   	  Fueled by his love of the great outdoors and inspired by an article covering the art and science of origami, Oru Kayak's Founder and CEO, Anton Willis, began sketching ideas for a portable and lightweight kayak that could offer the functionality of a full-sized kayak but be easily transported and stored when not in use.   	  Willis initially performed user tests on countless prototypes in varying conditions including bays, lakes, rivers and oceans.  He then developed a working model, brought experienced talent on board, and launched Oru Kayak to the public.

PIPR_Name: 943 N Lombard Ave. Oak Park, Illinois
PIPR_Description: This is a purchase and rehabilitation opportunity Patch of Land has committed to prefund the week of September 22nd for a single family residence property located in Oak Park, Illinois. The loan term is 6 months and is expected to be listed on the market in about 3 months. The developer is purchasing the distressed property for $233,000 and will place $67,000 towards the down payment, which equals a 29% down payment on the purchase along with other fees and closing costs of $18,440. The developer requests a total loan amount of $336,000, of which $166,000 will be allocated for the purchase and $170,000 will be allocated for renovation, disbursed in 3 equal draws. The first draw will be disbursed at escrow signing, the second after a predetermined stage of construction, and the third after completion of the full renovation.   	An independent third party appraisal commissioned by Patch of Land shows an After Repair Value (ARV) of $539,000 which equals a Loan To Value (LTV) ratio of 62.3% and is in line with the data we found during our due diligence process. The developer believes he can get a sale closer to $590,000 which equals a Loan To Value (LTV) ratio of 57% due to the additional 959 square feet being added by upgrading the basement of the house.  Our research shows that the residential market in this community outside Oak Park, Illinois has been stable recently and currently supports an upward trend in property values.

Why We Started This Company    	 The partnership of Whispering Dove and AccoladeBrands was formed one night while drinking and enjoying a very pricey Napa Cabernet Sauvignon. The intensely fruit forward taste of this fine wine turned south on us as we calculated how many hours of work we had to put in simply to afford that wine! This epiphany led us to take our significant wine industry experience, and look for great sources for grapes from vineyards that have critical acclaim and status. That night Whispering Dove was hatched.   What Sets Us Apart  	 The Whispering Dove winery was founded with the purpose of returning to the California wine lover both quality and perspective. When purchasing Whispering Dove, you will be afforded the same advantages of an ultra premium, cult quality, Cali wine without the disadvantage of subsidizing a wine producer’s extravagant lifestyle. Rather than pay for airplanes etc., Whispering Dove drinkers will pay for the finest grapes, grown in in the best micro-climates and produced by the finest winemakers.   Our Keys To Success  	 Whispering Dove works with the finest winemakers, consultants and vineyards to deliver a cult quality wine that is somewhat more affordable than more established names. We are a lean producer, without the capital investment of winery and vineyard to add to the pricing of our wine. That being said, our wines start at $55 per bottle and go to $75. Comparable wines from some of the same vineyards sell for $85 to $350.

Cruzu is a new class of "consumer middleware" that adds domain expertise to in-venue purchases. Instead of us relying on the relics of brands and advertising to influence our purchases, Cruzu helps us easily find the best products and prices within a category by applying deep product knowledge, personal preferences and machine learning to venue inventory and pricing.

Our reference vertical is wine. As a user sits down at a restaurant, Cruzu has read the list, analyzes product quality, identifies wines similar to the user’s favorites, finds values and creates customized advice. Other examples include an Uber-like wine club that leverages the entire US retail system and optimizes for value, personal fit and the minimization/elimination of fulfillment costs. No longer will 300 million people be confused or gouged when buying $250B of wine. 

Both the native Cruzu app and API are in beta, and our roadmap includes support for third parties to provide advice for other categories.

Why We Started This Company    	Mobile game development has been democratized, and indie developers are now able to seize the upside of the rapidly growing $24 Billion industry. But, despite their newfound potential, many indie teams fall short when it comes to marketing. We started this company so we could flip the process, and allow marketing and consumer insights to inform the development of games that are as appealing to the average smartphone owner as they are to the stereotypical gamer.   What Sets Us Apart  	While many game development groups focus primarily on creating large-scale games that sustain millions of users over extended periods of time, we focus instead on leveraging marketing insights and celebrity/brand partnerships to create viral periods of gameplay tied to trending moments in pop culture. Underscoring everything we do is our commitment to developing mobile games that educate, entertain and inspire the 100+ million Americans who play them.   Our Keys To Success  	The core formula for our success is creating games that are as appealing to the stereotypical gamer as they are to the passive smartphone user who only occasionally downloads apps. By building games that appeal to both sides of this spectrum, and ensuring that everyone who plays our games walks away having gained something useful, our games and business will have unique appeal to a growing demographic within the mobile gaming industry.

Zipline Green exists to provide eco-friendly technology and transit solutions that innovatively meet the current demands and sustainably co-create  the future development of our client communities.  Our patent pending Oasis Smart Guideway™ is an infrastructure bridge between developed areas which incorporates transportation, power generation, power grid extensions and storage, pipelines, and high speed data access—in short, all the resources communities need to develop and flourish.  As an added bonus, it powers itself and is managed by a  single, proprietary digital control system that operates both the Oasis Smart Guideway™ and the integrated components.   	For the past five years, we have self-funded the research, case studies and patenting processes.  Our patent applications were filed in the US and with the World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO) in December 2013.  In May 2014, we received notice that we have passed our first test: WIPO found over 20 aspects of our invention to be unique and patentable!   	Several developing nations have pledged to invest approximately $200 Billion into green energy infrastructure.  Preliminary discussions with several potential client communities has resulted in responses ranging from “we would be interested in this technology immediately” to “would you consider selling the intellectual property outright?”  Given this commitment, there is long-term demand for Zipline Green solutions.   	We are seeking $500,000 in angel funds to cover our startup.  The design and development phase for our Smart Guideway software will then require $19.7 million to complete.  In return for this capital, we are offering stock in the company.  Based on feedback from potential clients and forecasted project financials, we feel confident in stating that our investor’s stock will be worth nearly $55 million within four years and we believe our investor will be able to exit the company in five years, should they choose to do so.

The company that I’m raising money for (owned by my holding company Aisling Enterprises, LLC) is GreenSpace Enterprise Technologies.  GreenSpace is a hardware/software suite aimed at enterprise organizations looking to gain more insight into their facility utilization.  For example, Company A has facilities around the globe.  They currently send a person with a clipboard up to each floor 3 times a day to try to gauge how often rooms and desks are used, how many people are using the rooms and try to derive utilization rates from that information.  Obviously, this leaves much to be desired.  What about if someone just left the room?  Or, what if they just entered the room after the clipboard carrier just walked past?  How do we know if they used the projector or flat panel display?  They gain no insight into that information.  GreenSpace will allow them to see which rooms are used, when they are used, how many people are in the meeting (in the event 2 people are consistently holding down a 20 person conference room, etc.), and will allow them to shut down a projector or flat panel remotely in the event no one is in the room thereby saving energy and projector lamps.  The big seller is the ability to use the metrics on the back end.  Facility managers now have complete visibility as to how, when and where their space is used.  They can even see if the projectors and flat panels are being used.  There will be no more guessing as to how many meeting rooms are needed and what size they will need to be.  There will also be little debate as to whether or not they need more displays.  Once they have the utilization rates of all of that in front of them they’ll be able to make informed decisions.

Why We Started This Company    	FlixChip Corp. was founded with the intention of developing a global entertainment media specifically designed for use with the nearly 1.5 billion mobile devices in the world. The Company’s proprietary development is called MuviChip, and it enables consumers to watch entertainment on their smartphone, tablet or computer without downloading, streaming, or managing storage space. MuviChip fills the void left by DVDs, Blu-rays, downloading and streaming in an increasingly mobile world.   What Sets Us Apart  	MuviChip is a one-of-a-kind USB drive that contains a protected file of a movie. The movie on MuviChip can be played on almost any mobile device, and movies purchased on MuviChip are added to the consumer’s digital library. FlixChip Corp. has also developed ChipTab and Muvifi. ChipTab connects MuviChip directly to virtually any mobile device. Muvifi is a wireless media hub that creates its own secure local wireless network and transmits the content on MuviChip to up to five wireless devices.   Our Keys To Success  	Consumers are increasingly reliant on mobile devices for entertainment. DVDs and Blu-rays simply aren't compatible with today’s mobile devices, and downloading and streaming only afford a satisfying experience when a high speed network is readily available. It’s frustratingly difficult to simply watch a movie on your smartphone, tablet or laptop when you’re outside of your home or office. FlixChip Corp. has solved all of this by creating a new media that doesn't require an internet connection.

I've always wanted to be a business owner and couldn't believe I had the Aha! moment. I want to offer people affordable housing at great prices to expand to other park investments.   What Sets Us Apart  	 As an accountant I'm all about the numbers. I have a lot of drive who is a workaholic (which drives my husband and family nuts), I want to succeed very badly. In fact I have to do it, this is my one shot at paying college tuition, student loans, our mortgage, and getting a good nest egg for the future. I'm tired of living in debt working for someone else who lives in a mansion. I don't want a mansion but I do want to prove I can be a success and help my family.   Our Keys To Success  	 I was a young single mother who put myself through college. As soon as I got my first job, I bought a fixer upper home and spent five years sweat equity myself repairing and fixing it. I was able to double what I paid for it and rolled that over to pay off a lot of debt. I'm a person that you can't tell me I can't do something, because I always try to prove you wrong. In addition to my personality, I am a Corporate Controller with 14 yrs of industry experience and my MBA.

B2B potential: The data obtained, because it is real (mph, kph, rpm) is very valuable and the first of its kind. Additionally, we have developed subscription models for teams (high school and collegiate) and tennis academies.    Competitive Landscape   	At a high level - we are creating the first and only tennis sensor that offers:   	1.  Instant data through an on-board screen   	2.  Real stats (kph, mph, rpm)   	3.  Completely tennis agnostic hardware and social community   	4.  Standalone training device with a smartphone enhancing the experience, rather than a requirement   	5.  Professional coach/player endorsement

In the U.S. alone, consumers spend $100B on medical images. A single MRI might cost $3,000, while an X-ray might be $200, and the average is $1,000 per medical imaging study. And we do 100M studies every year in the U.S. Around 20% of these are unnecessary repeats that occur when one hospital or institution can't share the images with another. That's $20B each year wasted in the U.S. alone. Insurance companies are starting to take notice, and demand better access and sharing of patient medical records, and medical images are some of the most expensive, highest value records. In addition to hospitals and payers, we see a large market for image sharing in clinical trials. Drug companies and device manufacturers use imaging to measure the efficacy of their drugs and devices, and that imaging data needs to be collected, shared, reviewed and stored for FDA review. In addition to those two large markets, Imaging Centers, Private Practices, and Patients also represent a sizable market for medical image sharing.

What Sets Us Apart  	While everyone is in the direct-to-consumer market with DIY Smart Home solutions of connected devices, IOTAS is working with Real Estate Developers to create a subscription based Smart Home solution focused on Millennials in Multi-Unit Dwellings. What Sets Us Apart  	  Gideen is the first market mover allowing every user to buy into the future music income of a specific song/recording. That enables Music Supervisors & Co to personally participate on the revenue upside of a music deployment in film, tv, computer game, brand commercial etc. We also introduce a new and simple "all-you-can-eat" price model and shortening "time2deal" from weeks to under 2 minutes. Our Keys To Success  	  Groundbreaking new business model, aligning economic interests between music makers, music marketers and music users. 25 years in business managing music catalogs and realized revenue uplifts up to 7,000 %. BiologicsMD is an early stage, therapeutic research and development company focused on developing highly-targeted therapies that possess strong anabolic properties, and that are used to restore or develop cortical and trabecular bone in severe bone disorders, spinal fusion procedures and complicated bone fractures.   	Despite current surgical techniques and advanced surgical hardware, further clinical advances are needed to reduce the number of incomplete unions, provide faster fracture healing, and greatly reduce the need for secondary interventions and additional surgeries. The company is initially focusing on spinal fusion surgical procedures to aid in the complete fusion of the targeted vertebrae, which currently has only a 70-75% success rate with the first surgery.   	BiologicsMD’s lead program is a patented, recombinant fusion protein (PTH-CBD™) that has a proven and potent profile in bone osteogenesis, and is being developed to facilitate spinal fusions in degenerative disk disease and reduce the number of incomplete fusions (pseudarthrosis). PTH-CBD™ is a unique biological fusion of the active sequence of teriparatide (Forteo®, Lilly) which is approved for treating severe osteoporosis, and a collagen binding domain (CBD), which is a component of the targeting sequence for a collagenase/XIAFLEX® (Auxilium) and is approved for Dupuytren’s contracture – both Forteo® and XIAFLEX® are FDA approved drugs.   	One of the unique features of the the product is that it can be delivered with any bone matrix material applied during the fusion procedure and will provide sustained osteogenic/anabolic effects that last greater than 6-9 months with a single application. In addition, based upon recent preclinical data, the targeting effect provided by the CBD component of the therapeutic delivers the product to type l collagen, thereby limiting systemic concerns – a problem observed with daily injections of teriparatide (Forteo®).

CollegeScoutingReports.com (“CSR” ), a leading edge web-based information resource whose goal is to provide high school student-athletes, their parents and high school coaches with unbiased information on every 4-year U.S. college sports program.  Each CSR College Scouting Report (a “Report”) is a professionally prepared profile that delivers unique analysis and content combined with a comprehensive compilation of available information on one particular college program, its coach, and its team and also provides comments from former student-athletes regarding their athletic experience in particular and quality of life in general at the college for student-athletes.   	 With college costs swelling and the competition for admission to the most select institutions escalating, parents have zealously pursued athletic scholarships or the perceived edge that a top athletic résumé can bring. A CSR subscription should become a “must have” for these students and parents as well.

The British company Perftoran West Ltd was widely successful after Perftoran, it's artificial blood product, was approved in Russia, Ukraine, Kazakhstan and later, Mexico (where it was sold as Perftec). In order to comply with GMP manufacturing and globalize, we have established a new company in the US; all IP (patents, data, know-how) and licensing rights belong to the new company, where operations & manufacturing are now under the direction of an experienced US team. There has always been a critical shortage of blood worldwide; as the population grows & ages, that shortage will grow. Many people outside of the US are told at the hospital to get friends & family to donate blood but it often arrives too late, and there is no inventory on hand.  Perftoran (to be rebranded as Vidaphor, meaning life-bearing) is completely artificial; it is not hemoglobin based. It does not need to be matched to blood type, saving time & resources; its use virtually eliminates the risk of viral transmission (not all countries screen donors to the extent that we do in the US) and unlike blood, which expires in 4-6 weeks, the shelf life of Perftoran is 3-5 years when stored frozen; adverse reactions, some of which are very serious and can result in lengthy hospital stays and even death can occur following a blood transfusion, while there have been very few serious reactions reported after more than 30,000 exposures.  The majority of recipients of Perftoran (88%) have had very good results; mild to moderate adverse reactions have occurred in 4% of recipients, the majority of which have been transfusion reactions (flu-like symptoms, flushing).  Our first market is Mexico, where we will relaunch the rebranded product; thereafter, we will expand throughout Latin America under mutual recognition agreements with Mexico.  In 2005, the market for whole blood was valued at >$7B.  We also have 3 other products whose potential market sizes are equal to or surpass that of artificial blood.

HUBB Filters, Inc. ("HUBB" or the "Company"), formerly known as Lifetime Oil Filters, Inc., has developed and patented a disruptive technology that has the potential to revolutionize the motor oil filtration industry, which serves 1B passenger vehicles and more than 50M heavy equipment vehicles globally. The industry, which generates at least $10B annual revenues, has not materially changed in 40 years and is characterized by minimal product differentiation and lack of innovation.   	HUBB provides an exciting development in a market that is ripe for disruption. The Company has already successfully deployed and piloted their 5 inch filter for light trucks and vans and will be ready to deploy their 3-inch consumer oil filter and industrial 13.5-inch filter in first quarter of 2015. These filters differ significantly from the traditional oil filter: they increase oil flow to the engine by 5x that of a traditional oil filter, they are 99% efficient in removing contaminants of oil (compared to 52% with traditional filters), and their increased engine performance helps reduce emissions by up to 30%. The oil filters can be used over a vehicle's full lifetime and thus pay for themselves (cost breakeven is often realized in as little as 12 months). The product also enables the potential elimination of the 400M oil filters that are discarded every year and millions of gallons of oil that ends up on our roads and in our waterways. The Company offers a strong IP portfolio, an experienced management team, and a high potential for the disruption of a large and established market.

PONTiS Orthopaedics has developed advanced systems to simplify difficult orthopaedic surgeries – and improve resulting repairs.    	PONTiS’ mission is to develop and commercialize innovative systems to improve upper and lower extremity orthopaedic surgery. Our unique stainless steel cable and crimp technology simplifies and speeds the surgery, provides repair options not previously available – and produces a repair with higher strength.  	FDA has cleared our initial application – flexor tendon repair in the hand/finger – and we expect clearance for biceps, Achilles and other tendons and ligaments shortly. Our fundraising will provide resources to commercialize these systems in the US and internationally   	Tendon repair is challenging surgery, especially with today’s less-invasive techniques. Tendons must be intact to allow joints to flex and extend actively. Due to natural tension, the ends of a severed tendon become separated by a gap – preventing healing.  	The suture-based techniques currently used by orthopaedic surgeons to repair a tendon gap have not advanced in over 30 years – requiring multiple suture-passes through the tendon fragments and complex knots to produce a repair with sufficient strength for healing, and may later elongate, re-forming a gap.  	The PONTiS system is strong, prevents a gap from developing and simplifies the procedure   	1. Our system is easy to learn – simple, straightforward, reliable and reproducible results. 	2. Peer-reviewed medical journals document that a PONTiS repair has higher strength with reduced tendency for repaired ends to separate (reduced elongation). 	3. The PONTiS system is a practical solution to difficulties surgeons have accepted in suture-based repairs for over 30 years.

The Opportunity   	 A seasoned team of industry professionals and successful entrepreneurs is building on decades of experience to bring revolutionary, highly profitable change to the world’s largest interconnected business sector: telecommunications. BetterWorld Wireless (BWW) is a mobile provider that believes in the transformative power of people and technology. We donate a free phone or tablet for every new customer via our global nonprofit partner network, with the goal of providing pathways out of poverty to people in need.   	 And the best part is consumers can switch to us and save money while aligning their spending with their values: 94% of customers save when joining us. Our goal is to make change irresistible.   	 The Model   	 Mobile Virtual Network Operators (MVNOs) like Virgin Mobile, Credo, Kroger, and Ting comprise the fastest growing segment of the telecom industry. Instead of investing resources into building out costly network infrastructure, MVNOs focus on marketing and customer acquisition. This niche is projected to triple in the next five years, to $80B in the U.S. BWW leverages the Sprint network to ensure world-class service, and differentiates our offering in the commoditized mobile marketplace with our unique Phone for Phone™ program, disruptive usage-based pricing, robust industry expertise, and exclusive partnerships.   	 The Approach   	 BWW targets an underserved audience by focusing initial efforts on the 1.6M U.S. nonprofits, representing 10% of the workforce and GDP. BWW does this via an exclusive launch partnership with TechSoup Global, the world’s largest technology distributor to nonprofits: $4.5B in goods to 250K U.S. organizations.   	 We are moving beyond this initial base by reaching out to conscious consumers via social media and online marketing, aggressively pursuing B2B clients through personal contacts and telesales, and working with multi-national NGOs (i.e., UNICEF, Save the Children, CARE) to market to their supporters.   	 Phone for Phone™   	 BWW works with a global network of nonprofit partners to distribute phone and tablet donations, with a focus on women and youth in need. Partners provide training, reporting, and ensure phones are kept and used vs. sold. Phone recipients send thank yous and share updates, and benefactors receive personal thank yous and impact reports, humanizing the impact on a one-to-one basis.

SupportPay is the 1st automated child support payment platform that enables parents to share child expenses & exchange child support/alimony directly with each other.

In the US, there are 55 million parents that live apart. 39 million exchange over $200B/yr in child expenses & child support/alimony. (most hear about the 16M who don't pay) Globally there are over 298M parents who exchange $900B/yr. After a parent has an order, there has been no standard way for parents to manage this conflict ridden process. Since child support is not just a single monthly payment but also a broad collection of shared expenses (medical, education, childcare, etc) parents must continually manage, communicate & negotiate over these expenses. The process is complex, time consuming & stressful. 

SupportPay eliminates child support conflict providing both parents transparency while saving time & money. Parents can now spend less time managing child support & more time raising happy, healthy children.

FUELogistics has developed an advanced crude oil upgrading and pre-refining process that is specifically designed to tackle the difficult task of upgrading some of the most problematic crude oils found throughout the world. The Low Profile Fluid Catalytic Cracker, nicknamed the LP-FCC, is a transformational technology that opens a new era of operational flexibility, making crude oil upgrading at or near the well-site an economical and profitable reality.

For over 65 years, large Fluid-bed Catalytic Cracking (FCC) technology has been used in complex refining operations to convert low grade crude oils into more valuable petrochemicals and motor-fuels such as gasoline, diesel and jet fuel. Until now, with only minor improvements, conventional FCC technology has remained relatively unchanged. Our LP-FCC now challenges the status-quo by introducing a new and innovative modular design that cost 60% less to build than a comparable FCC unit. It’s much smaller footprint and multi-reactor process delivers higher operating efficiencies and profit margins, while also providing a clear competitive advantage because of its economical ability to scale down to smaller operations.

From an investment standpoint, what sets this particular opportunity apart is that our supply chain of raw materials (crude oil) is in abundance and contractually secured, our LP-FCC production process will be ready once construction is completed, and every drop of product we produce can be sold at top dollar to downstream refineries. In addition, we have the top petroleum engineers and management team in place, the project has been approved by all state and federal regulatory agencies, ground has already been broken and the initial foundation laid. 

What more could you ask for in an investment? We invite you to take part in America’s energy boom and join our team and efforts to help bring this technology to the world and our nation to energy independence.

Imagine discovering gold in wastewater.. Applied CleanTech (ACT) converts sewage into an economic asset with €5 annual yield per capita.   	After successful installations in North & Central America and Europe, we are entering our next round of investment, and offer you the opportunity to join Applied CleanTech and become a part of the success.   	Now you can invest in the only known company that developed and implemented a proven technology that mines cellulose from wastewater, an endless untapped source of cellulose, transforming it into profits.  ACT is the first sewage mining company in the world to convert wastewater into a valuable resource, while producing a dual source of income – sales of the recycling system itself, and a recurring revenue stream from the process’ recycled by-product.   	ACT’s patented technology is the only known technology that automatically recycles cellulose from wastewater in commercial facilities, thus reducing unwanted sludge by up to 50%. The unique Sewage Recycling System (SRS) mines the cellulose from raw wastewater, recycling and processing it into a clean, pasteurized, environmentally-friendly product called Recyllose™ (recycled cellulose).   	This Recyllose™ provides ACT with an additional high-margin and recurring revenue source as it is a valuable commodity that is attractive to a wide range of industries. Recyllose™ is a cellulose replacement used in plastics, insulation, pulp & paper, construction, bio-fuels production, and more.  This is a highly valuable commodity with a global market and demand, which exactly meets worldwide tightening regulations on wastewater treatment and sludge disposal.   	In addition to the revenues from the Recyllose™, the SRS technology offers further operational and environmental benefits:  •Reduces plant operating costs & energy consumption by up to 30% •Increases plant capacity by up to 30% •Reduces GHG emissions and carbon footprint   	Join our momentum as we jumpstart the sewage mining revo

PIPR_Name: 1902 Victorian Style Family Estate renovation in Cary, IL
PIPR_Description: Patch of Land is offering a purchase and renovation opportunity for a beautiful Victorian style dwelling in Cary, IL. This property is located within the pastoral Trout Valley located 49 miles northwest of Chicago. The loan term for this project is 9 months.   	 The Hertz family originally built this property back in 1902, where two Kentucky Derby horses were trained. More recently it has been a private preschool. The Developer is renovating this property back to a single-family residence to sell when completed.   	 The developer is purchasing the property for $135,000 and requesting a new loan in the amount of $320,000, which will cover the purchase, holding costs and a renovation budget of $219,360.  Patch of Land will hold approximately $29,200 for an interest reserves account to cover the monthly mortgage payments for 9 months of the loan. The construction budget of $219,360 will be disbursed in 3 equal draws. The first draw will be disbursed at closing of escrow; the second and third disbursement will be released after rehabilitation goals have been met.  Approvals for each draw will be based on reports generated by our third party inspectors and clear title rundown.   	 An independent third party appraisal shows an As Is Value of $180,000 and an After Repair Value (ARV) of $596,000. *Please note: After the appraisal was completed, the borrower decided to build a 2-car garage instead of the original plan of a 3-car garage. Thus, using the line item adjustments derived by the appraiser, our Underwriting team has re-adjusted the ARV to $591,000 to properly reflect the change in value. This revised appraised value equals a Loan To Value (LTV) ratio of 54.15% which is in line with the data we found during our due diligence process.  Our research shows that the residential market in this community currently supports an upward trend in property value.

This is a refinance and renovation opportunity for a two-family property in Jersey City, New Jersey. Patch of Land is committed to prefunding the loan which is expected to close on November 21th.   	Due to time constraints, the developer recently purchased the property with transactional funding for $105,000 and an additional assignment fee of $50,000 for a total purchase price of $155,000. The developer put $46,000 as a down payment for the purchase and has a current payoff amount of $111,565. The property is in need of $88,500 of renovations throughout the property. The renovations are expected to be completed in 12 weeks. The developer is requesting a loan in the amount of $212,500 to refinance out of his current loan, complete the renovations, and prepare the property for refinance. There will be 2 disbursements associated with this loan. The borrower will receive the $168,000 at closing to payoff the existing loan and begin renovation. The second draw of $44,250 will be disbursed upon the completion of the renovation. The borrower will then seek to refinance into a conventional loan within 6 months and hold the property for rental income.   	An independent third party appraisal commissioned by Patch of Land shows an After Repair Value (ARV) of $425,000 which equals a Loan To Value (LTV) ratio of 50.0% and is in line with the data we found during our due diligence process. Our research shows that the residential market in this community outside New York City has been stable recently and currently supports an upward trend in property values.

Deep Reason lets you ask questions in plain English about any webpage or file it has ingested and get exact answers back. Can you imagine being able to ask almost any factual question about all of the content on the internet ?   	  Let's say you wanted to ask "Who is the father of the killer of Abraham Lincoln ?"   	  Deep Reason would return the answer "Junius Booth" with a snippet of the text where the answer was found (eg: Wikipedia). The Deep Reason system is able to scale to terabytes/petabytes making all of human knowledge more accessible beyond mere surface level keyword searches.   	  Imagine being able to ask complex questions about all of the content on the internet, and not just surface level questions like those on Wolfram Alpa, SIRI, Google. Questions about fictional subjects are possible as well. For example "Who was born on Tattoine and is telepathic".

FUELogistics has developed an advanced crude oil upgrading and pre-refining process that is specifically designed to tackle the difficult task of upgrading some of the most problematic crude oils found throughout the world. The Low Profile Fluid Catalytic Cracker, nicknamed the LP-FCC, is a transformational technology that opens a new era of operational flexibility, making crude oil upgrading at or near the well-site an economical and profitable reality.   	For over 65 years, large Fluid-bed Catalytic Cracking (FCC) technology has been used in complex refining operations to convert low grade crude oils into more valuable petrochemicals and motor-fuels such as gasoline, diesel and jet fuel. Until now, with only minor improvements, conventional FCC technology has remained relatively unchanged. FUELogistics' LP-FCC now challenges the status-quo by introducing a new and innovative modular design that cost 60% less to build than a comparable FCC unit. It's much smaller footprint and multi-reactor process delivers higher operating efficiencies and profit margins, while also providing a clear competitive advantage because of its economical ability to scale down to smaller operations.   	FUELogistics is a mid-stream crude oil upgrader and has targeted Utah's oil rich region in the Uinta Basin to begin its initial push into the mainstream of the refining industry. In so doing, it is solving a major land-lock and transportation challenge that has plagued oil producers of heavy and viscous crudes for decades. From an investment standpoint, what sets this particular opportunity apart is that our supply chain of raw materials (crude oil) is in abundance and contractually secured, our LP-FCC production process will be ready once construction is completed, and every drop of product we produce can be sold at top dollar to downstream refineries.   	What more could you ask for in an investment? We invite you to take part in America's energy boom and join our team and efforts to help our nation become energy independent. We have the top petroleum engineers and management team in place, the project has been approved by all state and federal regulatory agencies, ground has already been broken and the initial foundation laid, now all we need to succeed is your support to bring operations online and make our financial projections a reality.

iFunding (http://www.ifunding.co) is the joint creation of William Skelley and Sohin Shah. William joined his hedge fund that invested in companies that fit the theory of disruptive innovation, both public and private. One of the investments the fund made was in a company called CircleUp, the largest equity crowdfunding platform in USA which has raised over $23MM in venture capital money to date.   	While working for Dr. Christensen's hedge fund, William realized that real estate industry was ripe for technological innovation, enabling individual investors and smaller institutions to participate in a wide range of investment deals, through an online marketplace offering comparable financial terms to those offered to the most wealthy in the past. We like to say that "iFunding is democratizing the real estate investment process."

Why We Started This Company  	I started the company in 2002, because despite being told that I was good at my profession there seemed to be a glass ceiling that was difficult to break. My success was directly connected to my work ethic and passion, something that is often not possible in a corporate setting. All of this led to us creating Aquavert.  What Sets Us Apart  	Our innovations enabled us to develop a new sanitizer for consumer and commercial use that kills 99.99% of harmful bacteria and viruses. The Aquavert sanitizers are 120 times more effective than liquid bleach, but as safe and gentle to humans as simple saline water. We are the first company in the USA to get an EPA Certification for a cleaning and sanitizing application using our process. We aim to give consumers a better alternative to clean with than to use harsh chemicals.  Our Keys To Success  	The keys to our success begins with being unique and better than our competition. That simply means that we have to be willing to explore unchartered territory and ignore our detractors. What we've accomplished thus far has only been made possible because we were willing to go beyond where others have failed. Next we have to focus our energy on being a low cost producer in order to maximize our earnings in a competitive industry. Lastly, we must educate the consumer about our unique brand.

Swag’r has found the way to make advertising to mobile social consumers successful.  Swag’r embeds promotional offers from businesses into simple engaging activities for consumers on their mobile phones.  These activities allow people to enjoy capturing, sharing, trading, challenging, and competing with their social networks while receiving discounts, fun events, prizes, or loyalty rewards.  Swag’r’s activities are inherently mobile, social, and targeted because Swag’r has a powerful idea:  Consumers gather in predictable locations at predictable times as a predictable demographic. And when they do, they engage in predicable consumer behavior, with their social networks, and on their mobile phones.  Swag'r places targeted offers right in the center of these consumer concentrations. The result is opt-in engagement between the consumer and advertiser.
