Why We Started This Company   	Armory began as a small fuel oil dealer. What we realized, however, was that our competition relied heavily on market pricing from the wholesalers within their own geographical market. Many of these smaller firms failed to hedge their oil cost throughout the season. We knew that we could find a way around this problem to increase our margins and remain competitive throughout the region.   	What Sets Us Apart   	Many small firms exist to provide Home Heating Oil (HHO), diesel fuels, and gasoline. These firms are generally five-man, single-truck enterprises that are heavily reliant on their local fuel wholesalers, who often times form an oligopoly of necessity. These small firms lack the equipment and people to source and store fuel from a wider network of wholesalers. Armory seeks to develop a highway fleet and storage facility to allow the sourcing of the most competitively priced fuels. Our management has a background in futures contracts and appropriate hedging strategies in the fuels industry, and we plan to leverage this experience to widen our margins upstream.   	Our Keys To Success   	Armory's ability to utilize a highway fleet and on-site storage means we can purchase fuel at an unbeatable price point from anywhere in the region. Our size and prepayment practices will make us eligible for discounts that smaller firms simply cannot access. This translates to the most competitive price point for our customers.

Vendigi's patented-protected method for harvesting digital audiences along with exclusive and proprietary relationships with the source of Real Estate data - brokers, Multiple Listing Services (MLS) and top tier property data companies allow Vendigi to offer digital audiences currently unavailable. MLSs are the backbone for 80% of all real estate transactions. Vendigi provides a complimentary platform to the MLS for real estate brokers to monitor consumer engagement with their listing content. The platform demonstrates the marketing value of the MLS to their customer, the real estate broker. In return, Vendigi granted exclusive access to harvest and monetize broker, buyer and seller audience data. 

Once harvested, advertisers (The Home Depot, Wells Fargo, Time Warner Cable, etc.) that offer services around home purchase/ownership pay for Vendigi's digital audience data. The audience data when used in online campaigns allow advertisers to put their ads in front of the right person (home buyer, seller or owner) at the right time (financing a home, buying a home, selling a home, just moved into a home, remodeling a home, refinancing a home, large equity in a home, etc.).

Vendigi is the first to harvests broker and agent digital audiences from their source system, the MLS. This allows advertisers (Zillow, Trulia, Realter.com, etc.) with products and services aimed at real estate professionals the ability to target these audiences as never before. Advertisers pay Vendigi for this audience.

This is a purchase and rehabilitation opportunity for a 3 family property in Newark, New Jersey. The development team is an experienced duo with extensive experience in real estate and community redevelopment whose last five projects also funded with Patch of Land. The borrower is an experienced real estate investor who has funded a prior deal with Patch of Land. The developer purchased the property for $150,000 and is contributing $30,000  (20%) towards the downpayment. Additionally, Patch of Land has also obtained a personal guarantee from the developer.   	The developer is requesting a loan of $345,000 in order to purchase, renovate and reposition the property for resale. The property is in need of extensive renovations. Due to the Developer's knowledge of the area, the property will be converted from a 2 unit dwelling into a single family residence in order to achieve the highest and best use return on investment. The estimated construction budget is $225,000. There will be 3  equal draws  of $75,000 associated with this loan. The first will take place at closing. The second will take place upon approved permits for "roughed in" work (electrical, plumbing, etc.) by the city of Chicago. The final draw will take place midway through the finish work phase (paint, trim work, doors, etc). Site inspections with written reports showing evidence of completed work and title rundowns will be completed prior to each draw.   	An independent third party appraisal commissioned by Patch of Land, shows an After Repair Value (ARV) of $587,000, which equals a Loan To Value (LTV) ratio of 58.77% and is in line with the data we found during our due diligence process. Our research shows the residential market in suburban Chicago has been strong recently and currently supports an upward trend in property values.

PIPR_Description: D3 Unified Communications, LLC (D3UC) is dedicated to providing a Cloud-based, White Label Phone and Unified Communications platform for technology Value Added Resellers (VARs) and Managed Service Providers (MSPs) that serve Small and Medium Businesses (SMBs). D3UC’s offering allows these companies to brand Phone and Unified Communication services under their own name. This gives these vulnerable companies the ability to compete with the larger Technology Providers (also known as Verizon, Comcast, Cablevision, etc.) who are selling competitive services to the VAR and MSP customers. By engaging with D3UC, these companies will shift their sales model from capital driven revenues to managed services revenues, keep their customers, and generate recurring monthly revenue with profit margins of up to 100% and profitability of up to 200%. From the White Label Reseller’s success, D3UC will generate a steady and increasing stream of recurring revenues and annual profit distributions for their investors.

Starter Rocket, Inc. is a design  and production company focusing on entertainemnt and educational ventures. Founded by Scott Alderman, Starter Rocket, Inc. is not only dedicated to launching it's own ventures, but looks to partner and consult with others start-ups. Simply put, Starter Rocket wants to be the booster that launches project into orbit.

First up for Starter Rocket, is the never-before-seen ice spectacle, Armageddon On Ice (see  Products and Services for detail). AOI is designed to play secondary markets in mid-size sports arenas with an average capacity of 6,000 seats; these markets mirror the markets of the American Hockey League (AHL) and the East Coast Hockey League (ECHL). Together, these two leagues draw over 9,000,000 fans annually, and we plan extensive marketing and outreach campaigns to build brand awareness in advance of the shows.

By avoiding large seat arenas and major markets, and not carrying the big cost of name bands and ice performers, we are able to produce a show that is reasonably priced, and designed for growth. We estimate that we can keep our ticket price to $30 for our first tour cycle, and that we will need roughly 2,700 people per show to break even. We believe we can exceed those numbers, and that, with merchandise sales and sponsors, we can be profitable in our first year. 

We are planning a showcase event at the DCU Center in Worcester, MA in November 2015, and a 10-show leg in spring 2016 in the Northeast and Midwest. Our goal is to be global by 2017, and to present approximately 50 shows annually.

Why We Started This Company  	Lodging challenges at sports & entertainment events are a common occurrence for event attendees, corporate guests, workforce staff, and even event producers themselves. Whether these challenges are due to overwhelming demand because of the nature of the event or limited supply due to the geographic location of the event or just the result of event organizer room blocks that artificially restrict supply, all of these pain points can force prospective user groups to stay far from an event location or discourage them from attending an event at all.  What Sets Us Apart  	Our answer to this problem is to create pop-up hotels to provide a convenient & flexible portable lodging & hospitality solution to temporarily increase hotel room inventory at major sports & entertainment events, conferences, and conventions. Utilizing our portable G-pod™ hotel units – a comfortable & all-inclusive living area built out of an expandable shipping container – we can set up a hotel village within a few hours on a parking lot, in a field, on a beach, or virtually any other surface, ensuring that our village will be in the desired event radius.  Our Keys To Success  	Our team has extensive experience managing high profile international sporting & entertainment events, such as the Olympic Games, NFL Super Bowl, NCAA Men's Basketball Final Four, just to name a few, as well as world class sports stadiums & entertainment facilities such as NRG Stadium, BBVA Compass Stadium, and the 8th Wonder of the World Houston Astrodome/ We have also spent the past two decades developing an extensive network of deep industry contacts & relationships and we believe the combination of these factors is a major strategic advantage for our company, as our team understands the industry landscape and unique lodging & hospitality needs & challenges of events firsthand, and we know the key industry players and decision makers.

SparkStarter Pitch - Changing Online Dating Using an Age-Old Concept:

Dating is Difficult.  A while back I was having a tough time with dating and a friend helped me out.  He introduced me to one of his Facebook friends that he thought I had a lot in common with.  A long story short, within a few years of a first date, that girl became my wife.

This story originated the idea for SparkStarter, a mobile app making it easier to play matchmaker for your single friends.

I’m Tony Kramer CEO and Founder of SparkStarter.  We took the common concept of meeting through a friend and put matchmaking into a mobile app.  SparkStarter is a place where we encourage everyone (even those in a relationships) to join and play matchmaker for single friends.

How does SparkStarter work?
1.	Login through Facebook
2.	Decide to play matchmaker for friends or search for yourself
3.	After browsing matches, vote up to notify the user
4.	Once both users show interest in each other by both voting up, they are allowed to send a message to each other

The online dating market is competitive.  We will win in this market because we are focuses on a target audience that often gets overlooked – the friends of single people.  By engaging friends to help out, we believe we are tapping into market of online dating that currently doesn’t existing.

After 4 months of beta testing, we have 500 users that are using the app on average 8 minutes per day with over 2.5 million data points collected.  We’ve are averaging about 30 matches (page views) per user a day.

SparkStarter’s mobile app will be available on Google Play as well as iTunes coming January 2015.  We are seeking an angel investment of $250,000 to help grow this disruptive product in the online dating space.

SparkStarter  - we didn’t invent the concept of meeting through a friend, we just made it easier.

The concept for AVACEN, which is an acronym for Advanced Vascular Circulation ENhancement, grew out of research to help those suffering from chronic migraines.   	We found a thyroid treatment protocol that was raising core body temperature using T3 hormones which produced the unexpected benefit of relief for migraineurs.   	Thus began the quest to understand core body temperature manipulation. This led to published research which described a process whereby putting the hand in a slight vacuum while applying heat to the palm could transfer that heat into the circulatory system thereby influencing core body temperature.   	We later discovered that continuing to infuse heat into the circulatory system after the body reached normothermia produced some widespread and exciting results.   	Trying to understand why no one had previously made a similar discovery, we came to realize that, except for the intentional creation of hyperthermia to treat cancer, the primary purpose for infusing heat into the circulatory system was to move hypothermic people to normothermia. Therefore, when the body reached normothermia, the job was done and there was no need for further warming.   	The Company's recently patented AVACEN Treatment Method (ATM) continues infusing heat into the circulatory system at normothermia. The result is: the body works to dissipate this unwanted infusion of heat by pumping warmed blood through deep tissue, to the heat exchange capillary network throughout the body. This increase in microvascular circulation results in significant benefits for multiple medical afflictions.   	Our AVACEN 100 is a patented, FDA cleared Class II medical device that noninvasively uses ATM to increase microvascular circulation. The AVACEN 100 is currently FDA cleared as a heat therapy device for the temporary relief of minor muscle and joint pain and stiffness; the temporary relief of joint pain associated with arthritis, muscle spasms, minor strains and sprains; and muscular relaxation. We are working with the FDA to extend this clearance to include fibromyalgia and migraines.

PIPR_Name: Brighter Horizons Career Services, LLC dba MyResApp
PIPR_Description: Brighter Horizons Career Services, LLC provides both recruiting services for hiring companies and career services for job seekers. Hiring managers can take advantage of our recruitment services in the Healthcare, Industrial and General Office sectors. For job seekers, we create resume and cover letter writing and provide career workshops.   	Additionally, our MyResApp combines recruiting and technology to help high school, vocational and college level students find internships, entry-level positions, volunteer work for graduation and scholarships within various organizations.   	My Resume Application combines recruiting and technology together to help high school and collegiate level students who are seeking internships, entry-level positions, volunteer work for graduation and scholarships within various organizations.  We are able to offer staffing services to companies who hire entry level students or graduates.   	MyResApp’s overall mission is to connect students with opportunities through the digital platform that would enable them to gain working experience potentially leading to full time employment within organizations. While striving to build lasting relationships between the community and organizations seeking to hire entry-level workers.   	We expect to create a platform that would help decrease the percentages in homelessness for teenagers and young adults. We are striving to build a platform that gives 16-24 year olds an opportunity to retain experience in a working environment. Even if they don’t attend college after high school they would still have work experience to put on their resume to get an entry-level position. We are doing this so that college students or graduates can get their foot in the door in an organization and continue to grow within that company. We are doing this to help training and educational institutions put more emphasis on the importance of career services. And making sure that their students are prepared for the work environment.

I, Dominick Treccariche, plan on opening LS Plasma Donation Center (LSPC) in Lee’s Summit Missouri.  With the research that we have done and with the contacts within the medical community it apparent that there is an extreme shortage of plasma in the Kansas City area and throughout the United States.  By opening this new center LSPC will be able to provide at the beginning approximately one hundred and fifty to one hundred seventy five units of plasma per month to our local community within the first year.  By year four we will be able to provide five to six thousand units year and by year ten upwards of fifteen thousand units of plasma not only to the Kansas City area, the United States and even throughout the world.   	The main target audience for donators will be from the age of 18-40.  With the secondary target being of the ages 41+.  All donators will be compensated for their donation.  The current compensation package is $25.00 for the first donation and $35.00 for each additional donation thereafter.   	The current market value for one unit of plasma is set at $900-$1200 in the local Kansas City area.   	Plasma is a necessary part of the medical field that is only produced by the human body and cannot be synthetically reproduced.  As the population increases so does the demand for blood and plasma.  It is safe to say that the future of plasma is only going to grow and the demand increases each and every year. We are currently seeking a business loan for the amount of $840,500.00 to cover the startup expenses to include remodeling, equipment, first 5 months salaries and expenses.  We are confident that within the first 6 months of business the company will be profitable due to the high need of our product.

Why We Started This Company   	C-Bond is a disruptive innovation. A patent pending game changing technology product that protects property, save lives and will create jobs around the world. C-Bond is a non-toxic, water-based "green" nanotechnology liquid developed at Rice University in Houston, Texas that increases the strength & flexibility of glass up to 250% and creates an invisible protective safety barrier that is resilient to high impact force and severe threat environments.   	What Sets Us Apart   	C-Bond is the only scientifically tested and commercial proven nano-technology product available on the market that penetrates beneath the glass surface to significantly increases the strength and flexibility of the glass unit; dramatically increasing the safety and protection levels of the glass system. and enhances the safety and protection levels of the glass system. C-Bond is the only bonding agent to pass National institute of Justice Ballistic tests for multiple threat environments.   	Our Keys To Success   	C-Bond will brand itself as the standard for "best practice" and excellence in all window film installation. C-Bond will provide a low cost alternative to expensive brand name safety glass replacement at a fraction of the cost. C-Bond will focus on commercial strategies that include technology licensing, product distribution and the the sale of international and domestic territories.

Why We Started This Company  	Demand for bandwidth is growing exponentially due to the shift towards VoIP, Video and Cloud Computing, especially so for Small & Medium sized businesses (SMB). Commercial and residential customers are underserved by incumbent wire-line providers regarding the stability and overall quality of consumer-grade connectivity such as Comcast and Uverse. SMB tend to not plan far enough ahead or stay put long enough to make fiber connectivity work for them.   	Fixed-Point Wireless connectivity has a sustainable quality advantage over Comcast and Uverse (it is fiber-quality and works great for VoIP and video) and has a sustainable competitive installation time advantage over fiber ... QxC's "Signature-to-Signal" is 3-5 days vs. 3-6 months for fiber. QxC also has our own VoIP platform which allows us to be cost competitive with Comcast and Uverse in head-to-head proposals.  What Sets Us Apart  	Fiber quality service, sustainable Signature-to-Signal competitive installation time advantage vs. fiber, profitable even at Comcast pricing.  Our Keys To Success  	Overall network architecture, first mover in our geography / FCC protected frequency usage, go-to-market sales approach is unique and very effective.

OVERVIEW: Alma de Agave is an ultra-premium tequila with an incredible smooth taste, produced with 100% estate-grown blue Weber agave and all natural ingredient process. It's oxygenation and pre-iced process, makes it unique to the industry. We do not use artificial additives or chemicals, which are most often used to expedite the fermentation or distillation process of most tequila brands. 'Alma' features handcrafted bottles with a unique square bottle design that stands out among the crowd of tequilas at retail and back-bar settings.   	BACKGROUND: Originally produced for family use only in Jamay, Jalisco, Mexico. Alma Tequila was introduced to the U.S. by Nene Gonzalez, who established Xamay Importers Inc. in California to market, sell and distribute the brand. Xamay is not a start-up company, it launched in 2009. Alma Tequila is currently produced in three varieties: Blanco (silver - aged 30 days), Reposado (Rested - aged 9 months) and Añejo (Aged - aged 18 months). Alma Extra-Añejo (Extra Aged - 4 years) will be available in 2015. Each are pot-distilled in small batches to ensure quality, taste and low-methanol levels. The product is aged in white Canadian oak barrels. The company is based in Beverly Hills, CA and is distributed by Southern Wine & Spirits and other major beverage distributors in 15 key states and in Eastern Europe.

RetroTrust Inc. is a new company incorporated under the laws of the State of Wyoming on February, 19 2014. It has acquired under an exclusive and perpetual US license, software, knowhow, five interrelated US provisional patents, and four solutions. This knowhow, software and license will allow the Company to sell its solutions in 2015, to the US Healthcare market.  To meet the challenges of human identity and attribute verification in the real world and also in the cyber world, the Company has acquired a patent pending identity attribute assurance ecosystem called Ping360. This solution provides a service to its customers (medical insurance companies) which prevents subscriber fraud and "subscriber not present" medical provider billing fraud. The Company will charge a subscription fee of $1 per subscriber per month and it will provide at its cost medical providers and hospitals with a device that can read Ping360 variable and unique photo-ID cards and medical insurance documents on mobile devices. The Company expects direct cost of sales to be under 30%, and it projects pre-tax net profits to be approximately 35%. The Company is in the process of finalizing arrangements to site its primary offices in Potsdam NY, thereby allowing it to be a participant in the NY State Startup Program. The Company’s Ping360 Identity Authority Server© will be located at a secure hosting facility in the US. At first the Company will sell directly to companies that sell medical insurance in NY State. Once it has established a customer base in NY State, the Company will sell to medical insurance companies operating in other US states. The Company intends to start introducing its technology, starting in February 2015, to 3 targeted NY State medical insurance companies. To date the Company has been funded by its founder. Expenses have been kept to a minimum and the Company has no debt. Members of the management team recognize the Company’s profit potential and are working for sweat equity.

ValorCon is a new video game and tabletop game convention in downtown Chicago. This type of show has been very successful in 2nd-tier city markets like Boston (PAX East), Seattle (PAX Prime). Research indicates that gaming is still on the rise, nine years after a boom in 2006. The PAX shows sell out in advance very quickly, indicating the market is not saturated. Further research indicates that their target demographic is not regionally distributed, and that the larger a local population is, the greater the odds of success for this type of show. New York and LA would be logical targets for the next such event, but Chicago, as the #3 population center in the US, is more attractive since it would not compete regionally with either PAX event. Our expectation, based on an analysis of similar start-up "fan"conventions, is to hit 5,000 attendees in year one, double that in year two, and then settle into a 20%-30% growth rate until we hit 40,000-50,000 unique visitors, probably in 2019-2020. The City Of Chicago is in our corner, with a VP of Choose Chicago (the Mayor's tourism organization) working with us to secure favorable terms with the high-profile Navy Pier venue for an October event. Now we need seed money to secure the venue, talent, and a handful of special guests so that we can start seeing traction in ticket sales and booth rentals. Thomas Glen is the Director and 50% owner of ValorCon, and this is his third time at bat starting a company from scratch. (See LinkedIn profile above.) Tim Sauerman is the other owner, and Head of Logistics. Tim has 20 years of experience in the trade show and convention industry, and is currently running all the rigging at CES in Las Vegas.

A joint venture between an affiliate of Prodigy Network (90%) and an affiliate of Metro Loft Management (10%) closed on the property on August 28th, 2014 with approximately $30 million of equity from the crowd, senior financing from Deutsche Bank and subordinate financing from a New York based institutional investor. We are an online marketplace which is a two sided exchange.  On our supply side, we serve institutional investors who have excess or idle cash who seek higher returns than comparable cash equivalent returns.  On the demand side we serve independent mortgage lenders who need short term funds to finance the mortgages they originate from time of funding until sale to the permanent loan investor.   Our online exchange makes it simple for the mortgage lender to upload a data file of collateral that they wish to use to obtain financing.  The loan data and the collateral trust receipt are uploaded into our proprietary exchange system, X-Spot™.  Once the lender submits the collateral for financing bid, X-Spot™ validates the data through a network of internal and third-party data providers.  We also incorporate CoreLogic’s LoanSafe product which appends to the collateral data file a Collateral and Fraud Risk score.  These scores as well as any of the collateral data is searchable and filterable through X-Spot™.   On the supply side, an investor simply funds a trust account and completes one or as many bid profiles they desire.  Bid profiles are simplistic yet they have the ability to be as granular as the investor desires.  These profiles determine which collateral is eligible for a bid from the investor.  The investor bids a desired participation percentage, a cash advance percentage and an interest rate.  All of this can be done globally or at an individual transaction level.   X-Spot uses proprietary algorithms to match credit profiles and participation bids.  The lender is provided three choices – optimize for cash advance, optimize for interest rate or utilize X-Spot’s proprietary optimization.  We also have a third party who provides first loss coverage on the loans providing further credit protection for the investors.  On a risk return basis, our current annual yields of ~3% to the investor are far superior to other liquid cash alternative in the marketplace.

The mission for VOHBE is to make a positive difference in people's lives by creating innovative products that are fun, useful, and inspiring.   	  I've recently turned my two inventions into reality, and will be launching my company in February of this year. The company now has a solid foundation to build upon, with two patent pending inventions, a registered character trademark for the company name, and a company slogan, or mantra, that's unique and inspirational.   	  My first three products are called the VOHBE eVo, the VohbE Sticks, and the VohbE Mantra:   	  The VOHBE eVo is an interactive, timing and rhythm apparatus that you can punch, kick and push at all positions around it. It's a unique, fun and challenging workout to benefit your health, fitness and movement skills. It's unique features include the Feet Plates, the Legs Segment, and the Punch Bar. My goal is to get the eVo into as many homes and into as many fitness, kick-boxing, and other workout centers as possible. This can translate into sales of over one billion dollars.   	  The VohbE Sticks is a tennis training tool and coaching system that will change the way many tennis players and coaches think about how to improve offensive and defensive tennis skills. Most players focus on where the tennis ball land, but the VohbE Sticks get players to focus on the easier and closer target, which is over the net. The unique features of the VohbE Sticks include the one racket length association over the net, the surprising flip-over motion and the rewarding bell sound when the upper segment of the Stick is struck by a tennis ball. There are about 28 million tennis players in the USA and about 75 million tennis players in the world, and there are countless tennis coaches and parents teaching or supporting these players. So this can translate into sales of over 100 million dollars.   	  The VohbE Mantra, which is eVolve Or bExtinct with the VohbE smoothly imbedded within the phrase, is a design trademark to motivate and spur the user to the next level. I plan on putting the VohbE Mantra onto clothing, sports bags and other items to generate revenues and to build the VohbE name brand.

PIPR_Description: This is a prefunded refinance and renovation opportunity for a single family property in Irvington, NJ.   	The developer is requesting a loan of $100,000 in order to refinance and renovate the property. Our research shows the residential market in New Jersey has been strong recently and currently supports an upward trend in property values.

PIPR_Description: Aero Beacons, Inc. is developing a complete  ecosystem around Bluetooth Smart technology. We have already developed marketable hardware that will work with our SDK and API so apps from third party developers and businesses can be built quickly without the need for hardware development.   Our key is in keeping our hardware open and allowing competing hardware into our ecosystem. The vision is to create the worlds largest unified electronic beacon network. We have basic app, API and dashboard code that is being reworked into a software development kit and opening the API publicly.   Seed funding will be used to finish the software development kit and cloud services. Further, some funds will be used to help market and develop creatives for our upcoming crowd funding campaign around our new products and services. Our minimum goal for this campaign is $200,000 but we expect to over fund between $500,000 to $1,500,000.

Red Tree Communications is a Greenwood Village, Colorado, company that specializes in the setup, delivery, and maintenance of secure wireless communications (WiFi) for businesses, communities, multi-family housing, and travel centers.  Red Tree offers custom-ground-up data and VoIP installation and delivery.  WiFi is quickly becoming the standard in delivering internet connectivity through organizations, schools and universities, government agencies, and businesses of all sizes.  Red Tree focuses on delivery of secure WiFi services to commercial and residential property owners as well as traditional internet service provides that wish to improve the service offerings within their buildings and their current services.  Red Tree's primary focus is to provide full-service installation, support, and management of wireless networks for individual building owners and municipalities.  It is a wholesale provider of services to businesses wishing to improve their competitiveness and amenities in their townships and in their commercial properties.  WiFi installations and maintenance of these installations has increased greatly in the past ten years and is projected to continue to grow at an annual rate of no less than 50% per year.  The industry as a whole is on track to become a $244B industry in the U.S. alone.  The total industry segment targeted specifically by Red Tree is expected to grow to $5B annually by year four.  Because of the fragmented nature of the market in its current state, the threat from competitors is not necessarily a negative reality, and additional competitors in the market help increase awareness and drive overall sales, leading to more acquisitions and industry consolidation.  Management will position the company to be an acquisition target by a market consolidator hungry for market share and build a larger network by the end of 2016.  The most likely aggregators will be larger telecom, cable, or electrical companies.

Computer Network Solutions (CNS) is a young engineering contracting firm located in the high-tech hub of Winston-Salem, North Carolina. Owners Jim Reynolds and Jamie Frederick have a total of almost 40 years of experience in connectivity and network engineering. The budding economic recovery is bringing rapidly increasing opportunity for the installation of high-end warehouse management systems, and CNS is very well positioned to capitalize on the growing need of companies that wish to better manage their inventory in order to stay competitive. Jim Reynolds was senior engineer for the Special Modification Services of CDS Energies, one the country's leading producers of Automatic Data Collection (ADC) products, and one of his primary responsibilities was to travel to customers' warehouse sites and perform custom wireless network modification using CDS products. Jamie Frederick has been a senior engineer for the Symbol Networking Equipment system installation services for the past 9 years. Among her responsibilities were custom wireless installation of Symbol networking equipment and ADC products at customers' warehouses. Shortly after Computer Network Solutions was formed, it executed outsourcing agreements with both CDS Energies and Symbol Networking to provide custom network installation services to their customers.  Winston-Salem is an ideal location for such a business.  Forces magazine recently ranked it as the 9th best place in the U.S. for business and careers in 2001 with economic drivers fed by the city's continued dominance as a center for arts, financial services, tourism, and education. The area includes home bases for companies such as RJReynolds, Wachovia, Krispy Kreme, HanesGlobalBrands, Homes Fine Foods, and ISPN Sports. Winston-Salem is also a leader in the nanotech, high-tech, and bio-tech fields, and medical research is an expansively-growing local industry. Overall, it is an ideal location for Computer Network Solutions to build its future.

Founded in 2009, we are a Boston-based solar company that has developed a proprietary thin film deposition technology for solar photovoltaic (“PV”) products. We utilize a proprietary one-step sputter deposition process and have manufactured a commercial deposition tool to apply high-efficiency copper indium gallium diselenide (“CIGS”) material over plastic substrates in a continuous fashion. This represents a critically differentiated manufacturing process to produce low-cost solar modules that address the large solar PV market. We are seeking $4 million in equity investment to fund the construction of our 5 MW capacity pilot production line and for general operating expenses.

Why did you start Pipeline Wizard?   	 Pipeline Wizard (www.pipelinewizard.com), founded by Jesse Garcia, Rochelle Garcia and Praneel Kumar, was created to assist real estate sales professionals set prospecting goals, track lead generation activities, map conversion ratios and produce "result metrics" pertinent to the agent's business.   	 The idea was born when Jesse closed his first real estate transaction. With a desire to understand how his commission check was calculated, where each fee was distributed and how much he should budget for taxes and business expenses, Jesse began to sketch out formulas to help keep track of every action and every penny. As his business grew he needed to track more in-depth data in relation to past, current and future transactions for budgeting and business planning. Jesse further analyzed income projections, production trends and sources of business. One key equation in this application is tax budgeting. From the beginning of Jesse's real estate career, his CPA advised him to set aside a certain percentage of each commission for quarterly tax payments so he wasn't surprised or playing "catch up" in the third or fourth quarter. By incorporating these strategies and implementing this system Jesse's business became more predictable and stable.   	 What problem does Pipeline Wizard solve?   	 Pipeline Wizard is an interactive business solution built to increase productivity and profit through accountability and competition. Real estate agents and sales professionals, which number millions worldwide, will all benefit from Pipeline Wizard.   	 Anecdotal data and surveys suggest that a majority of real estate professionals do not track their business and the professionals who actually do so, typically utilize a whiteboard, spreadsheet or paper. Pipeline Wizard is a simple, cloud-based solution which allows the user to increase production, set goals and manage the pipeline while enjoying up-to-date technology.   	 In addition, sales professionals are generally very competitive and we see an opportunity to embrace this natural drive to win through developing a platform for which they can compete with other agents/sales professionals with the by-product being an increase in production.

What Sets Us Apart   	 Retro-Bright fixtures are currently a one of a kind product with no direct competition. Retro-Bright fixtures solve many problems and price points remain within the scope of working class America but when it gets right down to it, the only thing that sets this company or any other company apart are its people. Our Team has all the technical skills and expertise to bring Retro-Bright to the national market and even more. We fully recognize a phone is a phone and a computer is a computer, it's people that make a difference in the success of a business. Honesty and Integrity must be first. We also believe that when our phone rings there is somebody on the other end that does not want to talk to a computer or someone in another country. No matter what we are selling it is people that will make this process miserable or pleasurable.   	 Our Keys To Success   	 It never hurts to be the first in the market place with a much needed product ! We have that product. Beyond that, being surrounded by motivated people that play as a team is extremely hard to beat. There are many facets to this project, all of which have been poured over at length. We have much experience in all aspects of the endeavor we are proposing here on Crowdfunder. It may sound a bit arrogant to say "we don't believe we have a tremendously wonderful project before us, We know we do" Even with that teamwork and determination are essential and have been exhibited by all of our team here by their past performance. Being attentive and flexible to market demands are key as well as our team members that bring a lot of years of valuable experience to this project. No mater how well we've done our home work there is always stuff that sneaks up on you. Having a experienced and devoted team is hard to beat.

Arisone HHC offers a unique approach to the ever-growing Home Health Care industry.  We of course offer the typical in-home care services (companionship, basic personal care, pet care, laundry, etc.) but our approach to utilizing a limited number of well-compensated care givers eliminates the revolving door approach to home care.  This concept allows us to provide for more consistent, competent and compassionate care. The overall business concept focuses on franchise sales opportunities throughout the United States.  Our home-based structure minimizes overhead costs that can be utilized on marketing, sales and business development efforts.  This home based concept also opens the door to those looking for affordable franchise opportunities.  Without an extraordinarily high initial outlay, franchisees can concentrate on building their business, finding quality care givers and providing superior service. Once the Flagship operations are running in full force the company will turn its efforts toward franchise sales.  After that, we will develop the Health Care segment and begin selling separate franchises in the skilled care arena. Our founder is a Swedish national resident and is self funding the entire operation.  As such, it is difficult for us to secure traditional funding through banks or financial institutions.  Therefore, we are in search of a limited amount of funding to continue toward our goal of developing the concept in the United States. At this time we are fully licensed and insured and have already brought on our first clients.  We are simply in search of a limited amount of working capital to continue the marketing and business development efforts throughout 2015.

Purpose   	CrowdInvest is democratizing the asset management industry by crowdsourcing the construction of exchange traded funds (ETF's).   	CrowdInvest is the first financial technology company using "the wisdom of the crowd" to construct publicly traded Exchange Traded Funds (ETF's) that anyone can buy and sell through any brokerage firm anytime during the trading day.   	Problem   	Most current investment processes and vehicles are outdated and inefficient in the current connected, socialized and data intensive society.   	Over 70% of active domestic equity mutual funds underperformed their benchmarks over the past 3, 5, and 10 years.   	The average active mutual fund charges 1.39% in yearly fees (the average equity ETF charges 0.44%).   	Highlights   	The CrowdInvest mobile app is currently available on the Apple App Store.   	CrowdInvest has a transparent business model with a clear path to monetization and profitability.   	The CrowdInvest Wisdom Index, based on votes from the app, is live (Bloomberg: CROWDWIS).   	CrowdInvest has a signed "Letter of Intent" with its ETF sponsor.   	CrowdInvest's CEO has been in the asset management industry for over 20 years.

WellMetris Profile is a rapid, inexpensive and adaptable testing technology that assesses the metabolic efficiency of an individual to determine overall health. According to Bureau of Labor and HHS statistics, those in the optimal range experience fewer sick days, fewer at-work accidents, increased productivity and make fewer health insurance claims.   The WellMetris Profile is NOT a diagnostic. It assesses the metabolic status of an individual rather than diagnosing a specific illness or condition, as medical diagnostics do. The WellMetris Profile is a pre-clinical screening and monitoring tool to rapidly and inexpensively assess the wellness of large groups of people - employees, pension fund beneficiaries, government dependents, and so on.   This tool is used by wellness consultants, intervention specialists, accountable care organizations and insurers to focus early intervention and preventative programs toward those in any large group that will benefit the most, BEFORE a particular condition progresses to the point where more costly medical intervention becomes necessary – promising to shrink healthcare expenditures and delivering healthy outcomes.  WellMetris testing technology is derived from costly and complex laboratory-based biomedical research and clinical tests.  The real breakthrough is in the conversion of these expensive lab-based tests to non-invasive, urine-activated tests performed in less than 3 minutes for less than $24 in office, shop or retail settings.   Buyers of this technology include large employers, insurers, governments, pension funds, unions and the wellness companies that serve them

This lodge houses a small restaurant and, gift shop, and check-in desk. The business also has canoe outfitting for back country trips, which is essentially the service of providing outdoor enthusiasts with all of their needs (canoes, tents, food, orientation, etc.) to journey into the Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness. There are also boats for fishing on the Kenai river. West Gate Corporation will form a Limited Liability corporation and purchase the Denise Lake Lodge. This will be a family business run by the Phillips’s.   	Service is what sets Denise Lake Lodge apart from its competition. With West Gate managing, Denise Lake Lodge will be one of the best-staffed resorts on Kenai Peninsula! Premier Service, combined with deluxe cabins and lodge rooms, direct access to Denise Lake, experienced outfitting, and the heritage of 25 years of operation makes it unique! Denise Lake Lodge specializes in ultra-lightweight fishing equipment and canoes to minimize the weight and bulk in portaging. From feather-light tents and sleeping bags to the lightest Kevlar canoes available, Denise Lake Lodge offers the highest quality products available that provide comfort while meeting the demands of the rugged wilderness.   	As previously mentioned, Denise Lake Lodge is an existing business, and this business will be purchased by West Gate Corporation. West Gate will be contributing a total of $70,000 in capital for the purchase of this business. Additionally, debt financing will contribute $1,430,000 in the form of debt financing

Quickly gather and retrieve medical, dental and vision data on the go with Mobile EMR.   	In life-or-death emergency situations, every second matters. In addition to stabilizing the condition of patients, rescue teams and emergency medical staff must also gather pertinent medical data and history in order to administer proper and effective treatment.   	Mobile EMR is the first-ever cloud-based app specially designed for allowing medical and response staff to quickly and easily gather personal medical data especially in emergency situations. Wherever you are and whatever happens, you can be prepared—Mobile EMR could save your life.   	No matter how much we try to avoid it, accidents happen and they happen swiftly and unexpectedly. In these cases, patients may not be able to readily provide pertinent medical information that could be vital to their treatment and care.   	Whether they are in shock, unconscious, in pain, or simply confused, patients will not always be ready with the right and accurate information that medical response personnel need to have. These personal medical information include medical history, medications, allergies, symptoms, as well as emergency contact information. Gathering all these take a while. Thus, EMS, 911, fire, police, hospital doctors offices, day care, dentist offices, schools, and other first aid givers may have a delay in administering necessary help and treatment.   	To help speed up the process and cut down valuable time, we have created Mobile EMR. Which allows patient app to talk to other electronic medical records and vice versa.   	Mobile EMR provides a HIPPA approved cloud-based, secure and accessible platform that people can fall back on in emergency cases or any other situation in order to gather extensive personal medical data about an emergency patient.

Sensilkis a smart clothing company, initially focused on fitness and wellness market. The addressable market for wearable technologies specific to smart apparels in fitness and wellness is estimated to reach $2.3B by 2017 (IHS Electronics & Media, 2013).   	Pain: Today's wearable technologies are bulky, uncomfortable to wear, require charging and not all-weather proof – not suitable for integrating into apparels. Most wearable devices are abandoned after a few months. For fitness and wellness, the sensors and applications lack granular fitness analytics (e.g. continuous heart rate monitoring function) and incentives to drive behavior change (fitness & wellness).   	Solution: Sensilk is the only integrated silicon & textile apparel solution today that wears like traditional garments but provides comprehensive monitoring functions such as ECG/EKG, respiration and body temperature. Its first line of products, sports bra and performance shirt, interact with a mobile app to continuously monitor and analyze heart pulse, heart rate variability (HRV), Heart Rate Increment (HRI), deceleration capacity and respiration to track training progress & maximize workout efficiency. Sensilk's mission is to improve consumers' health through fashionable and comfortable wearable technologies.

Create was conceived in late 2011 by Stefan Martinovic and Ed Switzer, childhood friends who grew up to build careers in real estate development and city planning. Stefan came from the hedge fund world where he was parked in front of a Bloomberg terminal for hours a day before breaking into real estate. As a developer, he spent years driving around the neighborhoods of DC scouting for properties, collecting data from dozens of sources, and building spreadsheets to understand the investment economics.   	 Coming from a planning and project management background, Ed spent his days using GIS systems and design tools to understand the physical feasibility of projects, but wanted a deeper understanding of the business end of the building industry. The two combined their talents, and after 18 months in concept development, resulting in a patent filing and turning down a very early buyout offer, Create was materializing.   	 A chance LinkedIn encounter led to adding Laura Ferguson as CTO to lead the charge on the engineering side. Stefan moved to San Francisco to kick down doors in Silicon Valley, while he continued to grow a 10-person organization based in DC and the Bay Area, with alumni from organizations like Apple and NASA. When screenshots of the product started to surface, hundreds of groups from top real estate firms, investment banks, government agencies, and universities flooded Create with requests for access to the product, which has launched in DC, with plans to expand to Detroit and nationwide.   	 Create is an operating system for real estate and economic development, representing an entirely new software category for the building industry. Like SimCity for the real world, Create is built around an immersive 3D map of the entire city that is packed with building and property data including structural, ownership, residential and commercial market, construction cost, tenant, financing, transit, zoning, city planning, environmental, and demographic data sets which are constantly updated through live feeds from 3rd party partners.   	 Create's SaaS platform allows developers, investors, brokers, and individuals to model any property investment instantly and filter across multiple databases to pinpoint the best opportunities in the city. In a few clicks, users can generate site-specific 3D building feasibility models reflecting local regulations, along with all of the accompanying financial information including budgets, schedules, operating statements, monthly cash flows, investment returns, and economic impact studies.

Simulation can be elegant, fast, and should be accessible to more people. The days of $50K for an entry level license package (that doesn't fully take advantage of GPU computing!) are numbered – there are untapped markets beyond big-budget corporations. A singular well-conceived architecture cannot only be applied to numerous different industries, but a small core code-base has the virtue of easier maintainability/optimization - and since the concepts are universal, it is easier to learn and implement. The face of computer-aided engineering is changing. Winning architectures will be collaborative 3D environments (with Virtual Reality and other tech) with a more seamless workflow/experience.

We think the timing is perfect to introduce a disruptive, unified, high-performance architecture that could eventually become the standard in engineering systems design, optimization and analysis...and other industries. Someday, simulation will be run realtime for safety/operations analysis in vehicles and/or used for entertainment purposes. Applications are unbounded.

F-Bomb Productions is currently in pre-production on the indie film comedy tentatively titled, "Skanksgiving".  The title refers to a commonly used word reference to the activities that take place the night before Thanksgiving.  Our story focuses on a young, female, college grad who is attempting to throw a grown up party for her friends, many of whom she has not seen in quite some time.  The story deals with issues of what it is to mature, the situations that arise as friends become older and begin to live separate lives, and the general insanity that ensues when "growing up" in not on everyone's list of things to do.  The comedy is slated to shoot at the end of May, 2015.   	Currently, we are working to cast the film using members of the Upright Citizens Brigade as well as other SAG/AFTRA and non-union talent.  We will be working under the SAG Ultra-Low Budget Agreement.  Our directors are have won awards for their video and commercial directing, including an Oscar for a Student Film, 2 Cannes Lions, and various film festival accolades.   	This is the first film F-Bomb is working on producing.  We have a plan to follow this comedy up with the comedy, "On Sarah Time" which is a continuation of the "Skanksgiving" story.  The company shot a teaser trailer for "On Sarah Time" under the assumption that this film would cost considerably more to produce.  Thus, the decision to film "Skanksgiving", which is a contained story.   	The company has connections at Sundance, Fantastic Fest, and Dead Center Film Festival.  We will be submitting the completed project to these festivals.  In addition, the producers recently attended AFM where they were able to make contact and gain initial interest in the project from sales and distribution agents.  Once the film is complete, the company will entertain those agencies' offers.

Jilcat Industrial Marketing Group (JIMG) has secured a formal marketing partnership distribution agreement with Petron Plus in Kansas to market Petron Plus products under a private label world wide. These products provide the benefits of reducing friction and metal to metal wear, reducing heat, increasing fuel economy, reducing emissions and leaving a low-carbon foot print. We will private label the Petron Plus product line under our own brands for industrial equipment, cars, weapons oil, the trucking industry and shipping and aircraft industries. 
 
In addition to the ability to market the private-label products, JIMG will incorporate the use of these products in its own Gun Functionality Service Agreement and a Mechanical Breakdown Service Agreement for high mileage automobiles, trucks and other gas and diesel-powered vehicles and equipment. 
 
JIMG will be able to capitalize on the 35 years worth of Petron Products use and supporting performance data and testimonies from government entities and Fortune 100 companies for entry into these markets. Current sales of the products mainly to military and government agencies is estimated to be $500M, this represents 0.25% of the $200 billion lubricant market. 
 
The growing demands to improve efficiency of operation and reduce emissions and waste have created a need for these products. The products supplement current products in use rather than replacing them. The effectiveness and claims of the products have been verified by an independent international-testing lab and verified as containing no toxic or hazardous chemicals by the EPA and European agencies. The products are a unique nano-hydrocarbon product that affects the metal surfaces, providing a continuous high-strength layer of lubricant that remains even after the oil is removed. In an extreme test, gasoline and diesel engines treated with the product have been run without oil in the engines for hours without damage or overheating of the engines

PIPR_Name: Lake Villa, IL Fix and Flip
PIPR_Description: This is a fully pre-funded purchase and rehabilitation opportunity for a single family property in Lake Villa, Illinois.   	The developer is requesting a loan of $116,000 in order to purchase and renovate the property for resale. The developer is purchasing the property for $40,500 with an assignment fee of $6,000 and is contributing $35,000 as down payment. The property is in need of extensive renovations, with an estimated construction budget of $100,000. There are 3 draws associated with this loan. The first draw at closing in the amount of $45,360 to cover the purchase and 1st construction draw. The second draw will occur when half of the renovation is complete in the amount of $33,000. The last draw will occur upon evidence of final completion in the amount of $33,000, All draws are contingent upon 3rd party inspection and title rundowns as per the final loan agreement.   	An independent third party appraisal commissioned by Patch of Land shows an After Repair Value (ARV) of $225,000, for an ARV ratio of 51.56% and is in line with the data we found during our due diligence process. Our research shows the residential market in suburban Chicago has been strong recently and currently supports an upward trend in property values.

Polar Panel is a start-up company that will be Colorado's only manufacturer of expanded polystyrene (EPS) core insulated metal panels. We will do so by delivering a high quality locally made product that is sustainable and innovative in its nature. With its base here in Colorado and being the only manufacture of this prefinished encapsulated insulated construction panel including the six surrounding states it is very well centralized to serve this region. Our clients which are typically refrigeration companies, use this product for walk-in cooler and freezers will save a substantial cost in freight as well as freighting time. There of only 6 manufacturers in 8 locations of EPS insulated metal panels in all of the United States. Six of these eight locations are all located on or near the coastal regions of America. This not only costs the consumer immensely in time and freight, but the costs to the environment as there are large loads of the product being shipped all over the country. 

The founder and owner of Polar Panel,  Devin Hori, has over 15 years of working with insulated metal panels and has experienced first-hand the versatility and innovation of this product in the construction industry.
 Polar panel is committed to providing premium metal panel products with no compromises to work-man-ship while exceeding client expectations. Polar Panel is an extremely versatile product that can be utilized for many different applications from; walk-in coolers, freezers, steel sheds, roofing, commercial and residential construction, portable buildings, etc. Polar Panel has many benefits as com-pared to the current conventional ways of construction. Due to the nature of the product it reduces build times, is energy efficient, eco-friendly/sustainable by being 100% recyclable, and reduces structural cost associated with current methods of construction.

Overview: AlgiSys is a biotechnology company that produces high-value omega-3 fatty acid nutrition ingredients from microalgae. AlgiSys is currently developing proprietary microalgae strains to be used with proven biotech production methods and intellectual property for one important fatty acid, EicosaPentaenoic Acid ("EPA). EPA is a long-chain omega-3 fatty acid, or "good fat", that has clinically proven cardiovascular system and joint health benefits. AlgiSys' renewable resource-created products can replace or enhance EPA omega-3 oils derived from the world's primary existing, but limited sources—fish and fish oil. Furthermore, current dietary sources of EPA are inadequate relative to daily recommended levels. AlgiSys' vegetarian EPA oils can be quickly adopted by customers because they mirror existing conventional fish and non-fish-sourced oils. AlgiSys' EPA oil will address the major Omega-3 markets, which represent a multibillion dollar opportunity. Initially, the Company is focused on selling its products into the supplements markets, and subsequently into the animal feed and the more-regulated food & beverage/pharmaceutical markets.   	The Company's technology platform consists of proprietary technology in areas such as microalgae, fermentation and downstream processing. The Company is working to further develop and optimize proprietary strains of microalgae that produce oils rich in EPA via a fermentation process. AlgiSys, in conjunction with its development partners, is actively commercializing its technology platform and significant milestones have been met: (i) technical feasibility has been established; (ii) intellectual property and trade secrets have been developed; (iii) fermentation process parameters have been improved and developed for the initial strain; (iv) the biochemistry and genome is better understood; (v) tools for classical strain improvement have been developed and deployed; and (vi) a culture collection of derivative strains with high EPA production characteristics is being produced and evaluated.   	The Company will use standard fermentation and downstream processing equipment to efficiently scale and accelerate the production of EPA oil. By feeding its proprietary oil-producing microalgae sugars or other low-cost feedstocks in fermentation vessels, the Company is utilizing proven and cost effective biotech production processes, in contrast to more expensive, unproven and less efficient open-pond and photobioreactor approaches used by the Company's potential competitors. Using industry standard fermentation vessels, AlgiSys can create a controlled environment that prevents contamination and allows for tight regulation of key production parameters to maximize yields.

Menuat is the all digital, all device menu for restaurants and bars. We’re changing the way restaurant owners manage their menus by allowing them to make real-time changes to their wall menu, web menu, and their customers' mobile devices, all from one easy-to-use system.   	This gives the restaurant owner more control than they've ever had before. Now, they can fine-tune their menu to find out what works for them. Urban Power USA is a new company founded in Western Massachusetts which manufactures and sells a new type of vertical wind turbine called the Urban Turbine.   	Our turbines are unique in design and patented. The turbine is a drag style turbine which means it does not need smooth fast moving air required by traditional blade type turbines. This characteristic imparts a significant advantage over traditional wind turbines because it means they can be installed in the city environment where smooth air is difficult to find. In addition to not requiring smooth air, our turbines cannot move faster than the wind is blowing, therefore it is not capable of generating the noise or vibrations as traditional turbines do. The large urban market has been under served for renewable energy due to the limited products capable of operating there.   	This opens up a unique niche by making it perfectly suited for large and small flat roof tops building installations in the city where the customer need the power. The roof top installation is cheaper and uses space which typical is not used to generate an income. Urban power USA enjoys a large customer base which other renewable energy sources are ether not suited for the location or too expensive to utilize. Our target markets are any flat roof building or open land with at least modest to good winds anywhere in the US or the world.   	Even though our turbines command the low wind environment, we also excel in the high wind areas. Unlike traditional turbines our turbines do not shut down during high wind situations. Instead we have a unique system that kicks in an additional inverter system to act as a break by generating addition electrical production.   	Another feature of our turbines which is one of the best in the industry is the installation and shipping process. We do not need any special shipping requirements so we can use standard shipping methods so trucking costs are kept low. Installations of our turbines are just as easy because all turbines are assembled on site and do not require a crane for placement on a roof. This significantly lowers the cost of installation.

Company highlights include:  #1 market position with tremendous growth opportunities. Its existing spa sales, which have seen an acceleration in same-store-sales growth in 2014, are poised to continue trending higher through the launch of an innovative line of personal care products for the prestige traveler. Operating a spa in an airport environment is difficult because of regulation, training, branding, and managing surge traffic; these phenomena create significant barriers to entry against competitors. Best in class retail economics with established infrastructure to execute on rollout. XpresSpa’s average unit volumes and variable labor costs produce attractive store margins and best in class cash on cash returns. The typical payback period for a location and average lease time, allow for each unit to produce several years of strong cash returns. The Company’s management, systems, and processes are in place to expand the chain. The XpresSpa business model is established, working, and replicable. Large, growing, international market: The airport retail renaissance and increasing spa visitation by consumers are the foundation for XpresSpa to continue its unit and same store sales growth in the future. Airport concessions are a $5 billion market annually, and the industry is growing ~6% per year. As an industry leader, XpresSpa has built an expertise in identifying the most attractive locations within the space. Despite its leadership position, the company has identified multiple dozens of large and medium sized US airports, as well as multiple dozens of large international  for expansion. Ability to invest alongside sophisticated private equity fund: Mistral Equity Partners, a $300 million fund that specializes in consumer and retail transactions, is the majority owner of XpresSpa. The Company’s funding needs for 2015 are wholly underwritten by Mistral. Mistral’s CEO, Andrew Heyer, is an investor in OurCrowd’s general partnership and an active participant in the OurCrowd community. OurCrowd and Mistral are already partners in two investments, Abe’s Market and Apploi, which Mistral joined following OurCrowd’s involvement. We are excited to have the opportunity to join Mistral in investing in XpresSpa to fuel the company’s continued growth.

Company highlights include:   	A new, better approach to high-performance cloud security. Highly distributed corporate infrastructure and increasingly sophisticated cyberattacks have rendered traditional on-premises security products and internal IT support ineffective. Though migration to cloud services represents one of the fastest growth segments, it is unsupported by physical products and first-generation cloud security vendors rely on approaches that don't offer comprehensive protection and levy speed penalties. Bat Blue has developed the first cloud security solution sophisticated enough to offer a cloud service as an alternative to security infrastructure. Bat Blue's service can be implemented in hours, not weeks or months, delivering uniform security across all of an organization's Brick & Mortar, Cloud & SaaS, and Mobile & IoT platforms.    	Significant customer traction and demonstrated efficacy.  With minimal funding to date and a lean sales team, Bat Blue has built its 2014 revenues to $3.5M and a customer base of over 20 companies spanning sizes and industries, including tumblr, Disney, ESPN, NYSE Euronext, and FiveThirtyEight. Bat Blue’s platform has already been put to the test – successfully defending its clients against very high-profile attacks by mercenary hackers, state-sponsored, and hacktivist groups with successful track records against named targets, including many well publicized commercial and government networks.   	Experienced CEO and high caliber advisory team: Founder and CEO Babak Pasdar has a demonstrated track record of building enterprise security companies. He has built a board of advisors that includes the former CTO & CIO of AT&T, former CIO of MetLife, and former CISO at Citigroup, JP Morgan and Merrill Lynch, and the former VP of Sales for Palo Alto Networks. The caliber of the advisors validates the quality and potential of the technology and brings significant firepower to the sales effort with their combined network across key target industries for cybersecurity demand. OurCrowd is investing in partnership with AITV, a US-based venture fund with significant domain expertise in enterprise IT.   	Rapidly growing, multi-billion dollar market: Recent cyberattacks at Target, Home Depot, Adobe, JP Morgan and Sony have cost these brands billions while driving demand for new data security solutions at the CEO and board level. Accordingly, CB Insights cites corporate cybersecurity investments increasing 5 fold from 2009 to 2014. As a security as a service company, Bat Blue exists within the fastest growing segment of the overall cybersecurity industry, expected by Gartner to account for more than $3B of sales in 2015.

Moni.ai is an interactive virtual assistant which allows users to control their favorite apps, devices and appliances, all from one voice controlled platform. #TheConnectedMind   	The problem:  Managing dozens of individual apps as well as multiple automated devices and appliances on a daily basis is becoming just as much a challenge as it is a solution. As the Internet of Things expands we need an easier way to interact with and control our technology.   	The Solution:  Moni.ai gets us back to using our most natural form of communication to control our technology...our voice. With Moni.ai users can find their apps, devices and appliances all on one, easy to use platform. From their, they can either choose pre-defined voice commands, or create their own.   	On the other side of things, developers can build their own voice apps on our platform, add voice control to their already existing products/services, and use Moni.ai as a channel to connect with their customers.

BrightLocker makes it easy for game developers and enthusiasts to come together and collaborate in the video game development process. By uniting game selection, funding, development, community, and publishing in a single unified platform, BrightLocker is putting power in the hands of the fans and revolutionizing the game development and publishing landscape for the rapidly expanding global video game industry.   	The BrightLocker team has over 115 years of combined video game industry experience. We all agree on this: making video games is as fun as playing them! We want our community to experience the fun of making games.   	That is why we have created more than just a funding platform. Our slogan is "The Game of Making Games" because our platform has been specifically designed from the ground up to 'gamify' the whole game creation experience. We reward funders with experiences as well as digital and physical goods. No other crowdfunding platform does that.   	BrightLocker combines reward and equity funding for the first time in a crowdfunding platform. We us physical, digital, and unique 'experiences' to reward game fans who help select and fund games for development and publishing. This 'pre-sale' data is then used by our sophisticated BI engine to produce investment data for accredited investors to further fund games much the same way a hedge fund would fund Hollywood movies: An investor would share in revenue with the potential for high returns given the blockbuster capabilities of entertainment products like games.

Why We Started This Company   	When consumers have easy access to information about the environmental and social footprint of products they will play an increasingly important role towards achieving a sustainable economy.   	Our Keys To Success   	Recent studies show that 66% of consumers are interested in the sustainability of products they buy. It is also clear that they want transparently presented information on the complete life cycle of products. Earth Accounting's patented smartphone information delivery offers this and more including consumer feedback and product re-direction. This concept has evolved over 6 years and core team members have worked together for the last 4. Our team represents over 40 years experience in the field.   	What Sets Us Apart   	Our emphasis on data transparency, user participation and our complete product life-cycle framework provides Earth Touch app users with a uniquely empowering experience that is unmatched by competing apps.   	The technology to provide such functionality in a smartphone app is not new, but is also not trivial. The key issue for this project, and one of our distinguishing assets, is our strategy for getting the data. To accomplish this continual task we have formed an information cooperative and we have already received several signed letters of intent from prospective members.   	The Data: ACES   	Our ability to collect the vast amount of data necessary for this project and maintaining transparency is what sets us apart from similar product oriented apps. To accomplish this monumental task we have invented and patented a unique process, and formed the first ever data cooperative: ACES - The Alliance for Consumer Empowerment and Sustainability. Similar to a traditional cooperative common among farmers in agriculture, the ACES coop compensates members based on their contribution.   	ACES members will largely be made up of eco label and environmental organizations, manufacturers, and consumers. When a user accesses information on a product, the contributor of that information will be compensated based on a pre-established formula. This reward system incentivizes data contribution and a Wikipedia-like democratic participation system maintains accuracy and transparency by allowing ACES members and end users to challenge existing information.   	The Vision: Earth Touch App   	The first version of the Earth Touch app is to be released by the fall of 2015 and will include data for products in 5 initial categories: packaged foods, household cleaning products, pet food, clothes, and cosmetics. This version will provide the product's approved ecolabels and their definitions, direct users to competing products that better meet personal preferences and allow users to message companies telling them why their product was chosen or not.   	Later versions of the app will include a comprehensive product rating, identifying the social and environmental impact with specific facts that contributed to the product's rating. We will also offer a personalized experience allowing users to prioritize issues of most interest to them. For example, if someone is concerned specifically about child labor, GMOs, and CO2 emissions, we will highlight that product information for them.   	Profile functionality will allow users to track their shopping habits, discover new products, build a shopping list, rate products, and share products, facts, and companies they find interesting. The personalization of Earth Touch greatly improves user experience, increasing participation and app use.   	Income   	Income from the Earth Touch app will be generated from several different sources, the most obvious is in-app advertising and affiliate marketing. As the Earth Accounting product life-cycle database grows we will offer subscription services to manufacturers and organizations interested in both the product information and the consumer spending habits. Another potential revenue stream may include paid download or premium services.

Reesio is Slack plus Salesforce for the 2.5M residential real estate brokers and agents in the United States. The biggest pain point facing real estate professionals right now is that all of the technologies that exist out there to help them do their jobs are antiquated, fragmented, and clunky. There doesn't exist just "one system" that does everything -- CRM, Transaction Management, Marketing, etc. Check out this recent story about a research study conducted with brokerages, highlighting just how big of a problem this is:   	http://www.inman.com/2014/04/11/real-estate-brokerages-crying-out-for-technology-that-integrates/   	Reesio solves for this pain point by providing a beautiful product that combines all of these fragmented products into ONE product, which allows brokers and agents to manage every aspect of their job in one place. Brokers and Agents combine to spend $10B per year on fragmented tools that don't work. It's a huge market.   	We provide full Transaction Management, CRM, Listing Syndication, and Offers Management. Everything is all in one place, with no separate e-signature or other accounts required.   	The product that we've built also has a lot of real estate legalities and compliance features built into it that are tough to replicate. In addition, real estate professionals require a product that is feature-rich to do their job, and it would take at least 2-3 years for another company to build out what we've built to this point. Our deep domain expertise within the real estate industry, coupled with our strong engineering and design skills, allow us to take what is a complex legal process (buying and selling real estate), and turn it into something beautiful and easy to use for the 2.5M real estate brokers and agents in the United States.

What Sets Us Apart   	Yadagive captures what people want in a fast paced world by making fundraising easy. Just shop at your favorite online stores and (at no extra cost to you) your charity of choice will get a % of the purchase. Our Keys To Success   	Our success will be measured by providing our customers an easy online experience that is flawless and you don't even have to think about using Yadagive; it just works.
