500 Startups is a family of early-stage seed venture capital funds and startup accelerators. The 500 Startups accelerator affords entrepreneurs and startups the opportunity to engage in a four-month program with an international network of founders, mentors, and other experts. Located in San Francisco, Mountain View, and Mexico City, admission into the accelerator program is highly selective with each startup typically receiving a $100,000 investment in return for a 7% ownership interest. The 500 Startups network, referred to internally as the 500 Family, includes over 2,000 company founders and 200 mentors from developed and emerging markets including North America, Europe, Brazil, Mexico, India, China, Japan, Russia, Bangladesh, Egypt, Peru, Vietnam, Saudi Arabia, Lebanon, and more. In addition to an expansive network, startups accepted into the accelerator program are given access to office space, in-house distribution experts to accelerate growth, and marketing and brand recognition benefits associated with the 500 Startups brand. The four-month accelerator program culminates in a private, invite-only Demo Day where each startup presents to a group of select investors in an effort to attract additional seed funding. About 30 companies participate in each four-month program offered at its various locations with the latest group, Batch 12, beginning in January 2015 in San Francisco.   	 In addition to investing through its accelerator program, 500 Startups invests globally in early-stage companies through various seed-stage investment funds. Across six funds, 500 Startups has committed approximately $125 million to over 900 portfolio companies. The inaugural fund, Fund I, was formed in July 2010 and achieved an ultimate fund size of $29 million. As of September 30, 2014, the internal rate of return for Fund I stood at 18% with investment exits worth approximately $13 million. Fund II was formed in April 2012 raising almost $45 million. Fund II has achieved $2 million in exits and a net internal rate of return of 27% as of September 30, 2014. While Fund I and Fund II are closed to new investments, 500 Startups is in the fundraising process for four other funds: Fund III, Annex Fund, 500 Luchadores, and 500 Durians.

The multi-trillion dollar U.S. Commercial Real Estate (CRE) debt and equity markets have long been characterized as opaque. With data controlled by brokers and gathered using outdated methods, institutional investors and property owners are limited in their ability to properly assess and monitor risk in order to make informed investment decisions. CrediFi applies scalable Big Data and data mining techniques -- using info from the web, public records, institutional reports, etc. -- in addition to data contributed by its user base, to create the market’s premier, real-time credit quality and risk monitoring tool. Using such data and its own proprietary algorithms, CrediFi monitors owner-level creditworthiness and risk factors such as capital expenditure requirements and tenant composition. CrediFi is designed to serve players across the CRE ecosystem (banks, PE/hedge funds, CMBS traders, property owners, tenants, etc.) and views risk monitoring as the first service along an ambitious product roadmap that ultimately intends to disrupt the way that CRE is financed today.

Trident is at the pre-revenue stage with a proof of concept to originate, model, underwrite and hedge longevity derivatives on portfolios of life insurance.  Untapped demand for this longevity hedging transaction comes from banks, investment fund managers, and pension administrators.  Banks and insurance companies hold insurance policies and seek to find liquidity in the asset class through a investment grade counter party.  Investment fund managers will purchase life policies and offer the transaction to investors with longevity guarantees at a future date, in comparison to pension administrators who are willing to transfer the longevity exposure by paying premium.  Trident's platform includes proprietary financial models that develop portfolio parameters, simulate portfolio performance probabilities based on graduated mortality distributions, portfolio expenses and rates of return. The cover is secured by a custom insurance contract specific to Trident. 

Trident's business plan includes services for origination structuring, loss probability modeling, medical underwriting with life expectancy, portfolio demographic with performance tracking, and  longevity shortfall  that will be secured by an investment grade insurance issuer. 

Longevity is the risk of life insured living beyond the mortality expectations of a similar group of insured.  Longevity Shortfall is specific to portfolios that have an ending date to calculate investor returns and therefore have  exposure to shortfalls due to longevity.

The funds raised by this offering will be applied to general and administrative expenses, initiate the web interface with strategic partners, corporate identification, up grade and expand the computer platform and  equipment, and retain key personnel in accounting, sales and risk modeling. The funds will not be used to fund the longevity risk.  This is a convertible debt offering with a very attractive rate of return upon liquidation.

Drilling Resources through its outreach program created an innovative approach to providing our customers with cost effective equipment and services throughout the United States. This approach has equipped us with the quality, quantity, and availability of equipment and personnel needed in todays market without lessoning our Safety Advantage for our customers.  Drilling Resources, LLC is an oil and gas service company that specializes in various divisions of the industry from drilling support, waste management, surface rental equipment, housing and office accommodations,  trans loading of bulk material including pipe and transportation.  Drilling Resources serves all of the major play markets in the United States and is currently expanding its field services and manufacturing activities.  Drilling Resources has identified many small service companies that are established in the active regions but have suffered declines in their business due to the drop in drilling activities.  These companies are limited to the services they are able to provide and are unable to compete with the larger companies and reduced rates, which has caused their equipment to sit idle.  By combining other services and equipment into a single package, Drilling Resources is able to be competitive with pricing which allows a greater opportunity to compete with these larger firms.  Drilling Resources has been able to acquire the rights to use the equipment from these smaller companies at reduced prices.  These small companies would rather rent to Drilling Resources at reduced prices which allows them to cover their equipment costs instead of having the equipment sit idle with little hope to get it rented otherwise.

Banking is broken. Years ago people who needed business advice would turn to their local bank manager for help. The banker was thought of as a trusted member of the community. Nowadays people don't really like banks. Through consolidation banks have become bigger and bigger, and smaller banks that understood and served their communities have started to disappear. A recent US survey among millennials showed over two-thirds of them would prefer to go to the dentist than hear from their bank and one in three said they are open to switching banks in the next 90 days (source: Scratch Millennial Disruption Survey, 2014). In fact, the four largest banks in the US are among their 10 least-loved brands. It's even worse for artists. Their needs are not being served by banks, which see artists as high-risk and of little monetary value. Yet artists drive the $1.6 trillion creative economy, are the number-one influencers on social media and drive attitudes and purchase decisions of consumer audiences on a massive scale. FAB sees the dissatisfaction with banks as an opportunity to rebuild the traditional banking model and give artists what they need to thrive.   	 Artists everywhere have traditionally been underserved by banks, and have struggled to establish their value in the economy in general, FAB is designed from the ground-up for the creative community with the goal of becoming their trusted business advisor. To resolve these issues, FAB is launching two product offerings: the FAB Money App which will allow artists to understand and manage their money in a simple and engaging way; and FAB Advisory which will help artists make money from their art.

Band & Me is a promotional platform for bands that drives exponential growth by converting regular fans into raging evangelists. Band & Me unlocks the full potential of direct-to-fan promotion by using a one-to-one connection between the band and each fan that lets bands deliver experiences their fans have never dreamed possible, personal communications like a thank-you text message, an invite to join the band backstage after a gig, or a live video chat. And fans have access to all the band's content from across the web in Band & Me. As they engage and share content they automatically earn points towards special perks like exclusives and recognition events. Fans become part of the band's journey with the chance to rate and review new songs before they're released, and access to behind the scenes action with the band.  Bands using Band & Me to deliver these special experiences are rewarded with accelerated growth in new fans that's measured not in percentages but in multiples, because their fans respond by becoming evangelists raving  about the band to their networks of friends. This generates a continuous buzz that makes fan growth accelerate exponentially faster.    Our target market is not artists in the top 40, it's the 20,000 bands who generate $5 billion in sales each year and who can't afford spending on mass media like radio, print ad and retail displays to grow sales. They've tried to go directly to their fans using Facebook but social media's one-to-many connections prevents their promotions from feeling direct and personal, leaving the viral power of their fans untapped. Band & Me makes direct-to-fan promotion truly effective for the fir time with a one-to-one connection that makes promotion feel personal. We will receive a minority portion of the benefit in higher band income  through subscription fees, affiliate royalties and in-app purchase of digital goods by fans.

In the fall of 2012, Ryan Shearman was riding his motorcycle to work in New York City when he was rear-ended by a car. The accident threw him off his bike and across an entire lane of highway traffic. Fortunately, he walked away with only a minor concussion and some scrapes and bruises. Inspired by his accident, the life-long rider began researching crash statistics. He quickly discovered that although motorcycles cover less than 0.4% of all miles traveled in the US, motorcyclists account for nearly 15.0% of all road fatalities. On average, at least one motorcyclist dies on American roads every two hours. As a technologist, engineer, and product development specialist, Ryan felt compelled to create something that would make riding safer.   	 Guided by a passion for riding smart, Fusar is developing advanced consumer products that bridge the gap between action sports and wearable technologies. We call it Hardwear™. Our technologies will transform helmets from passive safety equipment to active safety devices that enhance the entire experience through the maximization of safety and enjoyment. We design, engineer, build and code everything. Ours are enthusiast’s products, purpose built by enthusiasts.

SAF-GLAS, LLC is located in the USA; the SAF product-line has been on the cutting edge of advanced glazing applications since 1992. SAF-GLAS, LLC is a Florida Limited Liability privately held company that owns and manufactures its patented proprietary inter-layer and glass products.   	Since our inception year of 1992, we have achieved crucial milestones that have positioned us at the technological forefront of the building industry. We are now beginning an exciting new phase of aggressive expansion that will allow us to fulfill the increasing global demand for our products.  Our EnergyGlass product-line, our inventions and achievements, new quality implementation methods, proprietary process and continued customer satisfaction have and remain to be the reasons for our Company and products continued success.   	EnergyGlass™ is an optically clear vertically installed building integrated photovoltaic glass window system that produces continuous energy from sunlight, diffused, ambient light and ground reflectance and the only 100% field of vision in the world. The entire surface of the windows is clear – No grids, dots or lines! This proprietary inorganic nano technology and solar collector does not degrade from IR like typical solar cells, do.   	EnergyGlass™ produces 1-2 watts per sq. ft. per hour for 10-12 hours during the day and 2-3 watts at peak dependent on location, size, orientation, thickness and formula. Energy generated can be inverted back to the grid, battery backup or direct to DC equipment! This means a FEED In Tariff opportunity could be available, thus generating revenue from windows and/or reducing a building’s energy consumption.

SimplyPeer is an IT consulting firm, just like many others – including giants such as IBM and HP. However, what makes SimplyPeer unique is the combination of its choice to specifically serve relatively smaller to mid-size corporate clients and the methods it has chosen to deliver services that are competitive in terms of quality and cost.   	These days, IT spans the core processes of corporate entities, large and small alike. The efficient conduct of organizational activities, so crucial to competitiveness and profitability, hinge on the ability to continually develop and maintain IT-enabled business processes. Hence, reliance on the services of IT professionals, systems designers and developers in particular, has become staple among the most progressive of business organizations. IT is a necessary cost of doing business.   	This cost, however, has been ever increasing. An obvious method for long-term cost control is the utilization of offshore human resources in fulfilling organizations’ IT staffing needs.  Large corporations have always enjoyed the benefits of having global reach and deep pockets, such that they are able to establish offshore subsidiaries that are actually captive service providers of IT services and other shared services. Using these methods, these organizations have been able to keep up with, if not outrun, the rising costs of IT services in the U.S.   	However,  SMBs perceive the option of IT function offshoring as a difficult prospect.   	SimplyPeer employs a business model that eliminates these difficulties. It is a cross-border operation that lets SMB clients enjoy the benefits of lower-cost IT personnel wages without the pains of managing and working with such human resources at a distance.   	SimplyPeer gives them a “peer” group of U.S.-based IT management professionals to work with directly, and in person if necessary. This peer group in turn would draw upon larger counterpart offshore teams in a manner that appears seamless to the SMB

This investment opportunity provides a unique combination of a very experienced Internet marketing expert group and the third largest daily fantasy sports wagering platform.  

The daily fantasy sports industry is an explosive phenomenon still in its formative phase.  The top two companies, Fanduel and DraftKings, have raised over $150 million in venture capital in the past six months, with total post money valuations of $700 million.   The investor list is blue chip, including KKR, Shamrock, Raine Group, Redpoint Ventures and NBC.  Nearly all of this new capital has been spent for customer acquisition, with the majority focused on sports television advertising.   The target market of young (30’s) males has been well educated on the availability of this exciting form of gaming.

Daily fantasy sports contests are considered skill based gaming – not gambling – and are legal in 45 of the 50 U. S. states.  Moreover, the professional sports leagues and teams have fully endorsed the fledging business, securing sponsorships and encouraging fan engagement.  Very importantly, fantasy sports are specifically carved out of, and do not apply to, the Federal Unlawful Internet Gambling Enforcement Act of 2006.  

FanWars LLC has teamed up with DraftDay.com, the number three daily fantasy sports site.  DraftDay was one of the earliest sites and has a very secure and robust technology platform, coupled with a large amount of player activity.  Outside of the top two companies, DraftDay is the only site offering multiple sports and game styles in quantities sufficient to keep player involvement.  This player activity, or liquidity, is measured by funds on deposit, prizes paid and other metrics.  Liquidity is THE criterion separating success from failure.  DraftDay has achieved and maintained its success with excellent customer service, great user interface, and good branding.  However, DraftDay has lacked the investment dollars needed to really grow its user base.

MyAgentFinder employs a creative business model that aligns its interests with agents and clients and that creates an opportunity to maximize its average revenue per user. Rather than just charge for leads, MyAgentFinder uses a unique data integration to know when a lead converts into a home sale, enabling them to charge agents a 25% referral fee on their commissions. This model incentivizes MyAgentFinder to perform quality screening on their leads, as its revenue is tied to an agent's ability to close transactions. As a result, agents using MyAgentFinder enjoy higher conversion rates, while buyers and sellers enjoy an efficient process in which they are matched with the most appropriate agent based on preferences, location and market specialization. Additionally, MyAgentFinder offers monthly and yearly subscription plans for premium service, supplying the company with a growing, recurring revenue base.

Purpose: This is a prefunded refinance & rehab opportunity for a Multi-Family Residential property in New Jersey. The subject property address is 306 S 10th St, Newark, New Jersey. The developer is requesting a loan of $181,000 in order to purchase, renovate and refinance the underlying property. The property was purchased for a total of $138,500 in March of 2015. There is moderate renovation needed for the underlying property, totaling $74,500. The borrower will receive 3 draw(s) totaling $173,760 over the course of the loan. The initial draw in the amount of $123,760 occurs when the loan is closed. The second draw will be disbursed in the amount of $25,000 when half of the renovation is complete, the third draw will be disbursed in the amount $25,000 when the renovation is completed.  306 S 10th StPurchase Price: $138,500Renovation: $74,500After-Rehab Value: $290,000 An independent third party appraisal commissioned by Patch of Land, shows an After Repair Value (ARV) of $290,000 for 306 S 10th St. The collective ARV ratio is 62.41% and is in line with the data we found during our due diligence process. Our research shows the residential market surrounding the underlying property in this area of Newark is stable and supply and demand are in balance.

American Century is a life insurance company located in Plano, TX that offers life insurance and annuities.

We partnered with a life insurance agency to offer our policies directly to consumers online and allow them to buy the policies directly on the web and without the involvement of an agent.

Currently, we have a special license in Texas that allows us to sell final expense life insurance policies with maximum face amount of $25,000.

Most of the requested capital needed will be used to meet the regulatory requirements to sell larger life policies and expand to additional states.

Small part will be used to fund operations since most of the first year premium is paid as commission to the partner agency.

There is no such offering in the market today and we believe there is a need for such product. Our partner agency has previously worked with an insurance subsidiary of a large bank that offered online purchase of such policies. This insurer sold $70 million of premium in one year. (the bank decided to get out of this non-core business.)

The need to write larger policies and not stay limited to the $25,000 face amount is because most policies will be term policies and only larger policies will drive high enough premium (average of $40/month) to make economical sense.

About American Century

We were  founded in 1940 as a burial association in Texas and converted to an insurance company in 1980.

Raz Silberman, current owner and president, purchased the company in March 2013 from previous owners in Tulsa, OK and brought it back to Texas.  The purchase was funded was Raz’s personal  money and the company has no debt. 

We are financially strong and our  financial ratios meet an A+ rated company standards. However, we do not have the additional capital required to write 

At the time of purchase the company was almost dormant and we have worked in the past two years to add products, agents, and clients.
BEst

Garden Fresh Farms is a scalable sustainable operation which can be replicated anywhere in the world.   	Our indoor agriculture systems operate in warehouses, use artificial light & are immune to droughts and other weather conditions effecting traditional agriculture. Fresh, natural food grown without pesticides produced near consumers. Our methods are financially sustainable and solve problems usually created by traditional agriculture & aquaculture farms.   	We pioneered growing produce in a dense and efficiency manner. Our patent pending growing systems use land 100 times more efficiently than traditional farming. Farms grow indoors, year round with less water, are energy efficient, & have low transportation costs.   	Our farms can be built next to grocery distribution warehouses, eliminating time, transportation costs and spoilage. We harvest every morning, package and deliver to distribution centers that afternoon. Products typically arrive in grocery stores within 24 hours of being harvested. 24Fresh means better nutrition, better taste and lower spoilage for the store and consumer.   	We are the 2013 CleanTech Open Global Forum National Sustainability Award winner, the Minnesota Cup, Eureka Award, St. Paul "Green Products" Award and several other honors.   	We are raising capital to expand into four new cities.

We are a new social gaming startup dedicated to innovating and disrupting the industry by introducing a new breed of multiplayer game--one that focuses on personalization, customization and real-time action.   	Our aim is to revolutionize social gaming by blending social media features into simple, real-time mobile/cross-platform multiplayer games.   	Future Social Features We're Working On: - Competitive Push Notifications - Like & Share Player-Made Content - Social Player Profiles - Social Activity Feeds   	Our mission is to bring the world together through social gaming.   	We are advocates for the multiplayer experience, and are excited to be working on bringing you the next generation of mobile apps and Facebook games.   	We’ve identified some fundamental gaps in the mobile/Facebook gaming world, between actual supply–existing games available for players, and ideal demand–what players really wish they were playing.   	Our vision is a transformed global marketplace of apps where multiplayer titles are more abundant than single-player offerings.   	We will help lead this transformation, shifting industry demand towards games that derive value from social, multiplayer experiences. These experiences should play a central role every time users open an app.   	We will also help bridge the gap between what gamers really want, and the actual supply of games available for mobile devices and Facebook — by creating, gathering feedback and co-creating with players.   	"Shared investment between players and developers will create a gameplay experience that players really want, because they helped create it." - Brian Douglas, Co-Founder DigiDopeGames   	Our Conviction (being gamers ourselves) is that a game is truly worth playing when it’s core value is derived from a shared experience with other real players.

PIPR_Name: Washington Oilfield Rentals And Machines Service   (WORMS)
PIPR_Description: WORMS is a startup company serving the oilfield in the Marcellus and Utica Shale regions of PA, OH and WV.  We aim to provide a new type of secondary containment for use on the drilling pads during operations. We repurpose old conex boxes ( shipping containers) into modular containment structures. At the drilling site these house chemicals, fuel cells, generators, and various other pieces of equipment that could possibly leak causing an enviromental hazard.  Currently the drilling companies most often use an expensive plastic liner that is laid down, walls built around using plastic pipe and plastic mats laid inside and finally gravel laid around the outside edge.  This is an expensive  method for containing thier oils and chemicals.   Our solution provides an enviromentally friendly and time saving approach for the operator. Our competitive rental day rates show value to the operator with the time that is saved from loading chemicals onto trucks when moving from pad to pad and no need for a 3-4 man crew to set up the plastic lining they are currently utilizing.  Once these units are fabricated from excess conex boxes that are sitting idle at ports all over the country there is very little maintenance or upkeep.

Already established for 32years which we will  taking over and running the same way as prior owner at first.  I will go in and observe operations and make appropriate changes which positively affect Labor, Budget and Ordering cost controls.

Every hour in the United States an estimated 20 million dekatherms of methane is flared and wasted to the atmosphere -- enough energy to heat over 6 million homes for an entire month. This fuel is being wasted because there has historically been no other cost effective alternative to using the low quality “dirty” gas produced at landfills, waste water treatment facilities and many oil / gas wellheads.     

Q2 Power (“Q2P” or the “Company”) is a renewable power company that utilizes proprietary technology and proven business models to monetize waste energy resources such as methane. Q2P is poised to capture a significant portion of this untapped market due to three key factors: 

•	We believe that our proprietary, patented technology is ideally suited for use with this fuel source. Our power systems are small, scalable and modular, and can be installed at the site of methane flares at a similar cost per kW as large-scale power plants. 

•	Our business model employs Power Purchase Agreements (PPA), which eliminate financial risks for our customers and reduce sales cycles. Unlike solar installations which are effective at most 6.5 hours per day, Q2P’s systems can generate power 24 hours a day, thus creating a far more attractive return on investment.   

•	Federal and local environmental crackdowns on methane emissions are creating urgency to install systems that can cost-effectively convert this wasted fuel source to usable power.   

With the methane that is wasted each year in the U.S., Q2P could generate over 9,100 Gigawatt hours of electrical power, representing a $900 Million annual total addressable market. At a 5% U.S. market penetration, Q2P could generate in excess of $45 Million per year, or $320 Million over a 7-year PPA term, with greater than a 40% unlevered, unsubsidized IRR.  Further, we estimate that the international markets are potentially 10 to 20 times larger than in the U.S.

Why we started ViaChat   	Customers are on mobile and overwhelmingly using messaging for personal communications, but cannot connect to businesses. We believe that text messaging is the preferred interface for simpler transactions but app-type graphical user interfaces are required for most business interactions. Each small business cannot have its app or require consumers to have them. Smaller businesses are increasing offering eCommerce, a $100B market that is growing at 30%, but these are web-oriented, not mobile focused. The related on-demand mobile services market (ordered from mobile but fulfilled offline) is impacting broad categories of the service economy (business services, transportation, food & dining, care services, health & beauty, delivery, events, travel), each solution requires users to discover and download their specific app. Although million plus apps exist on stores, typically less than 5-7 apps are actively used. Users prefer the app UI, but app discovery model is broken.   	These are some fundamental disconnects between consumer mobile experience and access to business commerce and services that ViaChat is trying to address.   	What sets us apart?   	ViaChat upgrades mobile messaging to a business commerce/services platform that can push custom apps to users providing ease of access and the elegance of graphical UX. ViaChat platform aggregates on-demand businesses to provide discovery, information, ordering, payment, fulfillment (off-line) and confirmation; in short it automates the service economy by enabling commerce and business services through applets over mobile messaging. We believe this is disruptive and transformational and will change forever how we get services from business.   	What is the our key to success?   	Viral growth with enterprise monetization model:   	Free mobile messaging for smaller business to connect to the millions that are already messaging   	Free custom apps that can automate commerce and service delivery while providing elegant user experience   	Let's business easily host products, services and offers with location based discovery   	Solutions customized for vertical markets -- food tech, education, community, customer service, etc   	Starting with pay for use – transaction fees charged only when the business gets value.

The Company’s primary purpose is providing operating capital, directly or indirectly, to one or more companies engaged in the business of pre-qualifying potential plaintiffs in mass tort personal injury cases.  In contrast to the “typical” litigation funding scenario, a few funding companies have begun to focus on funding cases arising out of large-scale claims involving personal injuries attributable to defective medical products or pharmaceuticals - otherwise known as “mass tort" claims. Mass torts are considered to provide a cost-effective alternative to lengthy and expensive traditional single-party litigation. These cases usually involve large corporate defendants, such as pharmaceutical and medical device manufacturers, that have already been found liable (or have conceded liability) with respect to a defective or harmful product. In most of such cases, the defendant establishes a settlement fund, to be administered by the court, and from which qualified claimants will be paid. In such cases, a plaintiff generally only needs to show (i) that his/her damages were caused by the defective product, and (ii) the extent of such damages.  When a prospective plaintiff is identified, the plaintiff undergoes a thorough screening (that can include interviews, detailed reviews of medical records, an independent medical examination and, if necessary, revisionary surgery) to determine that such plaintiff has a valid and viable claim for recovery. Once a plaintiff is qualified, he/she is referred to an experienced attorney who files a case, negotiates a settlement and obtains a financial recovery.   	•The mass tort process dates back to the 1960’s (not a new concept) •There exists NO market or traditional sector correlation or interest rate risk for this investment •This is not Litigation Funding.  We DO NOT provide funding to Law Firms or Plaintiffs.

PIPR_Description: ABC Packing and Specialized Transportation, LLC is a full service professional export packing and transportation brokerage  company located in Houston Texas.  ABC offers a service unique to the industry.  With one phone call a customer can have its goods packed, warehoused, and transported  from point A to B to C.  For example, ABC recently arranged for Tesco transportation (trucking and sea going  freight) and packing for a large piece (70' long)  of oilfield equipment that had to be packed, trucked from Canada to Houston, shipped to Guatemala, then trucked to El Salvador.  Additionally, ABC just received a mandate from Diamond Offshore to pack and truck two SPAR stacks for offshore drilling.  These two pieces are 29 and 30 feet long and 20 feet wide.  They weigh 369,000 and 528,000 LBS respectively.   	ABC is located in a 50,000.00 Sq. Ft. climate controlled warehouse / office facility located near George Bush Intercontinental Airport.  ABC was created by merging the packing and logistics activities of 2 of its 4 principals under the ABC umbrella.  ABC has been formed taking advantage of the Houston location, one of the busiest ports and airports in the country, a seasoned management team, and implementation of the newest software for packing / warehousing, transportation, and financial systems.

HALI Capital Group LLC is the management company behind the HALI group of funds currently being created. Through our flagship program RenoRev™, we eliminate  a homeowners stress of selling a less than perfect house by enabling homeowners, looking to sell their homes, the ability to achieve maximum equity from the sale. This is done by creating a partnership between the homeowner and us, paying for the renovation costs and handeling the entire project from start to finish.  The homeowner is able to relax while everything is handled for them. In return, we take a small percentage of the sales price as our compensation, when the property sells. This percentage, which is based on factors such as renovation cost, after repair value and the time to renovate and sell the property, come out to achieving our funds target return. The everexpanding need for this service coupled with our unique structure allows us to achieve returns in excess of 50% annually while at the same time shielding our capital from risk.   	We currently have one competitor located in California. We find our structure superior to theirs as they have not invested their resources into capital preservation and putting themselves at great legal risk. By having a focus on Capital Preservation and compliance with the Consumer Protection Act rather than just a quickness to market, we are ensuring our ability to serve the needs of homeowners and investors for years to come.   	For our larger transaction, we have already secured funding for up to $40,000,000in our sister partnership, to be used on projects exceeding $500,000. This fund (HALI Capital Group Opportunity Fund I) will be used to take advantage of the multitude of smaller opportunities that are just as profitable. Dividends will be paid quarterly.   	In order to focus more on the business at hand, fund administration will be handled by Fairway America.

This portal will appeal to all walks of life, those that are affluent and those that cannot normally afford to play at a higher level will all be given a chance at unfounded success.   	 What sets Sport-11 apart?   	 Our Elite Player Portal is the world's first software application specifically designed to give youth athletes and professional scouts direct access to one another.

Moni.ai is an interactive virtual assistant which allows you to perform different actions with the Internet of Things by simply using your voice.   	 With IoT, the problem is at the end-user level. Almost all connected devices have their own apps. To get anything done, people have to jump from app-to-app to control disparate devices, creating a disconnected, rather than a seamless or even enjoyable experience. As consumers increasingly become glued to their touch screens, we need a more natural way of interacting with technology.   	 Moni.ai provides a single platform from where users can navigate the internet of things with their voice. We’re making short work of complex tasks via simple conversational commands.   	 With our Channel on IFTTT, you can control your SmartThings, WeMo, Nest, LIFX, Philips Hue, and more! https://ifttt.com/moniai   	 Companies can add voice to their own apps on our platform, and use Moni.ai as a channel to showcase their product/service and connect with consumers.

Rowheels has entered the durable medical equipment market with a revolutionary propulsion system for manual wheelchairs, initially penetrating the advanced rehab end of the $4 Billion personal mobility market.  The patented design (USP 8,931,796) offers an enhanced, biomechanically efficient pull-based propulsion method that helps mitigate repetitive stress injuries, while correcting posture and spine position.  Patients and providers have long sought a product that extends the lifetime use of manual wheelchairs, thereby allowing for daily physical activity and a reduction in the incidence of various hypokinetic disorders. The initial Rowheels design has been reviewed by a significant cross section of the industry including Georgia Tech’s CATEA and RERC Labs, who concluded “the device is unique and possesses the potential of true innovation.

Rowheels have been engineered for higher performance, day to day use.  They are easier to transport and maneuver than competitive products and have a similar weight and profile to that of a conventional wheel, something highly desired by users.  Rowheels Rev1 wheels are a retrofit to existing wheelchair frames and are being marketed and sold as a replacement wheelset.

Sales were initiated in April 2015, after three years of extensive engineering, testing and tooling. Distribution is being established through providers, OEM partnerships, distributors and direct sales.  Relationships with strategic partners, physical therapists and industry manufacturers will be a key to driving business growth.  The aging population and the desire for higher quality medical products will drive long term growth opportunities. The Company is actively exploring an expanded corporate strategy that drives costs down and greatly expands overall market potential.  The high end Rev1 wheels are coded in the United States under HCCPS Code E2227 for medical necessity and are classified as a Class 1 Medical device by the FDA.

The emergence of an online lending marketplace has changed the way the world accesses credit. Investors and borrowers are no longer dependent upon the traditional banking system, which is known for its inefficiencies, waste, overhead, and red tape.   	Peer-to-peer and crowdfunding investors can now enjoy impressive returns on their small and large investments while borrowers benefit from a more direct lending relationship.   	The ExtraFunds Group funds and services loans in the short-term online lending marketplace. We are a financial solution for customers needing short-term credit, an industry segment that traditional banks have largely vacated. We offer efficient real-time underwriting, customer verification, and collection services for short-term marketplace lenders, providing customers with quick and efficient access to much-needed capital.   	More than 12 million Americans use short-term credit every year, spending approximately $7.4 billion annually. ExtraFunds services a robust short-term lending portfolio for its lending partner, with total revenues of more than $20 million since 2009.

RealCrowd is breaking down the barriers to real estate investing by providing a syndication platform that empowers real estate operators to manage their investors and augment their investor network through the power of the crowd.

RealCrowd is not building a real estate investment management or operating company. We are building a technology layer that fundamentally changes how raising private capital works. Our goal is to shift the balance of private investments into the hands of individual investors - providing access to the greatest wealth creation opportunities.

Our platform consists of the marketplace, a transaction management module and an investor relations/management module. Providing capital is only part of the equation to change how the markets work. An end to end solution needs to provide more value than money.

Galenus is incorporated in the state of Illinois, with the vision of providing medical solutions in the m-health domain.  The company is a joint venture between Logimed, LLC, an Illinois-based company, and Renu Electronics, based in India. A closer look at Galenus reveals a core team of a physician, TeleHealth industry leader, and a business and technology owner who have come together to create vision for Galenus and make that vision a reality.  Galenus’s team is focused on providing remote healthcare, also known as Telehealth.   	  The world of healthcare has been changing for over a decade in ways that moves the healthcare consumer closer to a direct relationship with personal health care providers and health care teams.  With the increase in chronic conditions, more and more patients are considered near-risk, at-risk, and high risk for developing chronic conditions are experiencing complications from chronic conditions.  With health care costs increasing in percentage of the GDP every year, health care consumers, payers, and clinicians are all looking for more efficient, effective, and lower cost alternatives to traditional health care models.  Galenus -Scientific® brings Ossler to the market as a solution to many of these issues.   	  Ossler is a remote exam device, not to be confused with remote monitoring equipment that puts diagnostic tools in the hands of the patient, and connects the primary care provider or other health care clinician, to the patient, in a cost effective, simple platform. With imbedded exam equipment such as a stethoscope for listening to heart and lungs, an otoscope for looking into ears and the throat, and a hand held camera, all components of a physical exam required to safely care for patients can be accomplished.  Ossler provides significant value to the clinician, the patient, and the health plan – while improving access too.

GreenFuelsUSA  supplies fuel retailers, and other fuel use sources, with a storage tank monitoring system that recognizes the introduction of any contamination, while precisely managing fuel levels, 24 hours per day 365 days per year.  When contamination is found the system dispatches technicians to inspect and then remove contaminants, leaving the fuel clean and ready to use.  On leaving the facility, the process provides the retailer, or tank owner, with video validation that contamination does not exist in the tank. The company offers retailer driven advertising and operational management from the gathered  monitoring data. The income generated for GreenFuelsUSA come from monthly and service related fees.  There are 127,000 retail fuel outlets and over 1,000,000 more tanks of other categories in North American alone and the market for these services is very large and unserved at this time.  The company will deploy technicians and service equipment from regional hubs starting in Texas, Oklahoma and surrounding states.  The process is a GREEN company due to the fact that clean fuel emits less than 35% of the CO2 into our air than common unclean fuels do.  There are some tax advantages to investment in GreenFuelsUSA as well as  projected income from stock or convertible ownership over time.  The entire technology package from GreenFuelsUSA is a major change in fuel station management and recording / security management of that station or stations.  The advertising and hands on real time management tools, will allow station management to monitor all fuel related operations from any location 24 hours per day 365 days per year. The technology is well proven and deployed to date.

SlideBatch is an innovative new web application that cuts through content overload on the web with a simple concept of a "Batch", which has ubiquitous appeal to both publishers and consumers. A "Batch" is the right mix of content, delivered at the right place and time to a target audience.   	SlideBatch's technology platform is robust, scalable and cloud-based, with a unique media-first approach that includes built-in encoding and playback of any mix of media types, including videos, images, documents, websites, music and podcasts. Easy authoring tools allow media to be collected from anywhere, directly curated from the Web using a built-in web search tool, uploaded from local hard drives and imported from popular cloud storage services.   	The SlideBatch tool enables marketers and PR professionals to improve the quality, variety and frequency of published content, leading to deeper audience engagement. SlideBatch is a freemium product, with a featured free version to encourage wide spread adoption, with SaaS conversion to more features and branding options for professional, business and organizational use. A mix of marketing tactics will be used to drive adoption in our target audiences, including email campaigns, ad buys, sponsorships, social placements and influencer partnerships.   	SlideBatch is also a publisher of well-curated, digital content. Batching of digital content is a new form of publishing--much like blogging was 10 years ago. SlideBatch is paving the way to "clean up" content around ideas, make it intelligent, engaging, re-usable, easy to find, follow and share. In short, the way consumers want and need it. SlideBatch's publishing channels will be monetized with ads, sponsorships and promotions.   	The potential market for SlideBatch is large and high growth – essentially anywhere digital content is organized, presented and shared with a purpose. Publishing tools and platforms in the space have been very successful, with SlideShare being the most similar competitor to SlideBatch.

Founded in 1986, Interstate Auto Auction® is a progressive, dealer only vehicle auction established in 1986. The facility is located right of I-69 in Anderson Indiana, minutes from Fishers, Muncie, Noblesville, and Indianapolis. As of 2014, the original owner sold the established business to Colin Martin. Colin's passion for cars stems back to his 30 year family automotive business. Colin has invested over $800,000 in personal funds into this business. His vision for Interstate Auto Auction® is Small Auction Service, Big Auction Amenities. 

The philosophy of Interstate Auto Auction® is to give dealers an inviting and efficient auction experience. We appreciate the loyal dealers that have been attending to our auction for many years. We contract well respected auctioneers recognizable at auto auctions in Indiana and Ohio. Our sales are every Monday at 5pm, gates open at 4pm. We often have free food and cash giveaways. The 3 lane auction has undergone a complete remodel in 2015 including the installation of a high tech auction management system. We now offer inventory bar code decals, wireless handheld scanners, flat screen 49" LCD auction screens, bidder badges, and dealer ID cards. The auction will soon offer the Midwest's only live Monday simulcast auction. Dealers can log in remotely to bid on vehicles while watching the live video stream. Interstate Auto Auction® is a candidate for membership in the National Auto Auction Association in efforts to expand our capabilities for Auction Access, OVE, Auction Pipeline, and AutoIMS.  Interstate Auto Auction® is an executive member of Madison County Chamber of Commerce, a BBB Accredited Business, and member of the Indiana Independent Auto Dealers Association.

The future: expansion of the Interstate Auto Auction®  brand by acquiring 3-5 existing auto auctions over the next 5 years.

An urban winery experience combining craft brewery attitude with Whole Foods® mentality.   	Vinavanti Urban Winery produces local wine at its purest, and is expanding and relocating to a high-visibility location in one of San Diego's trendy urban neighborhoods. Locals are young, educated, employed, enjoy going out, and are concerned about nutrition, health and social/environmental issues. San Diego also annually attracts over 8 million overnight, leisure tourists traveling without children.   	Country wineries offer a bucolic experience, but at an hour drive away. Urban wineries are a closer option, but generally don't use local grapes and/or natural wine making practices. Wine bars and restaurants offer drinks and food, but little differentiation and no winery experience.   	Embodying "Drink Adventurously", customers at Vinavanti enjoy an authentic winery experience – at a convenient location. The tasting room features communal tables and an energetic, low-pretension, "upscale industrial" vibe. Winery tours offer customers an intimate experience and an entertainment attraction. The food menu focuses on small plates of wine-friendly fare made with natural, local ingredients. A small selection of beer and brandy cocktails appeases the non-wine-drinker in a group.

Moni.ai is an interactive virtual assistant which allows you to perform different actions with the Internet of Things by simply using your voice.   	 With IoT, the problem is at the end-user level. Almost all connected devices have their own apps. To get anything done, people have to jump from app-to-app to control disparate devices, creating a disconnected, rather than a seamless or even enjoyable experience. As consumers increasingly become glued to their touch screens, we need a more natural way of interacting with technology.   	 Moni.ai provides a single platform from where users can navigate the internet of things with their voice. We’re making short work of complex tasks via simple conversational commands.   	 With our Channel on IFTTT, you can control your SmartThings, WeMo, Nest, LIFX, Philips Hue, and more! https://ifttt.com/moniai   	 Companies can add voice to their own apps on our platform, and use Moni.ai as a channel to showcase their product/service and connect with consumers.

TFP has decades of experience in acquisition, development and management in retail properties around the nation.   	The principals at TFP have been a powerful force in real estate for years. We've achieved success by adhering to a core group of principles: diversifying holdings to weather fickle financial trends and climates; keeping debt low in order to ensure capital is always working for us and our clients; and providing extensive expertise to manage and operate our own properties. These qualities combine to ensure TFP's success.   	In an age of ever-more questionable decisions and rapid-fire investment deals, it's encouraging to find a real estate company whose success is a direct result of rock-solid core principles and proven management philosophies. This is stability.   	Some may call it a magic touch. But TFE has anticipated variable market trends, and strategically acquired targeted properties to profit from them. This nearly uncanny ability to readily adapt to an ever-changing real estate market is the key element that separates us from other investment firms – we provide growth and profitability, regardless of what is happening in the market. In truth, magic has little to do with it; our success stems from a very down-to-earth combination of insight and acumen... of diligence and expertise... and of hard work. That is what has helped us build and maintain an enviable level of performance.

The StorMaxx Self Storage Project (“Project”) will purchase a property in Cleburne, Texas that was previously used as a nursing home and convert the building into a climate-controlled self storage business.  The total Project investment is estimated to be $355,000, comprising a $120,000 property purchase price  and $235,000 for repairs and improvements.   	The Project will be 100% debt funded and  all loans will be at a 6% annual interest rate with payments made monthly.  The Project loan structure will provide for interest-only payments to investors for the first 2 years, in order to minimize costs while the business increases its occupancy rate.  For years 3 through 22 of the loan, investors will receive principle and interest payments based on a 20-year amortized loan structure.   	The financial summary assumes that units will be rented at a rate of 4 units per month until an occupancy rate of 85% is achieved.  The Project is forecasted to generate a pre-tax loss of ~$40,000 in the first year of operation.  This loss will be funded by the Project Sponsors.  The Project is forecasted to reach a positive cash flow status in year 2, and reach 85% occupancy early in year 3.  Once the Project reaches 85% occupancy it will generate annual pre-tax profits of ~$36,000 and have a debt coverage ratio of 2.1.   	Cleburne is a growing suburb of the Dallas/Ft. Worth metroplex with a current population of ~30,000.  Substantial  growth is expected in the near future due to the new Chisholm Trail toll road that opened in 2014, which connects Cleburne with Ft. Worth.  Development is already occurring along the toll road corridor and new housing subdivisions are planned in the Cleburne area.  This should translate into a need for more self storage services in the area.  And, as most of the existing self-storage businesses have only a small percentage of climate-controlled units, the Project’s offering of 100% climate-controlled units should be attractive to the self-storage consumer.

PIPR_Name: Effluent Free Desalination Corporation a/k/a EFD Corp.
PIPR_Description: Lack of adequate clean water for drinking and agriculture is one of the most important challenges facing the world today. This growing crisis is fueled by drought, pollution and population growth. Effluent Free Desalination Corp (EFD) has the patented solution to the problem.   	 While there is plenty of water, most of it is salty seawater. Even in inland areas, the water is often unusable due to salt or pollution. The main technology used today for desalination, known as Reverse Osmosis (RO), produces the unfortunate by-product of toxic concentrated brine. In coastal areas, where existing desalination facilities are dumping concentrated brine back in the ocean, there are major public and regulatory objections to the RO technology. In inland areas, there is no environmentally acceptable way to dispose of the toxic brine.   	 EFD has a unique patented solution which produces no brine and eliminates major environmental objections. EFD's technology is the combination of two well-known and well-understood technologies. It produces distilled water and dry salt. The process is effective for both high volume production of fresh water and for the cleansing of dirty water from agricultural runoff and industrial waste.   	 It can even eliminate the concentrated toxic brine from existing desalination plants. The sale of both the water and the salt makes EFD's technology much more profitable than other desalination methods.   	 The combination of the worldwide need for clean water and EFD's patented technology creates an enormous opportunity to make a difference in the world environmentally and to make a substantial return on investment for investors.   	 We have corporate headquarters and a manufacturing facility near Sacramento, California, where we are building a mobile demonstration machine. We plan to complete the machine in late 2015 and hold a major launch event in early 2016. We will manufacture mobile machines with capacities of 30,000 to 300,000 gallons per day and will license our technology to large contractors to build fixed site and utility scale plants around the world.   	 EFD's patent was issued in 2013 US 8496787 B2.   	 Worldwide patent filed in December 2014 - PCT International Application No. PCT/US2014/072273; O/R:EFRD-001/00WO 322892-2001

Functional Family Medicine is the only Direct Primary Care medical practice in Albuquerque, NM. Direct Primary Care practices are opening their doors all across the country. DPC is primary health care with insurance removed from the equation. We do not take insurance. We have a membership based business model in which our members pay a low monthly fee. They receive same and next day appointments, on time visits and unhurried time with their provider. We have no co-pays, no-deductiables, no insurance headaches at all. 

In our model the provider is free to deliver real personalized care to our members. An insurance company is not making the decisions about our member's health care. Those decisions are between the patient and the provider, like they should be. Our members receive unlimited visits and around the clock access to their provider. We make house calls, at no additional cost, if our members are too sick to come to the office. One of our medical staff will over see a member's care if they should need to be hospitalized, in person. The level of care we provide is unparalleled.

The average wait time national to see a primary care provider is nineteen days with an average of office visit of eight to twelve minutes. That is not health care. That is sickness management, at best! We are all acutely aware of the heath care crisis facing our country. Their is a huge shortfall of primary care providers and that shortage is increasing daily. There are less and less providers and more and more people in need of and gaining access to health care insurance. The health care bases primary care insurance model is broken. That reality has caused a huge oppertunity for  Direct Primary Care practices. 

The margins in the Direct Primary Practice model are unbelievable. The market is literally untouched the growth potential and market stability are unquestionable. There is good reason that the Direct Primary Care model is the fastest growing form of primary care in America.

We are a 15 month old food truck and catering business....with the catering arm of the business doubling in the last two months. We are the only European truck in the SF Bay area circuit, and the only truck serving pasta. We have a very creative and delicious menu with vegan and gluten free options difficult to find on food trucks. On our catering side, we have signed up with three companies and also do private catering, and we will do anything the client needs, with or without the truck. We do weddings, corporate events, festivals and we are often booked daily for doubles on the food truck with a corporate drop off catering on the side. The business has grown so fast and I have been working to pay off the food truck and now it is PIF but in the meantime I took equity loans on the business. I am working on getting an SBA loan now that I own the foodtruck, but in the meantime would love to be able to fund the personal and COG required to continue the growth. The SBA loan would pay off any other loans that I have and my SBA lenders are extremely positive, it's just a timely process. Whatever I might get from EquityNet would go to pay off loans as well and feed the operating capital until the SBA loan comes in. At this point our growth has been (100% in the last two months). I am a biochemist with an MBA and I love to cook, published in Sunset Magazine, and have a full time software sales position. Our food truck ROCKS!! We've been voted one of the top 10 in the Bay Area and recently I was on a speakers panel for food truck start ups. I know this business now inside and out and we have our stride on. I'm looking for investors who know a good deal when they see it and want to be paid back within the next 6-12 months if not sooner when the SBA loan comes in.

BLACKS NETWORK, INC. (“Blacks Network”) is a Texas corporation focused on the development and delivery of a global cable television network channel (“Blacks Network Television”) focusing on the life and issues of African Americans worldwide. The Company aims to achieve a preeminent position in the cultural cable television industry based on the concept of cultivating loyal, brand specific consumer segments within the targeted market.

Features:
Blacks Network Television will offer creative and interactive programs for African American and minority young adults covering such topics as lifestyle, culture, music, job opportunities, school challenges, and dealing with life as a pre-adult .

 It will appeal to people in the United States, Africa, Canada, and United Kingdom.

The cable television programming will feature African American and minority young adults as the actors and creatives. Competitive Advantage Blacks Network is positioned to experience rapid growth and outperform in a challenging marketplace for the following reasons:

• The Company’s cable television channel is included in a burgeoning and rapidly expanding market

truBrain is creating the world's #1 functional food and beverage brand. Our mission is to help people be more productive and efficient, so they can get out of the office and onto the rest of their lives. There is clearly a significant need and the opportunity for truBrain is enormous.

PIPR_Description: MDA360, during 2014 through STAC Solutions, its sister company and a Service Disabled Veterans Owned Business, has closed multiple lines of business contracts encompassing enterprise IT systems hosting, operations and management (network management, application management, MSP services); security training and planning and access control and security systems. MDA360, through STAC is currently working with the DHS, California Fusion Centers, the Department of State, DOS, and multiple foreign governments to develop plans for the rollout of this application.  The customer base that has been developed through STAC contributes the infrastructure network with which to deliver this product to the markets. MDA360 intends to develop its own data analysis product, MDA360Insight, and to deliver that product under a Software as a Service (SAAS) model.  This product is being developed through our access to databases, sensors and analytic and situational awareness platforms for the specific needs of our clients.  Through our deep involvement in cost effective solutions, audio and video analytics, security and counter-terrorism (CT) as it relates to training, planning and development and capabilities to handle the collection, interrogation, detention, and reintegration of criminals and violent extremists, we intend to develop and deliver analytic solutions across our platform as MDA360Insight, and to continuously develop the product further for the needs of our expanding customer base. The purpose of the S & J’s Glass Alley is to provide the area with different levels of a family entertainment bowling alley, which caters primarily to families, young adults, and older adults in the High Desert of Southern California. S & J’s Glass Alley will be equipped with 20 bowling lanes and the owners will expand the number of bowling lanes within 3-5 years to 30 lanes. S & J’s Glass Alley will be equipped with state of the art bowling lane systems, comfortable and modern furniture, and exemplary equipment to ensure customer satisfaction. On the premises will be administrative offices, a billiard room with 10 tables, laser tag, arcade room, and a modern bar lounge with comfortable couches and chairs. Furthermore the owners will add more entertainment features within 1-2 years, which will include a modern bumper car system and an indoor black light miniature golf course.
 
The bar lounge will be equipped with several flat screen televisions. S & J’s Glass Alley bar lounge will have array of beer choices on tap and will serve a variety of mixed and signature drinks. There will also be a modern full service restaurant that can seat 50-75 people that serves authentic American/Italian cuisine on the premises. The facility will have a first-rate sound and lighting system. The services will be offered at a competitive price and pricing will be reviewed periodically. We plan to become the premier family entertainment center in the area within one year.  We will be the only indoor family entertainment center in Southern California to offer such entertainment features in a modern setting that caters to families, young adults, and older adults alike. 

We will offer the investor 30% equity in the company for investing $500,000.00 and there is a great return on investment. At 30% equity in the company, the investor will profit $5,471,504.85 within a 5 year period.

PIPR_Description:
GUTERMAN NY PARTNERS, LLC,  a Delaware  Limited Liability Company (the "Company"),  is offering accredited investors the opportunity to partner with Gerald Guterman and his operating partners, for the purpose of acquiring multi-family apartment buildings & hotels located in New York, Miami/Miami Beach and Atlanta, in order to convert the properties to condominium ownership. GUTERMAN PARTNERS, LLC is the Sponsor and Gerald Guterman, is the majority owner and managing member of the Sponsor. 

Mr. Guterman is a successful owner/operator for 46 years and has successfully converted multi-family residential apartments to condominium ownership for 36 years.

In condominium conversions, Gerald Guterman as individual sponsor, successfully converted approximately 12,000 multi-family residential apartments to condominium ownership ($3.3.1Billion).

 As fee paid managers, the Guterman companies have directly managed more than 60,000 unaffiliated, third party owned, multi-family residential apartments ($16.8Billion). 

As owner/operators, the Guterman companies purchased, owned & operated approximately 15,000 multi-family residential apartments, including New York's original Roosevelt Island apartment community ($2.65Billion). 
   
In multi-tenant office buildings and hotels thru portfolio acquisitions, Gerald Guterman directly negotiated the acquisition and planned the operations of one of the largest single portfolios of office properties and hotels in U.S. history, from the Resolution Trust Corporation and its successors in interest, the FDIC and the FSLIC. The acquiring entity known as Patriot American Investors, was a core of the Mack-Cali REIT office portfolio and the beginning of Patriot American Hospitality, subsequently Wyndham Hotels & Resorts ($3.00Billion).

SINCE 1969 AND THROUGH THE LAST FORTY-SIX YEARS, GERALD GUTERMAN’S COMPANIES HAVE NEVER LOST A PROPERTY TO FORECLOSURE OR FAILED TO DELIVER A PROJECTED DISTRIBUTION TO INVESTOR/PARTNERS.

OKAIR Aviation, Inc. is a 23 year old Oklahoma US citizen company in business since 1992.   	It's President, James Ray has over 40 years aviation related experience ranging from TWA airline pilot to CEO and bankruptcy workout and turnaround specialist. Mr. Ray was directly involved in three venture capital bankruptcy turnarounds and has acted as advisor to other companies.   	Mr. Ray has experience in aircraft maintenance management, flight operations, aircraft maintenance inspections, field evaluations and inspections, technical services support, and FAA certifications including PMA, Original Type, and STC certifications.   	OKAIR is a 23 year old aviation operations and management company with a wide range of aviation experience. OKAIR successfully remarketed 12 aircraft during the most difficult period following the catastrophic 9-11-2001 influences on the aviation market. These aircraft included three SN 500 series, four SN 600 series, and five SN 700 series Fairchild Metro III aircraft. Two aircraft were modified to Metro III Heavy aircraft.   	OKAIR has imported other various Regional Aircraft from Canada, New Zealand, and Mexico and subsequently remarketed the aircraft in the United States, Australia and the Bahamas.   	OKAIR has been involved directly in various aspects of Asset Management of aircraft for clients in the USA and internationally including Bolivia and New Zealand. Management of assets has included appraisals of Metro II & III aircraft and market analysis for Bombardier DHC-7 and SabreLiner jet aircraft.   	OKAIR also has experience in Aircraft Leasing/Financing, Litigation Support, Valuations, Acquisitions, Buyer Representation, FAR Part 121/135 FAA Certification and Operations, Business and Commercial Flight Operations, Logistics, Feasibility Studies, and Cost/Benefit Analysis.   	OKAIR has held an FAA Air Carrier Operating Certificate and has previously contracted with the US Postal Service, Federal Express, and UPS.

RRB Development, LLC (“RRB”) is a commercial real estate development and consulting firm located in Atlanta, Georgia.  We are actively seeking Equity Investors to invest in the development of Self Storage facilities primarily in the Atlanta MSA.  Please contact us for a full Offering Memorandum of the projects we are currently working on.  Self Storage has proven to be the best performing asset class in Commercial Real Estate and provides investors with stable cash flows that have proven to be highly resilient to market swings.  Self Storage has proven to provide the highest investor returns over a 5, 10 & 15 year period and has had the lowest mortgage default and mortgage loss rate of any other commercial real estate asset class for the last 15 years.   	In addition to aiding in managing its existing legacy assets including, retail, office and self storage properties, as well as offering third party development consulting and project management services, RRB is actively focused on expanding its asset base in the Self Storage asset class. RRB's goal is to develop, acquire and/or construct Class A self storage facilities in strategically located and underserved market areas across the Southeast. RRB’s newly acquired and/or developed self storage facilities will be managed by professional third party property management companies which utilize the most modern technology and time tested methods to drive efficiency and profitability.   	We  feel strongly that current and long-term demographics and market acceptance of the product, coupled with the lack of newly built supply has created an amazing window of opportunity to develop more self storage facilities.

PIPR_Description: Surface Preparation Solutions "Thinks Green": "Think Green" is a Surface Prep company'sinitiative to identify and promote products and applications that are environmentally friendly-SPS "Think Green" was and is our company's mandate to create, green, energy efficient technologies for the surface preparation industries.   	Pursuant to this mission statement, The Surface Prep's Team of engineers developed a new innovative, green, patent pendingelectro-magnetic technology that propels an abrading particulate material (grit) to create a profile for the steel and other surface preparation industries.   	Four years ago, we saw a niche that by using electro-magnetic energy to propel a ferrous material (grit) for steel surface preparation that created no carbon footprint, did not need any motors or compressors and was approximately 95% more energy efficient than the current technologies and could have an impact on the environment as well as to achieve a good Return on Investment (ROI)-Therefore we decided to build a "Proof of Concept" that successfully demonstrated the viability of this new technology to industry professionals and experts in the field of pulsed power, which proved the feasibility of propelling grit using electro-magnetic energy to create a profile on steel for coating.

Chemistry Spirits' technology is disruptive to each consumer product industry it comes in contact with.   	The technology is a chewable matrix that suspends core ingredients in a variety of shapes. accomplishing shelf stability without refrigeration and embodies the capabilities of masking bitters with various flavor masking techniques. Chemistry Spirits chewable matrix can be tailored in a number of ways; color, translucency, pearl essence, all natural flavors & colors.   	Chemistry Spirits will be introducing Boon Vodka in the spirits industry. We have assimilated a team of top Global DJs and venues to showcase the technology. Boon Vodka will introduce the garnish of every future cocktail. Whether frozen to replace ice in cocktails or simply to replace the lime in your glass, our team is focused on providing premium product and enhancing every user experience.

The Foundation, with a $200,000 grant from the Song family has completed 3 year study identifying and testing eleven factors that contribute to a more favorable cancer outcome than would occur if these factors were minimized, negative or ignored (study results were from scientific testing of over 500 cancer victims in a 3 state area and were reliable to a 92% statistical probability). Using these test results, the foundation has developed a “Cancer Survival Map” which gives a computer generated “quality force” and “failure rating” for each cancer victim requesting foundation help. In other words, the information we receive from the client relating to any client’s cancer treatment allows us (using our computer model) to assign a success or failure score and where a score is negative recommend alternatives and improve survival.

DreamHomes Club, LLC is founded for developing and selling a product currently branded as 'DreamHome' . 'DreamHome' is currently a Facebook based solution for experiential marketing of apartments developed by a real estate developer.  DreamHomes Club, LLC would attempt  to gain a patent on this concept  after product gets shape and getting optimized through market demands.

This product provide a platform for a Facebook user ( anybody not necessarily a potential buyer ) to virtually furnish an appartment which is exact model of a specific project of a real estate developer.  She then shares it through Facebook and look for reviews from her friends on her creativity of beautifying the apartment.  Her  motivation would be to make the apartment maximum beautiful so that she gets maximum appreciation in a quarter and win coupons from real estate developer on purchase of the apartment. If she is not planning to buy an apartment, she can pass that coupon to her friends as a good will or deal to them. When a friend receives a Facebook request to appreciate her 'DreamHome' , her friend gets an idea which he might not have even thought off but apply his imagination to do better than his friend and look for appreciations again to win coupons. This product helps to socially level up creativity and peak of creativity becomes a brand for real estate developer. This results faster sales or sales at higher price. Real estate developer can offer coupons from their negotiation margins and can put conditions as they want. DreamHomes Club, LLC will work with real estate developer to arrive at most business benefiting coupon offer.
DreamHomes Club, LLC gets revenue for establishing and running this system for real estate developers. It expects huge advertisement revenue especially of furniture brands.

Company mission is to provide whole world the magic of experiential marketing prospects and it also aims buyers to have an option to envision dream home they are planning to purchase

PIPR_Description: This is a fully pre-funded purchase and renovation real estate investment opportunity for a multifamily property in Ossining, NY.   	The developer requested a loan in the amount of $300,000 in order to purchase and renovate the property. After completion, the borrower intends to hold the property in his investment portfolio and refinance into conventional financing. The developer purchased the property for $164,750 on April 29, 2015.
