As most of the world progresses towards ubiquitous connectivity, some communities are left on the wrong side of the digital divide. Globally, there are 4 billion people without access to the Internet, and 90% are from the developing world. The FCC-certified RuralConnect radio seeks to close that gap.   	  Using spectrum from vacant TV channels (referred to as TV White Space), the RuralConnect signal can travel long distances around hills and through foliage to provide extended broadband connectivity to non-line-of-sight locations where traditional technology can't reach.   	  The third generation RuralConnect radio will be capable of:  	  - Connecting up to 100 clients,  	  - Covering an area 20 kilometers in diameter of the base station,  	  - Enabling an affordable community hotspot utilizing minimal infrastructure, 	  - Achieving speeds up to 25 Mbps.

How cliché it is for a company to say we want to "change the world", however if you're not in it to change the world, even if in the smallest of ways, then why bother doing anything at all. At Skylar Forrest Games we will change the world, in more ways than one, and are leveraging ourselves to do just that, through one of the largest and fastest growing medians in the world today, games. Our games will reinvent old ideas and will introduce new, never before done concepts. We will not produce freemium games, nor will we milk our customers with over priced add ons and/or expansions. In a fast changing industry, will we keep pace, deliver on our word, always remember the gamer and become the new standard in the gaming industry, inclusive!   	The company's vision is to bring people of the world together by means of fun, challenging and socially interactive games, and our mission in the simplest of terms is to be innovative & unique.   	In order to achieve this, we'll be known as a business of excellence that:   	 	provides high-quality, multi-level strategy games to a broad audience; 	provides a culture that instills quality in everything we do; and 	provides growth and challenge to its customers, the company, our employees, and our business partners. 	   	Some of the most successful and classic games of all time are playable by the whole family, however with today's market, many of the new games have demographical gaps, such as age, number of players and simplicity. SFG has solutions to fill these gaps. We will start with the launch of Stack 'Em 5™, a brand new, patented, strategy board game. Stack 'Em 5™ is very unique, yet has many of the attributes of such classics as Tic-Tac-Toe, Chess, Checkers, Connect4 and even Pente. Board games are on the rise once again and strategy games are the fastest growing vertical within the industry. Just this past March, NBC's Nightly News and The Today Show helped solidify this point with reports on the increasing number of board game cafes, that are popping up all over America as well as the growing popularity of the social aspect. Stack 'Em 5™ is primed for success due to both timing and need. The time is clearly now and with an age range of 5-95, the simplicity to learn the game almost instantly and the ability to have up to 8 players at once, Stack 'Em 5™ is the opportunity any investor should take a closer look at.

OfficeWork Software creates applications that help companies with developing a more efficient and engaged workforce. Our OrgChart family of applications accommodates all platforms and elegantly turns a company's human resource data into visualizations that facilitate workforce planning. In addition to software applications, OfficeWork Software provides professional services to accelerate our clients' learning and business transformation objectives.   	The company was founded in 2005 when the initial OrgChart application was released. At that time our clients needed an automated means to convert their HR data into organization charts. Since then the scope of our objective has broadened to helping companies with tools for continuous organizational change. Today we have over 7,000 customers which include Fortune 100 companies, educational institutions, government and non-profit. Among our customers are such names as Verizon, Ford, GM, Fender Musical Instruments, Match.com, Roku, IBM, and Virgin America. Our government customers include the Veterans Administration, the U.S. Department of Energy, the FAA, the U.S. Office of Patent and Trademarks and the federal governments of Canada, UK, Australia and South Africa.   	We have over 30 years of technical and industry experience with workforce planning and organizational charting solutions and our array of solution platforms will solve the needs of any company; these include Cloud, desktop, and client-server enterprise. Our latest Cloud technology, OrgChart Now represents the most complete solution in the application space. With our Cloud strategy we have partnered with many payroll, HRIS and Talent software companies. This means our Cloud solution will give customers access to their people data no matter where it resides.These solutions support companies of any size (up to 500,000 employees), any geography, and any structure.   	In addition to offering the most complete array of technologies for workforce planning and organizational charting we also demonstrate a passion for high quality and excellent customer support.

EasyAsk is the leader (per Internet Retailer and Gartner) in advanced, intelligent eCommerce search. Mobile commerce (M-Commerce) is a $250 billion market, and growing exponentially. Traditional eCommerce search engines are all keyword search based. This is technology that has been abandoned by all the major search vendors: Google, Yahoo, Microsoft, etc. each of these companies has evolved to use an intelligent semantic, Natural Language model. EasyAsk is the only eCommerce search solution that uses this advanced model.   	As eCommerce transactions are going mobile, the Smartphone is now the primary shopping device. This mandates a new user experience, one that is smarter, more intuitive and voice-enabled. Apple spearheaded this UX with Siri, Google followed suit with GoogleNow. EasyAsk has developed, deployed and is leading the way with voice enabled, 1 button eCommerce search. Truly a magical experience and one that is driving dramatically more revenue to eCommerce vendors.   	Why should you invest now? Earlier investors get significantly higher returns as this investment is pre-VC. Investing now instead of later maximizes upside valuation.

Paygevity is a New York City-based global technology-driven payment processing and vendor management company. It focuses on the critical supply chain services industry. PromptPay™, Paygevity's proprietary platform, combines powerful electronic invoicing and connectivity technology with reliable fast payments capabilities. This significantly reduces corporate enterprise costs. The company serves vendors, suppliers, corporations and governments.   	Paygevity's PromptPay™ platform provides vendors with the capacity to get paid faster (within 10 days) and at the lowest possible cost. Paygevity is a one-stop shop for 21st century supplier payments and enhances supplier management via analytics. It also optimizes cash flow for both suppliers and buyers.   	Paygevity generates revenues based on a fee percentage charged on all invoice amounts promptly paid and processed in the trillion dollar supply-chain marketplace.   	Our technology has the capacity to capture historical information associated with payments, including purchase order, full invoice, underlying contract information, SKU's, and pricing. PromptPay™ can easily be configured for advanced management analytics. Suppliers and Buyers have access to their invoice payments activity via secured access to Pagevity's user-friendly dashboards.   	Paygevity believes that by merging technology and finance through PromptPay™, it will help advance social and economic responsibility and foster valuable and long lasting relationships for the global supply-chain community.

PIPR_Description: Know The Na is a global travel platform available in 200 countries and territories that lets anyone from anywhere list or book a unique tour, experience, activity, or workshop. Tour and activity listings are posted by individual passionate locals, professional tour guides, or tour operators in addition to featuring aggregated third party inventory.   	Use Know The Na to list or discover unique tour experiences down the street or on the other side of the world. Easily filter your search by location, theme, date, price, group size, or language. Discover new adventures, learn about new locations, find something to do, or live stream your own experiences for others to watch on the desktop or mobile.   	Broadcasters can monetize their videos via pay-per-view, donations, or advertising/sponsors. Videos are available for re-broadcast up to 24-hours and then automatically uploaded to a cloud storage platform such as Dropbox or Google Drive for content creators.   	Discover the best of the city through curated events, activities and one-of-a-kind experiences. Use local destination "Insider Guides" to discover events, things to see/do, places to eat/stay, live webcams, destination videos, weather, visitor guides, and secret tips from famous local celebrities.   	Know The Na is the only platform tour hosts need to handle calendaring, booking management, payments and refunds, messaging, ratings and reviews, and performance metrics. Hosts are in full control of their tour listing including calendaring, group size, discounts, tiered pricing, cancellation policy, tour description, listing edits, and payout preferences. All tour listings are immediately published and guest bookings automatically accepted - no need for reservations, emails, or scheduling.

CampReward will strive to be the unequivocal change agent in the camping industry by leading the way people search and book their camping trips online. CampReward is dedicated to continually improving our company by always challenging the status quo, finding ways to do it better, and actively create value for our customers, partners, employees, and stake holders.   	Who We Are   	CampReward.com will strive to be the "Expedia" of the camping industry. We will challenge, innovate, and lead the industry by centralizing the ability to search and book camping trips online. Our website will allow customers to easily plan and book their travels, while earning rewards to add additional value and increase customer loyalty. Campgrounds will also greatly benefit from our platform by efficiently and effectively attracting more guests and bookings to their property.   	Our team is very passionate about camping and the camping industry. We are dedicated to improving the industry as many of us have been camping since we were young. We will continue our drive to enrich experiences that will have a positive social, operational, and economic impact for both guests and partners.   	What we want to achieve   	We are working tirelessly to help invigorate the camping industry as companies like Expedia and Priceline have done for the travel industry. We are embarking on this journey to innovate and simplify the way people search and book theircamping trips and adventures online, and create a one-stop-shop experience that can bundle package deals which include local attractions, RV Rentals, and camping gear Along the way, we hope to reunite their family, rejuvenate their spirit to travel, and discover places they haven't seen.   	What we are building   	We are building an integrated website followed by a mobile app that will allow people to search campgrounds near their destination(s), review their amenities, facilities, attractions, photos, reviews and more. Once they find their perfect campground to stay, they can book their accommodations right through our site. In the future, we will partner with industry leaders so customers can "Add On" camping gear, campground activities/ rentals, RV rentals, and local attractions for package deals, to create a One-Stop-Shop experience. After our customers complete their stay, they will then receive reward points that can be accumulated and redeemed for travel or merchandise. We are also working on a tiered loyalty program that will include three levels of membership and would offer additional benefits for each tier reached.

Strategy Summarized 	Target the fast growing population in Denver, Colorado and surrounding counties where the potential for increased utilization and taking market share from competitors of hospice care exists. 	Use the management experience gained in two prior hospice start-ups to create a high quality service delivery model and manage the growth potential of the market while maintaining the quality service. 	Make full use of 15 years of administrative and accounting experience as controller for companies as small as 250 employees to as large as Koch Industries of Wichita reporting to the Controller of all Divisions for 2 years. Mother's Touch will be run efficiently to deliver quality service at optimum cost. 	Develop the service to achieve Medicare certification faster than average using lessons learned in the prior start-ups. 	Focus time and people resources to develop in depth relationships with key people and organizations in the Denver medical and social services community. 	Hire and train a staff that fits the best profile for the quality care our mission requires service-wise.   	Introduce and build awareness for the "Mother's Touch" brand which with excellent operational execution can embody our value proposition in the minds of the community.

PIPR_Description: OurCrowd's latest investment is in Stringify (formerly Milla Networks), a software platform and marketplace for developers and consumers to connect Internet-enabled devices on any operating system. OurCrowd first invested in Stringify in October 2014 and now has the opportunity to join a round being led by San Francisco based venture capital firm, Artis Ventures.   	 Stringify is led by three co-founders with vast product and technology backgrounds who together have dozens of patents and product awards across numerous industries. CEO Mike Yurochko is a user experience ("UX") and product marketing expert who ran one of the largest suites of digital financial user experiences in the world while at JPMorganChase, and is responsible for much of the world's first groundbreaking smartphone product designs from his time at Handspring and Palm. CTO Dave Evans left his role as Chief Futurist at Cisco to join Stringify as a founder, garnering attention from the tech community due to Dave's prominent stature in the industry (see this news story about his arrival). Dave was hired 24 years ago as the first ever IT engineer at Cisco, where he eventually became the company's Chief Futurist and was also the CTO of the Internet Business Solutions Innovations Practice. Chief Creative Officer Yaron Sheba worked with Mike at JPMC and was previously the Creative Director and Head of Design at SanDisk. Sheba’s portfolio has reached 100s of millions of customers and spans much of JPMorgan Chase’s digital properties, many of the world’s first USB drives and numerous mp3 players. The company's advisors include Ed Colligan and Eli Harari, the former CEOs of Palm and SanDisk, respectively.   	Internet of Things (IoT) is an emerging conceptual framework in which everyday objects (like consumer electronics, appliances, buildings and transportation) have network connectivity, allowing them to send and receive data. There are already 10 billion connected things today and the market is expected to grow to anywhere between 50 and 200 billion connected things over the next 10 years, equating to over $8T in revenue per year according to IDC. Major companies are investing heavily in the future of IoT with recent acquisitions and announcements, including Google's acquisitions of Nest ($3.2B) and Dropcam ($555M), Apple's announcement of its Healthkit and Homekit developer programs, and appliance giants GE and LG launching new IoT product lines like smart ovens.    	Stringify's technology enables individuals with no technical background to dictate how their smart devices can work together, to provide a unified living experience (e.g. “When I close the door to my bedroom after 8pm, dim the lights to 5%, lower the thermometer and switch on calming music”). Individuals can leverage Stringify's design studio to create these "flows", or can discover smart devices and flows developed by other users on Stringify's marketplace. Stringify is all about bringing together consumers with developers to conceive and develop new ways to get the most out of the interconnectivity of our devices.

PIPR_Description: Oil Field Services Mexico is a transnational organization that was established to take advantage of Mexico's new (2015) private oil and gas exploration. We take advantage of the enormous desire for many US companies to drill south of the border in the Eagle Ford shale extension and the in-existent local oil field service infrastructure.   OFS Mexico will provide well-site construction, transportation/ logistics and equipment rental for companies exploring and completing oil and gas wells on the Mexican side of the border. This is a partnership between US industry experts with the know-how and customer relations, and Mexican conglomerates that will provide all necessary personnel and equipment. OFS Mexico will excel in providing exploration and completion companies with the same level of service south of the border that they are accustomed to in the USA.

In the city of Roseville, California, with an approximate population of 127,000, there has been no public facility dedicated for firearms practice. At least within a 10 mile radius from the heart of the city, there are no such establishment available. Now is the time an indoor shooting facility that is modern, safe and conducive for learning needs to be established. The city continues to grow and so is the number of citizens exercising their right to bear arms. Together we could make this opportunity a reality for the city and its neighboring towns that has a combined population of approximately 168,000. This will be a one big victory to all of us and the supporters of the 2nd amendment in general.

PIPR_Name: The Next Female Superstar Series Corporation
PIPR_Description: Executive Summary Based in Las Vegas, The Next Female Superstar Series Corporation (the “Company” or “TNFS”) is developing a multi-­platform digital destination dedicated to empowering, inspiring, and supporting women and their talents through its original all-­female singing competition series. TNFS team will create engaging branded content from a fresh new format maximizing the multiple distribution platforms to meet the demands of a global audience.   	Broadcast entirely over the web, THE NEXT FEMALE SUPERSTAR® Live Social Media Broadcast Platform allows women from all over the world the opportunity to audition. To register, the contestants must sign up to become a member of TNFS either through the Los Angeles or the London audition hub and submit an online application along with a 3-­minute video recording of themselves singing a song of their choice. The Platform also invites audiences to become special TNFS Members, which will enable them to follow their favorite artist from the show and to access exclusive behind-­the-­scenes footage.   	THE NEXT FEMALE SUPERSTAR® Live Social Media Broadcast Platform merges two proven successful reality formulas: an all-­female version of “American Idol” combined with an engaging personality-­driven drama similar to a “Project Runway.” THE NEXT FEMALE SUPERSTAR® is not just a place to watch and leave but a destination to be inspired and engaged. In addition, TNFS offers services for showcasing talent through its Record Label, Music Publishing, Internet Radio, Management Company, Merchandising, Social Media Platform, Fashion Line, Trivia Game, Fantasy Female Superstar Game App, Harmonizing App, and Meal Plan. With access to THE NEXT FEMALE SUPERSTAR® entertainment modules online, anywhere and anytime, viewers can stay engaged, and be immersed and inspired in the experience.

Virginia Beach Professional Baseball (VBPB) is a Limited Liability Corporation (LLC) based in Virginia Beach, VA. Over the past 4 years the company has successfully master planned and gained the required government approvals & participation, for the ownership and operation of a Atlantic League of Independent Baseball Franchise (the Virginia Beach Neptunes) and Baseball/Softball Tournament Complex in Virginia Beach, VA. VBPB has a strong background in professional baseball operations for both Minor League Franchises and Tournament Complexes. VBPB has assembled a team that has operated profitable and highly successful baseball franchises and tournament operations. VBPB is developing the new Stadium, to be known as Wheeler Field and 13 field tournament complex through a private equity offering ($4.5m), and a private debt placement ($32m) to fund development. Approved Government Participation and Lease Terms: 140 acre land lease for 30 years at $1/year, Local government incremental tax redirection, State government incremental tax redirection and Infrastructure and roadway improvements provided by municipality. Virginia Beach, VA is the largest US city to not have had a professional baseball franchise. The Virginia Beach-­?-­?-­?Norfolk-­?-­?-­?Chesapeake MSA is the 37th largest in the US, and Virginia Beach was ranked in the nation's top 100 for largest increases in household income in the 2000's.

Portal smartphones are designed for the modern day person who are frustrated with bulky, cluttered, non-durable phones that constantly get in the way of their dynamic lifestyles.   	Each Portal is completely flexible vertically and horizontally. This in turn with a flexible rubber case, polycarbonate OLED Display, and proprietary flexible battery also makes shatterproof. Its simple buttonless and wireless charging design also allows it to be water resistant. PIPR_Description: This is a unique opportunity to invest in the first of three $10 million offerings for the development of our latest concept, Assemblage/Financial District; the first combination of collaborative workspace and short-term apartments.    	  	 17John, home of Assemblage/Financial District, is an existing 15-story building located at 17 John Street, in Manhattan’s evolving Financial District. The venue is situated a block away from the new World Trade Center and directly next to Fulton Center, the third largest transit hub in New York City.   	Having closed the previous offering for US $38 million, used for the acquisition and pre-development of the Property, Prodigy Network presents the first of three offerings, each for US$10 million. The equity raised, together with construction financing, will be used to renovate the current 126,710 sq ft structure and to build a 49,335 sq ft glass tower above the existing building.   	 Assemblage/Financial District will generate 4 main revenue streams for the investors, (1) collaborative workspace memberships and related operations, (2) short-term apartments, (3) food and beverage operations, and (4) rent of space for private events.   	In this location, we anticipate that the collaborative workspace will have approximately 400 members on an annual basis, for an average monthly membership of US $1,000.   	For the short term apartments component, we estimate a conservative 85% occupancy rate, based on New York City’s average occupancy rate of 88% in 2013, according to the official statistics of New York City. It is expected that the apartments will rent for an average daily rate of approximately US $375, an attractive price point compared to similar sized rooms at the various luxury hotels in Manhattan.   	 The property will be home to Assemblage, a community of top creators, innovators, artists, scientists, and entrepreneurs, looking to connect and build relationships to achieve inspiring goals that will change the world.   	We envisioned innovative leaders inhabiting the working and living space of Assemblage— a space where the collaborative nature of our guests will be engaged. Imagine, the cross pollination between individuals from different fields, enabling unique opportunities that breeds positive change through innovation and collaboration.   	The spirit of creativity and collaboration has been present since the inception of Assemblage, the first crowd-designed project in New York, if not in the world. This was the result of a crowdsourcing competitionthat we launched through Prodigy Design Lab.   	Beyond the walls of our guests work/personal life, they will come to Assemblage to connect and curate pioneering ideas. The community will be inspired by the Ubuntu philosophy: “I Am Because You Are”. Assemblage is built with the intention to nurture great minds, to foster creative energy that will inspire change for those who inhabit the space.   	 We anticipate selling the 185 short-term apartments as individual condos for an estimated US $1.25 million in average.   	Concurrently with the sale of the residences, we plan on selling the collaborative workspace and restaurant to a single institutional buyer. It is anticipated that the commercial condo, which includes the cellar, first, second, and third floor, will sell for approximately US $40 million.

This is a prefunded purchase and rehabilitation opportunity for a 3 family property in Newark, New Jersey. The property is in need of significant renovation throughout. The developer is purchasing the property well below market value for $108,500 and providing $27,000 as a down payment (25% of sale price), in addition to paying for all closing costs of $8500. The estimated cost of renovation is $70,000 including labor and materials. The expected renovation time frame is 8-11 weeks. The developer is requesting a loan in the amount of $152,000 in order to purchase, renovate, and prepare the property for resale.   	An independent third party appraisal commissioned by Patch of Land shows an After Repair Value (ARV) of $310,000 which equals a Loan To Value (LTV) ratio of 49.03% and is in line with the data we found during our due diligence process. Our research shows that the residential market in this community outside New York City has been stable recently and currently supports an upward trend in property values.   	Current average Days On Market (DOM) is 3-6 months. When we include the rehabilitation time frame of 8-11 weeks and 30-60 days to close once the property is under agreement with a new buyer, the expected loan duration is 6-8 months.   	Current Assessed value for real estate tax purposes shows $156,900. Further research indicates that total market rents of $3,300 per month can be achieved after renovations are complete.

PIPR_Description: TexasHoldEm.com was formed to capitalize on the fragmented nature of the online poker space and fill the void between high risk cash play sites and ridiculous play money sites. There are very few options for poker players in the US and around the world to play on a site with a serious poker experience without the risk of losing money. The only alternative is play money sites that are extremely unrealistic and there are no tangible rewards. The majority of online poker players and fans do not have the budget required to play on a cash play site so a minimal monthly subscription fee is the perfect solution. TexasHoldEm also has a variety of unique social features that encourage players to share their experiences and interact with other poker players around the world.   	Our infrastructure has been built with cutting edge technologies that will allow us to transition the subscription model to other highly popular verticals such as Fantasy Sports, Sports Betting, Online Bingo etc... Most online poker operators are using archaic technologies. We are a young, tech savvy company that is creating a unique user experience accessible on all devices and operating systems!   	There is a growing trend among large service providers to move towards a subscription model as it is something that the majority of people are far more comfortable with. At TexasHoldEm.com you can play unlimited poker for real cash prizes with no risk of losing money. By catering to the mass market we believe our member base will continue to increase rapidly and the TexasHoldEm brand will be one of the most recognizable and valuable in Online Poker around the world!

PIPR_Description: Value Proposition: P2P Cash is the ONLY money transfer company offering FREE Global Money Transfer. With MasterCard, P2P guarantees secure money transfer to 1.2+ billion cellphones globally at no cost to the consumer. P2P's patent-pending Instant Money Tokens (IMTs) deposit cash directly into bank and mobile accounts in real-time.   	P2P Cash monetizes this free service, buying foreign currency at interbank rates and delivering at retail rates, grossing ~1.5% on each transaction.   	Financial: P2P's free cash transfer model generates significant cash flows. P2P revenue derives from the foreign exchange (FX) differential between retail and wholesale FX rates (+2% to +5%). Through close FX margin management and extensive cost controls, P2P Cash expects to generate $23M of high-margin revenue by the end of 2017 reaching .   	Market: The global remittance market will reach about $600 billion this year with more than $50 billion in transfer fee revenues. The U.S. is the largest outbound remittance corridor and the top few recipient markets account for >50% of the dollar volume: China, India, Mexico, Philippines, Vietnam and Africa.   	Problem: Banks and money transfer corporations have gouged consumers long enough. P2P Cash uses patent-pending technology to deliver cash to families back home. Current service offerings are slow and expensive for consumers, and difficult to deliver to recipients in developing countries, particularly in rural areas. Due to poor industry infrastructure and legacy systems, market players cannot effectively serve clients. Therefore consumers, who need these services most and can afford it least, end up paying the highest costs.   	Solution: P2P Cash significantly reduces clearing costs and time frames, creating a highly efficient and scalable freemium business model. Our encrypted IMT technology delivers remittances safely and directly to the recipient's cellphone and/or bank account instantly.   	Using SWIFT and emerging mobile wallet standards, P2P Cash customers can send cash to over 1.2+ Billion cellphones worldwide without charging transaction fees. Key strategic partner MasterCard expands our international reach into 60+ countries. The P2P Cash solution meets all US regulatory standards and exceeds international payment security standards.   	Marketing Plan: P2P will exclusively leverage digital marketing to reach senders in the U.S. and recipients abroad from the top global remittance destinations. P2P Cash recently launched services into Kenya, Vietnam and Mexico. Via MasterCard, we will launch Philippines and India in Q3; China in Q4, 2015

Training meets Entertaining!  It's our motto, and one that we think is going to finally shake up the $100+ billion  global eLearning market.  eLearning, Online Training, Distance Learning, Self-Paced Training...whatever your name preference, it's what we've dedicated the last 15 years of our lives to - experiences and connections that are carried into this new venture.  Having developed content for one of the original wave-making startups in the eLearning world over a decade ago (KnowledgeNet, ultimately acquired by Skillsoft), it's time again for another shake-up.  

Soon will be gone the days of computerized voices and monotonous slide presentations.  Utilizing proprietary processes and procedures, we've developed a lightning fast and cost-effective methodology in building the most entertaining training imaginable.  The average employee who spends 7 minutes a day on formalized training, compared to upwards of 2 hours on NetFlix, will begin seeing the convergence of the two mediums...where learners "Ubzerv" eLearning as an enjoyable, engaging experience.  One in which you find yourself thirsting for the next module to begin, tapping at the microwave to finally finish heating your popcorn, entirely forgetting that your new favorite "original series" is actually corporate or regulatory-mandated continuing education.

Phoenix Financial Holdings Inc. is a conglomerate holdings firm that oversees and manages subsidiary business entities. The firm's current investment activities involve investments into middle-market business entities and acquisition of small to mid-sized C-Corporation companies who have demonstrated growth potential. Through leadership and strategic planning, Phoenix Financial Holdings Inc. seeks to optimize its subsidiaries corporate structures for maximum returns, and by the virtue of scope of operations throughout the firm's holdings portfolio, increase overall corporate value for the firm and its venture partners. The firm excels in generating value while mitigating risk through diversification in both its target holdings portfolio composition as well as diversification in the firm's revenue structure through LBO majority ownership and operations acquisitions, combined with minority equity investments into high performing, well structured, established brands.   	There are numerous companies that have established local brand presences, strong historical ties to the communities they serve, and have significant growth potential; however many lack the sophistication, structure, or resources necessary to elevate these brands from their apparent "mom & pop" classifications to compete amongst the larger corporate entities that often enter markets and erode local share. Our firm buys into these middle-market companies and infuses operational resources to make those brands more productive than they are currently. We aim to optimize the structure of these companies, to ensure the operations are sustained, and are able to continue having positive implications on the communities they serve. Our goal is to position acquired middle-market companies for growth and expansion; not flipping businesses like many of our competitors. Our firm is interested in an aggressive proliferation of our holdings portfolio. We are focused on 6 high performing and competitive sectors which go towards maintaining diversification within our holdings and mitigating risk.   	Phoenix Financial Holdings expects to see 40% growth year-to-year. Phoenix Financial is able to aggressively increase the firm's value in more compressed time frames by virtue of our LBO structured acquisitions of companies whose gross revenues are minimally $1.5MM annually.   	The firm currently has a solid funnel of working LBO transactions ready for financing and capital investments to stimulate the stated growth. Additionally, the firm is able to further supplement and increase the firm's value through a steady 10% increase year-to-year in minority equity investments into established entities that have proven operational structures and management. Through these types of auxiliary revenue streams, the firm can further support potential capital investments into subsidiaries and newly acquired firms without constraining the firm's management & operations, ensuring value is created and returns to investors are maintained.

PIPR_Description:
Kanga Technology develops last mile delivery software that powers scheduled and on-demand delivery around the world.

Our crowd-sourced local-delivery subsidiary, Kanga Delivery (getkanga.com) serves thousands of customer in North America, SE Asia, and Africa, providing a mobile-first local delivery experience that makes delivery of any item a better experience for shippers, drivers, and most importantly, customers.

Our Kanga 4X (kanga4x.com) product provides existing businesses and startups a turn key solution for creating a local-delivery service. Entrepreneurs can launch new businesses, complete with iOS, Android, and web apps in as little as six weeks, including a field ready delivery team in any market around the globe, thanks to the power of the Kanga Delivery Network, a fleet of thousands of providers, and growing.

The Kanga platform connects all these verticals, creating a robust suite of logistics tools for businesses ranging from sole proprietors to Fortune 100 partners.

Freestar Energy Group invests in the growing revenue streams of oil and gas production across the U.S. There are millions of individuals and companies that have a share of oil and gas production in the form of monthly revenue payments. Many are open to receiving a lump sum buyout from us to acquire their future revenue streams. These revenue streams increase with new drilling and increases in oil and gas prices.   	The Potential   	We have several acquisition targets currently in the pipeline that we cannot finalize due to capital restraints. Funds raised will go directly toward acquiring these assets to increase the revenue streams we already receive. We are an established company with positive cash flow so you will begin to receive a return on your money immediately.

Sensentia’s first product is an Automated Inquiry System that enables members and providers to verify benefits for health services online or through mobile devices by entering questions in natural language.  The system has been proven to be more accurate (>95%) than a customer care center.   	Our customers are the health insurance companies and administrators who bear the cost of servicing consumer inquiries.  U.S. health insurers receive about 1 billion phone calls from their members and providers costing over $5B each year.  About a quarter of these are benefit inquiries.  EDI-based solutions exist for providers they have technical interfaces that are difficult to navigate and often cannot answer complex inquiries.  Nothing currently exists for members to have their questions answered online.   	Other applications that we are exploring include automated patient responsibility calculation, authorizations, clinical documentation improvement, claim coding, and claim adjudication.

PIPR_Description: BIZDOC Consulting was founded in 2007 and is committed to the success of small and mid-cap enterprises. PIPR_Description: To be honest, 8 out of 10 credit files, have blatant misinformation, inaccurate account statuses, and incorrect balances reporting on a consumers file after bankruptcy, causing undue stress, frustration, and an overall sense of being "overwhelmed".   Our post-bankruptcy service, ensures ALL Federal laws are followed, with ALL credit bureaus, not just the "Major 3".  Today's credit and lending industry has evolved into using 4, 5 or even 6 outside sources of consumer information, in addition to the basic 3 credit reports, everyone knows about.  ALL of these are governed by the Fair Credit Reporting act. Having all information correctly reporting after a bankruptcy is key, to the client getting their financial life on track, focusing on gainful employment, savings, and retirement.   	An innovative service like this determines how quickly they can recover, and be a significant contribution to society, and family.   Typically, an individual will pay nearly $3000 for the average bankruptcy attorney, they do an "online class" for 4 hours, and get a discharge.  After that, they are "On their own", the attorney feels they have completed their task, and their client has a rash of mistakes, inaccuracies, and incorrect information on their credit reports to attempt to repair on their own.  By my company taking ownership of this growing problem for the client, the use of this premier service simply gets their finances back on track faster,  My demand from the legal community already exists, I have offers to accept contracts from 4 local attorneys, who each typically have 5-8 clients per week needing my service.  This is without any advertising whatsoever, just word of mouth, from happy consumers.  I know, with the right education, to the right workforce, this will be a groundbreaking service, law-firms in the area will all have a use for.  With the potential, and ambition to grow, I simply need some basic startup funds for employees, training, and computers.

PIPR_Description: Delta Shaver Company, Inc. was created to develop, market and sell its proprietary/patent pending "lotion in the handle" all-in-one shaving systems that combines razor and waterless shaving lotion into one easy to use, carry and store device.   	While Evolution4 solves a myriad of travel problems (TSA compliant, portable, easy to pack, etc...), the most URGENT PROBLEM it addresses is that of grooming in drought affected areas. Shaving can add anywhere from 12 to 25 gallons of water usage per shave - Evolution's waterless shaving lotion contained in the handle means that you can get a close, comfortable, razor burn FREE shave without the need for water. Think of it: you can become part of the solution everytime you shave; and that means personally using anywhere from 12 to 25 fewer gallons of water each and every day you shave, or 60 to 125 gallons less per week; or 240 to 500 fewer gallons per month; OR AS MANY AS 6,000 FEWER GALLONS PER YEAR! Every shave close and comfortable - and the residue shaving lotion can be rubbed into the skin as a skin moisturizer when finished shaving.   	Shave Responsibly...Evolve Attractively.

Scimitar Global Systems Corporation was recently created by Tayber Corp to bring a number of IPs and technologies to market as a single product line targeting the as-yet untapped small transport fleet telematics market.   	Dan Taylor, the CEO of Scimitar has been studying the market since 2012, and came to the conclusion that the industry needed a next generation platform targeted at small fleets that would become an integral part of the business process.   	With the introduction of the FMCSA Electronic Logging Device regulations scheduled for Q4/2015 this market will be expanded to 4.3 million trucks. 65% of those trucks will belong to fleets of 5 trucks and under. Scimitar will target this segment by combining our Hours of Service software, Sygic powered navigation, industrial automotive tablet, fleet management, and small business platform into a cohesive system. This strategy will bring more value to the small fleets and owner-operators than our competition, and will allow us to convey a clear value message.   	To this end we have acquired Sable Express EOBR platform from Sable Truck Systems. With additional investment we will add a full suite of communications and business automation capabilities.   	Our low overhead network agreements allow us to operate as an MVNO and deploy our devices on Sprint, AT&T, Verizon, and T-Mobile.   	Our manufacturing capabilities let us build dust-proof, water resistant (IP67) rugged 7-inch industrial automotive tablets at $280 per unit at a maximum capacity of 50,000 units per month. Shrink-wrapped retail boxes with vehicle diagnostics cable, mount, Hours of Service software, and award winning navigation are expected to retail for more than $500. Comparable systems sell for $800 - $1200. Our current projections are based on monthly service pricing that puts our products at near 1/2 TCO of our nearest competitors.

Due to the complexities, time demands, and lack of available resources required to submit across multiple stores, a majority of app developers and publishers currently only distribute to a small handful of stores: Google Play, Apple, Windows and Blackberry.   	There is a general lack of awareness of the hundreds of alternative app stores, their benefits and their substantial number of users that could potentially be available to them. With the estimated total number of app downloads (both free and paid) expected to soar to 26 billion by 2017, this leaves a large portion of the market and revenue opportunities left untapped.   	With our beginnings rooted in a core group of developers and programmers, and as members of this community ourselves, we realized there is no single tool or service that adequately addresses the full range of app distributing and publishing needs for today's rapidly growing mobile market.   	This year sees the launch of appScatter, a new and advanced SaaS B2B platform that solves the numerous time and resource complications and promotes the successful distribution and monetization of apps across the universe of app stores.

PIPR_Description: Stress and anxiety are preventable factors, which is why the corporate wellness industry is projected to grow 9.4% annually to $3.4 billion by 2018 and "wellness" is predicted to become "the next trillion-dollar industry." Interest in managing stress and anxiety has spawned the "Mindfulness Movement," which is being led by major health care providers, corporate employers and wellness centers and luxury spas. But, despite this interest, most consumers don't know how to integrate any efficient solutions into their daily lives.   	Somadome, Inc. has introduced the first commercial "product" that can offer an affordable, accessible, packaged solution to access mindfulness and manage stress conveniently and effectively, in 20 minutes.  	 	The Company's product—the Somadome—is a freestanding microenvironment that provides a private space for people to relax and benefit from three therapeutic treatments that work synergistically to enable whole person wellness.   	The Company has developed and tested four iterations of its Somadome in numerous environments to confirm the product's effectiveness, and has taken steps to protect its expanding intellectual property portfolio. The Company has also seen considerable unsolicited, enthusiastic interest from consumers, prospective commercial partners and from the emerging "wellness" industry.   	Now, after over four years of self-funded development, the Somadome was launched at 5-Diamond luxury wellness spa Ojai Inn and Resort in April 2015 and in May in NYC's #1 rated luxury spa, the Cornelia in The Surrey Hotel. There are 22,000 such luxury spas in the United States, which account for about $84 billion in revenue annually. Globally, the "wellness economy" is a $3.4 trillion industry with 110,000 spas.   	During the next three years, Somadome plans to install about 150 pods in commercial (50) and corporate environments (150) primarily in leading luxury wellness resorts as well as wellness-focused corporations. Notably, the Company was recently 'activated' by Richard Branson at his Virgin Disruptor's event in SF, and is now in negotiations to partner with Virgin for placements in their various verticals.   	Somadome plans to place its next 11 units over the next 5 months in prime market placements and forward-thinking companies. Among these placements are Virgin's HQ in London, the HQ of a technology leader in Silicon Valley, and 8 prime resort placements in NYC, Beverly Hills, Sedona, Vegas, Napa, and Miami.

PIPR_Description:
Biggest Problem in the Marketing Industry Today - 80% of CEO’s today don’t believe that their current marketing programs provide a repeatable and track-able process to achieve ROI on an ongoing basis. Inbound Shift recently reduced a national event company’s digital marketing budget from $200k to $50k per month with 25% increased sales through its inbound marketing  solution. Inbound Shift clients get access to a dashboard that tracks their ROI for their marketing spend.  This is the first turnkey solution to both create and track ROMI (return on marketing investment) for digital marketing budgets in a real time format.  

Playing Offense When It Comes to Technology Disruption - Application development is arguably the biggest disruptor for companies today.  If you don’t believe that, you might want to ask Blockbuster (Netflix), Borders (Amazon), or Taxi’s (Uber) how application development affected their industries?  Inbound Shift has recently designed mobile application solutions that will allow a 25 million member health care group and a 75 year old film distribution company become the hunters instead of the hunted in their industries.  It will become a growing need for both private and public organizations to innovate when it comes to application development over the next few decades.  We will be their partner to deploy powerful mobile applications in a timely fashion.  As a partner in the apps with the clients, we retain the IP as well as revenue share and advertising revenues.  

Inbound Shift, Inc. is a new Texas Corporation that has acquired Digital Marketing and Social Media Strategy Firm, J Spark Studios LLC (Los Angeles, California, 2010), with Software Development company (strong sales team), Making Champions LLC (Texas, 2012).  $250k in existing annual contracts (several new large accounts in sales pipeline, large network of past clients) from J Spark Studios LLC + M.C LLC brings multiple pending marketing contracts, 2 game changing  app projects.

TuneGO is an extraordinary and forward-thinking proprietary cloud-based technology platform that creates a "FICO Score" for music talent and content.  TuneGO is a social ecosystem that connects artists and bands with music fans, producers, industry decision makers and the world's leading entertainment companies.  

TuneGO is managed by a successful team with startup and liquidity experience, including a $100+ million acquisition and a $3 billion IPO.  TuneGO management is proven to generate significant ROI.  TuneGO Chairman Chris Murray founded ABT Corp and sold the company for $100+ million.  TuneGO CTO Stacy Haitsuka founded NetZero and executed a $3 billion IPO.  TuneGO Music Director Ron Dante has sold over $650 million in global music sales.  TuneGO CEO/President John Kohl has invented innovative and creative technology solutions for social media and live media streaming. 

TuneGO has assembled a legendary and proprietary team of music producers who have sold over $5 billion in global music sales.  TuneGO music producers are responsible for over 50 #1 Billboard singles, over 100 Top 40 Billboard singles, over 300 Top 100 Billboard singles and over 350 million albums sold.  TuneGO music producers have been awarded dozens of Grammy, Clio, Tony and other coveted industry awards.  

TuneGO has secured relationships with the world's leading music distribution companies, including Apple, Google, Amazon, Spotify, Shazam, Deezer, YouTube, Slacker Radio, Microsoft, APM Music and many others.  TuneGO created the TuneGO Radio Network that will be syndicated on Slacker Radio and other radio outlets, broadcast to tens of millions of radio listeners. The TuneGO Radio Network will exclusively feature artists and bands from TuneGO and is available on SONY, Roku, and Xbox; and in automobiles including  Acura, Chrysler, Ford, Honda, Scion, Subaru and Tesla.  

The TuneGO exit strategy is to position the company for an acquisition by a major entertainment or technology firm.

PIPR_Description: We deliver (and pickup) plastic moving crates and dollies so that customers don't have to buy, construct and dispose of cardboard boxes when they move. We regularly turn down orders due to being out of stock, and we are growing via word-of-mouth. We have 17 5-star Yelp reviews.   	Our goal is to 1) purchase more crates to meet existing demand, and 2) franchise our concept nationwide.   	We are also building a platform that will allow customers to have moving service providers (us, moving companies, painters, etc.) bid on servicing the customers' moves. That way, the customer gets maximal value without having to spend hours researching and purchasing services from the best mover, crate provider, etc. Think LendingTree for moving.

It´s time for a fresh breeze in the food market  	 So-called Delivered Do-It-Yourself Meal Kits are currently the new trend. The concept behind it is very simple and therefore very easy to copy. Potential customers see virtually no difference between these providers at all. „Blue Apron" and „Hello Fresh", two major players offer virtually identical products to their customers, while ultimately being mere imitations of the original business idea which came from Sweden. Smaller companies follow the same concept, but deliver only locally. Nevertheless, this concept is still being copied and other vendors are pushing into this market and are trying to take advantage of this trend.   	 The Fresh Food Paradise Corporation was established to offer a new alternative to these custmers. Our approach differs completely from anything else in the market.   	 We intend to be the only company on the market, specialized in completely prepared vegan meals that are sold immediately after preparation either through shops or are sent directly to the consumer. By fully prepared we mean that all ingredients are washed, trimmed, cut to size, portioned and delivered. All that is needed now is a stove, a pan and a pot; not even a knife will be required. Our products are ready-made meals that contain everything that is needed, but are NOT pre-cooked or frozen. The vegetables are portioned and packed into a protective environment, together with all the other required ingredients.   	 We will be the only company that offers freshly prepared dishes for single-person households. With Blue Apron or Hello Fresh you must order certain minimum quantities (eg. 3 meals for 2 = 6 meals) - not really versitile for singles, considering that you must know how to cook and that you need much more time to prepared and much more differents.   	 The preparation of our products is as simple and as fast as conventional ready-made meals. Our meals contain only fresh and healthy ingredients and taste exactly like it was prepared from scratch by the customers themselves.   	 Ideally, less than 24 hours lie between preparing the meal by us and final preparation by our customers. In order to be able to ensure this, we will need to build manufacturing sites throughout the United States which can cater to a 200 to 250 miles radius.   	 We intend to ship and sell six days per week and we will ensure that our own shops have at least 30 different meals and recipes to choose from. We will continuously expand this selection.   	 As mentioned, we intend to set up our own shops in all major cities, where fresh produce from our production sites can be purchased by anyone walking into our stores. This is unique and has not been available on the market until now. We will offer a large variety of a healthy and freshly produced goods through our stores, and open a completely new healthy food market. A world premiere, which could change the entire market.   	 That is our short business concept; watch the video to see the concept in 3 minutes, and will see why we need a lot of capital before we can deliver the first meal.  The market is waiting for our idea  	 Blue Apron amd Hello Fresh is is growing rapidly, in autumn 2014, Blue Apron delivered 1 million meals per month, currently they are already at 3 million per month.   	 Our concept allows the customer to be much more flexible in terms of ordering, and the goods are always fresh. Additionally, our recipes are chosen strictly according to health regulations.

PIPR_Description: A residential real estate tech platform that helps homebuyers navigate the home-buying process, founded by a serial entrepreneur and backed by renowned venture capital firm Accel Partners.   	Solving a major pain point for the millions of homebuyers each year: Anyone who has ever bought a house or an apartment is familiar with the headache. When making what is likely the biggest purchase of their lives, homebuyers are challenged to make the right decisions and know what actions to take at each step of the way, from pre-contract to closing. Amitree has developed a platform that generates a contextual understanding of each home buyer’s needs, guiding them through the entire administrative process and notifying them of required documents and critical service purchases as they progress toward closing. Moreover, the system allows real estate agents to create curated experiences for their clients and monitor their progress remotely while greatly reducing the points of friction in the agent-client workflow. The platform is powered by an abstract rule engine that is built on hundreds of hours of research conducted with real estate attorneys and agents.   	Positioned at the center of a huge market with numerous monetization channels: Amitree’s placement in the flow of the transaction makes it a platform for purchasing all of the services needed in the home buying process outside of the actual home itself. These can include lending, insurance, appraisals, inspections, title and escrow, security, cable and utilities, movers, and attorneys, among others. Amitree’s monetization strategy is to notify the homebuyer of the next item on their checklist and offer to sell them the right service at the right time. Given the immense value that Amitree provides to agents, agents onboard clients to the platform at no cost to Amitree, creating significant leverage in the model. Thousands of active buyers have already been invited to the platform by agents and the feedback we received from the customers we spoke with was overwhelmingly positive.   	Founding team with prior exit: The five members of the Amitree founding team previously worked together at Dapper, an Israeli startup that specialized in programmatic ad buying that was co-founded by Jonathan Aizen. In 2010 Yahoo acquired the company for $55M, and four of the five went on to spend the next two years at Yahoo building adtech solutions. In 2012, Jonathan was bothered by the lack of technology involved in his own home buying process, and came up with the idea for Amitree. He then reached out to his former team and the group reunited to establish the company.   	Top global VC increasing its stake: Amitree is backed by Accel Partners, one of the most reputable and accomplished venture capital firms in the world. Best known for its investment in Facebook, Accel has seen 23 of its investments IPO and 111 be acquired; notable and recent exits include Kayak, QlikTech, RenRen, ComScore, SquareSpace, Groupon, Arista Networks and Etsy. Accel has experience with the real estate tech industry as early investors in Trulia, acquired by Zillow for $2.5B.  Having invested in Jonathan’s previous company, Dapper, Accel’s Bruce Golden bet on Jonathan once again with Amitree and is increasing the firm’s stake in the current investment round. Other current investors who are joining the round are Yahoo founder / former CEO Jerry Yang and multiple former senior Yahoo execs. Rob Chandra, formerly at Bessemer Ventures, and Owen Van Natta, former COO of Facebook, are also investors in the company.

To create a successful and widely accepted company that changes the way automobiles are purchased nationwide. The goal is to streamline the financial process of purchasing a car while also giving precedence to providing customers with fair financing terms and taking the unknowns out of the buying process. The company will prioritize customer satisfaction and the overall customer experience of the car-buying process.   	The product will be marketed to customers looking to get fair financing terms that are tailored to their needs and wants on a car purchase. The service would be especially beneficial to customers with less-than-perfect credit.   	The car business is an ever-growing industry. Opportunities for growth are everywhere. Customer dissatisfaction runs rampant in the car-buying industry and an alternative is needed that will reduce customer aggravation and lengthy, frustrating dealership procedures. Consumers want a new way to buy a car in which all of the terms are clear prior to the purchase agreement. CarSight gives customers a better way to buy a car by streamlining and personalizing the financing terms, thereby providing a smoother process from start to finish. This is intended to increase customer satisfaction with both the purchase itself as well as the terms.   	The company founder has been a Finance Director working in the auto industry for an extensive period of time and has considerable and comprehensive knowledge of the car buying process.  Years of experience in this industry also impart an adept understanding of the way customers feel during complicated, lengthy auto purchases and dealership visits. As a result, the company possesses unique, insightful knowledge that will assist in implementing processes and procedures that ensure customer satisfaction.

PIPR_Description: There is a significant increase in the popularity of craft beers. Kenosha Brewing Company, LLC ("KBC") is in the process of converting an existing, profitable restaurant/tavern back into a brewpub, which it formerly was, in order to take advantage of craft beer popularity. There is not a brewpub within a 40 mile radius of the location. There are two taprooms (brewhouses that do not serve food) in the area that have received mediocre reviews on yelp.com for their beer quality, lack of food, and bad hours. We believe that consumer are more-likely to purchase additional beers the longer they patron a restaurant or bar. We will act on this belief by offering a full-service kitchen, top-rated beers, and entertainment that will keep patrons in their seats, ordering more products.   	Once the brand is established, KBC intends on creating a full line of beer and using existing distribution relationships in Wisconsin and other states to expand its footprint.   	Potential Long-Term options:   	After the brand and brewpub are established, KBC would evaluate the increased production alternatives: 1. Use an outside contract manufacturer to produce the beer; or 2. Expand the brewing operations into a larger distribution center with a taproom. The difference between a taproom and a brewpub is a taproom does not serve food whereas a brewpub is a full-service restaurant that serves its own beer.

West Africa Sugar Distributors LLC is a commercial enterprise created to take advantage of the prolific and highly profitable market for ICUMSA 45 refined Brazilian sugar in West Africa. The region dominates the African imported sugar market, having imported 2.3 million metric tons in 2013. This represent two thirds of all African imports worth $US1.32B.  It is projected that this significant import trend will continue  for years to come. The 2015 year projects a growth rate of 11%.   	Due to a significant number of small and medium size companies that make up the secondary buyer's market, and the local culture of paying cash,  several large multinational trading companies have been able to take advantage of these factors. This results in country selling prices carrying a premiums of $60 to $100 per ton.   	West Africa Sugar Distributors LLC 's business model is simple. WASD has contracted with a Brazilian Sugar Refiner. The  two major points of the agreement are a very advantageous formula for our buying price,. This allows us a significant margin, that not only allows us to discount in country selling price, but  leaves us a very generous  gross margin per ton.   	The second major point  is the opportunity to draw purchased stock from our Refiner's West Africa warehousing facility. This will mean a four day transit time to the port of discharge, which will comfortably allow WASD to complete at least two 12,500mt shipments a month for a total of 25,000mts per month, 300,000mts annually.   	SNAPSHOT OF INVESTORS’ RETURN AND PAYBACK:   	ALL FIGURS ARE BASED ON THE FINANACIAL PROJECTIONS THAT FOLLOW. INVESTOR RELATED RESULTS ARE BASED ON THEIR 40% EQUITY SHARE. *INVESTORS’YEAR I EBITD: $10,743,100.00 *INVESTORS’FIVE YEAR EBITD: $54,315,500.00 *INVESTORS’YEAR 1 NET AFTER TAX: $7,520,170.00 *INVESTORS’FIVE YEAR NET AFTER TAX PROFIT: $38,020,85.00 *INVESTORS’YEAR I INVESTOR ROI: 125%   	A formal PPM is available to EquityNet Investors upon request.

Signal Power has developed and produced the most innovative and advanced portable LED lighting solution for the event, construction, and disaster relief industries. Signal Power is the only company in our industry to design and build the actual LED lighting specifically for the mobile lighting industry. In addition to the most advanced lighting available, the HYBRID Tower introduces disruptive intellectual property to the industry, with a primary patent on the hybrid system, a second patent on the tower and six additional patents pending. The HYBRID Tower is a significant leap forward in the mobile light tower industry.   	Light towers are the single most common piece of equipment in the $41 billion per year North American rental market with over 100,000 light towers units sold per year in North America. A single company purchased over 8000 light towers in 2014 alone. The portable light tower market is beginning to undergo a dramatic change from traditional halogen lights to LED lights.Signal Power has a unique opportunity to offer replacement, re-fit, and offer new types of utilization for an ever expanding market.   	Ease of use, longevity, durability, lower power consumption, and a significant tax credit make the HYBRID Tower an obvious leap beyond traditional light towers. In particular, the lower power consumption from the most advanced LED lights means alternative power sources such as batteries and solar are effective. However, with patents in place, the HYBRID Tower opens up new markets in video surveillance, cellular communication, advertising, and border security.

SmartKioskCompany.com is an innovative technology company, showing strong growth with revenues doubling every year for 4 years straight, with unique technology and current Patents pending. SmartKiosk specializes in leveraging new technology inside correctional facilities to create operating efficiencies, better security and a new revenue stream. Ultimately reducing operational cost and saving the Taxpayers money.   	SmartKiosk has lead the industry in innovative technology in correctional facilities since 2009 by implementing the first of its kind, two-way inmate email system inside a County Jail. Smartjailmail.com, an advanced controlled email system for inmates had never been heard of in a County jail at that time, but has proven to be a win-win solution for all involved. Achieving better communication, a paperless environment, improved jail security, huge operational efficiencies and a new revenue stream.   	Since the inception of the SmartKiosk system back in 2009 the SmartKiosk communication platform has expanded to many features that have ultimately transformed correctional facilities. Taking what was once an archaic outdated facility using hand written paper notes for communications between jail staff and inmates as well as inmates and citizens outside the jail, the SmartKiosk system has brought corrections into the 21st century by providing a complete electronic communications platform for inmates.The SmartKiosk has become a self-service station for inmates allowing all communication and all personal information for inmates to be now self service, documented and controlled, without the need for agency staff to be directly involved with daily inmate requests, questions, complaints, commissary orders, account balances or hand sorting and delivering inmate mail. This system massively reduces manual labor for correctional facilities every day, while providing the fastest cheapest form of communication for inmates since the history of incarceration.    	Our business model and what makes the SmartKiosk unique? In a nut shell, our system is provided totally free to correctional agencies. It saves the agency money, improves security, and provides a new stream of revenue. For the inmates, they can now keep in touch with friends and family in real time and at the same cost of a postage stamp, without having to wait 3 days for the mail to be delivered to them. For our company, its an upfront investment by installing the kiosk system throughout the facility, our investment is secured with a long term multi year contract with government agencies that produce strong consistent residual revenue.

When we started this company 2.5 yrs ago, we started it with the goal of serving the elderly, temporarily disabled and permanently disabled.    	THE ISSUE...   	A lot of disabled or elder people have to leave their homes for senior homes or special treatment facilities because either their homes aren't accessible or homes don't have the tools needed to help them with mobility around their home. So they move into treatment facilities or senior homes rather than stay in their homes where they want to be. We can fix that.   	OUR SOLUTION AND SERVICES...   	Provide then with accessibility products so they can stay in their homes. for example:   	An elderly or disabled lady is stuck in her upstairs bedroom and can't get down stairs because it hurts so much to walk down the stairs. We can help - we provide them with stair-lifts to get them up and down their stairs.   	Or the little boy who hurts his leg while playing soccer and now needs his home modified so he could get around the home. We can evaluate the home and provide temporary measures to get him around the home.   	The elderly man who can no longer lift his legs over the bathtub lip any more to take a shower. we can help. we provide barrier free showers to help.   	We help provide access...   	According to the PEW RESEARCH there will be 74.9 million baby boomers in 2015. A lot of these hardworking folks want to remain in their homes as they get older. They just want their homes accessible to enable their mobility. These are the folks we serve.   	WHERE WE ARE SO FAR IN OUR JOURNEY...   	We currently have a few sales and have become dealers for various manufacturers but we are not able to serve a lot of our customers due to cash flow and inventory.   	WHERE WE WANT TO BE AFTER THIS CAMPAIGN...   	We are trying to raise funds to be able to grow inventory and continue to meet our cash flow, run some marketing campaigns and take our services to the next level. This is what we are trying to achieve with your investment.

Hopscotch Air is a transformative air taxi service, delivering private aviation at affordable prices. An FAA-certified air carrier, we are reimagining on-demand aviation and providing a viable alternative to lousy airline service and long drives. In six years of flying, we have expanded the marketplace by introducing more people to the world of on-demand aviation. Passengers show up to the airport. Get on the plane. And get to where they are going. Working with technology partners, we are creating new ways to increase efficiency, lower prices, and scale the business.   	We access the thousands of lightly used airports that the big airlines don't serve. That means our clients often arrive at airports that are much closer to their business meetings and vacation homes.   	We fly seven Cirrus airplanes, considered one of the most technologically-advanced aircraft flying today. All are late model planes, complete with on board weather, advanced auto pilot features, and the unique Cirrus whole plane parachute system.   	We currently base operations from Long Island, NY, Westchester County, NY, Bedford (Boston), MA, Stowe, VT, and San Diego, CA. Hopscotch Air is certified to provide air transportation by the United States Department of Transportation and the Canadian Transportation Agency.

PIPR_Description:
The overall goal of our business, Kyash Consulting, is to provide professional services to executive
agencies of the United States Government. These services will include information technology support, administrative management, management consulting, document preparation, and
public affairs support. As a small disadvantaged business, the federal government is likely to look
favorably on working with Kyash Consulting due to requirements saying that certain percentages of
contracting dollars must go to such small businesses.

Kyash Consulting is a start-up government contracting firm that will provide expertise and talent to various agencies and larger contractors. Since Kyash Consulting is opèrating in the Washington D.C. metro area, the prime market will be the United States government. However, that does not preclude Kyash Consulting from finding contracts with various state and local entities, as well as other private firms. Kyash Consulting would have a competitive advantage over other  start-ups because it is minority owned and will help government agencies and prime contractors reach federally mandated small/disadvantaged business contracting goals.

Kyash Consulting's value proposition is that we can perform quality work much less expensively than the competition because we are small (a father-son team), nimble, and carry very little of the overhead that characterizes most government contractors.

PIPR_Description: BeerLamp is a concept conceived while our founder, Brian Carruth, was serving as a pilot in the Navy. He realized a need to connect with friends as he traveled. Together, we all recognized that this problem that was not unique to the military. We all have old high school friends, college roommates, coworkers and others that we don't talk to regularly but we'd love to grab a beer with while we are in town.   	From this simple idea, we created BeerLamp. A single button system to signal your friends when you are looking to grab a drink. It's a passive, no obligation way of letting your friends know you are in town and they are welcome to join you. To aid in connecting, we have included local bar information including specials, happy hours, live music and events.   	Additionally, we have partnered with local and regional craft breweries to highlight local tasting events, so when you want to go out you can explore craft beer and discover the local flavors. Our app allows user to take advantage of unique beer releases or other tasting events that they would not have otherwise known about. We are focused on creating a better beer drinking experience for our users and their friends.
Equity partnership to include capital and professional development.

Scientific Botanical Leasing is a facility leasing company owns industrial buildings that it designs, engineers and develops into facilities to support legal cultivation and related product manufacturing. 

The Company developed proprietary application software that the tenant uses in the operation of the facility to insure top quality products, mitigate risks and insures compliance with regulatory agencies.  

Second tenant (LOI) pending DEA inspection is the first ever FDA approved human clinical trial to study the benefits of whole plant based medicine for veterans with PTSD. 

Company expects to conclude audits during 4th quarter 2016 and become registered with SEC as a reporting by year end.  Anticipated 2016 EBIDTA approx $5 million.

The objective of the Fund is to create a balanced portfolio of long-term real estate investments that upon stabilization, will provide predictable cash flow with tax benefits and appreciation potential. The Fund will seek to achieve this objective by investing in properties in the Southeastern United States. The Fund will target the acquisition of well-located assets with correctable deficiencies in the property’s physical condition, market position, and/or property management. The Fund will also selectively target urban-infill development opportunities where there is a compelling risk-adjusted return in a submarket that is supply constrained. Grubb Properties will seek to create value for the Fund by implementing a custom, multi-phase plan for each asset, focused on upgrading or constructing a high quality physical property and amenities, utilizing sustainable features to reduce operating costs and energy consumption, executing on a tenanting strategy to achieve strong and stable rental income and securing appropriate financing to mitigate interest rate and term risk.
Purpose: Acquire, develop, improve, and/or operate a portfolio of properties located in the Southeastern US.

PIPR_Description: vOOrka is a Hands-free biometric authentication platform for traditional in-store payments, controlled access, ID and Age verification. It functions via fingerprint sensor device attached to merchants’ point of sale checkout terminals. vOOrka stores and provides users’ payment information, matching it with their biometric record. We enable buyers to make payments by simply touching the store’s fingerprint reader during check out.   	Since our product provides hands free way of payment it entirely eliminates exposure to theft, burglary, over-the-counter fraud and keeps users’ private information hidden. We are using biometric hardware and technology that has been accredited and used by FBI and Lockheed Martin for several years. We are not storing any biometric data - only encrypted references. Our process and platform makes fingerprints impossible to replicate and use to breach our security.   	We started vOOrka as a solution for over-the-counter fraud, inconvenience of loosing a wallet and vulnerability of private and financial information exposure.   	Banks a Merchants loose over 11 Billion Dollars a year in over the counter fraud.  	Consumers struggle replacing wallet contents and exposing private and financial information during checkout.   	Our solution saves Banks and Merchants billions of dollars in litigations and fraud detection services, and gives a consumer a piece of mind and unbeatable convenience.   	We have interviewed 420 retail business owners questioning their hardships. As a result, we got 87% positive feedback for the use of our product. This gave us an indisputable confidence that there is a need of our product. We have established a lot of B2B contacts that are willing to use our service once its available.   	Our research also shows steep growth of biometric use across all major industries especially payments and security. Now, more than ever the consumer is ready to take the next step to adopt biometrics as ultimate authentication for payments, controlled access and identification.   	If you capture it well, protect it well, why would you need anything else but your physical self?
