PIPR_Description: The main differentiator between VICTIERY and its competitors is the ability to seamlessly combine multiple sports/events in a single fantasy league. To do so, VICTIERY has designed a format and developed a unique proportional scoring method that provides consistency and comparability between sports/events. The multi-sport functionality of VICTIERY delivers endless action (without the unwanted maintenance). VICTIERY offers an unbeatable 12 sports/events, with a number of customizable options. This ensures that each fantasy sports player is able to participate in leagues that fit their interests.    	 How does a VICTIERY league work?   	 VICTIERY will release a schedule for each sport/event. The schedule format across sports/events is consistent, starting when tiers are released, followed by when picks are due, then any applicable cut dates (sports/events that do not run for a full season do not have cuts), and an end date. VICTIERY leagues begin with the first upcoming (or the only) sport/event in a given league and end with the last upcoming (or the only) sport/event in a given league.   	 VICTIERY will release tiers for each sport/event. The tier format across sports/events is consistent, but the number of tiers and the number of players in a given tier may vary by sport/event. The major sports typically have six tiers with roughly five players in each tier, but sports/events with fewer participants may have fewer tiers and/or smaller tiers.   	 As schedules and tiers are released for each sport/event by VICTIERY, fantasy rosters are assembled by picking players for each (or the only) sport/event in a given league (by position, if applicable) from tiers that are based on potential. In general, the intent is to have the better players in the upper (smaller numbered) tier(s) and the lesser players in the lower (larger numbered) tier(s). All contestants make picks from the same tiers so no one will be at an advantage or disadvantage as a result of how the players are tiered. This is similar to the salary cap format used by daily/weekly sites such as FanDuel and DraftKings, except instead of assigning players dollar values based on potential, players are assigned to tiers based on potential and players picked from each tier are required and limited. Both of these formats allow for picks to be completed in minutes (flexibility) and avoid the lengthy snake drafts used on traditional sites such as Yahoo!, ESPN and CBS – but daily/weekly sites require daily/weekly picks, which can be exhausting over the course of a given season.   	Once fantasy rosters are assembled, and each (or the only) sport/event in a given league begins, players picked start to accumulate statistics. The scoring format across sports/events is consistent, where players picked accumulate statistics, which are used to calculate a share of the total points available.   	 Scoring Example: Say there are 2,000.00 points available for statistic A for a particular sport/event in a given league. If a contestant’s picks accumulated 120 of statistic A, and the picks of all the contestants in that league accumulated 1,200 of statistic A, then that contestant would get one tenth of the points, or 200.00 points. The calculation would be as follows: [(120/1,200)*2,000.00] = 200.00.   	 This is unique compared to other sites where players picked directly accumulate points. However, this enabler allows comparability between sports/events. A contestant’s share of total points available is directly proportional to the statistics accumulated by that contestant’s picks versus the statistics accumulated by the picks of all contestants in a given league. As this suggests, this proportional scoring method keeps contestants competing against the entire league instead of using a random head-to-head (H2H) schedule.   	 A contestant’s picks accumulate statistics, which contribute to their total share of points, all the way up until they are cut or the season ends. Again, player cuts are made only for sports/events that run a full season and are made three times throughout the course of a season (as evenly spaced as possible). Player cuts are the only form of team maintenance required over the course of a given season. The cut format offers those affected by player injury a way to cut an injured player, at a scheduled time, when other contestants are forced to cut one of their players as well. VICTIERY doesn’t allow adding/dropping players (in the form of a “waiver wire”) or trading players with other contestants, as these tools simply introduce mechanisms for collusion.   	VICTIERY gives contestants more daily action and less daily maintenance. By (potentially) combining multiple sports/events in a single league, contestants can make each sport/event as exciting to watch as the other. VICTIERY gives contestants some “skin in the game” for each sport/event, whether it is emotional or monetary interest. League points are constantly changing and updated on a nightly basis. After the league/contest ends, contestants with the most overall league points and/or the most points for each sport/event “experience the thrill of VICTIERY”.

Rock My World uses music, patent-pending technology and a proven methodology to help people achieve their health & fitness goals.    	 By leveraging biometric data (heart rate, steps, GPS, etc.) to select the appropriate music in real-time, users can increase enjoyment and performance during their favorite physical activities. Think of it as FitBit meets Soundcloud - a real-time DJ for your workout.   	 With millions of loyal users and strong distribution partners, the company is poised to dominate the active-music vertical.   Executive Summary  	 RockMyRun is a mobile app that helps the 30M runners in the US better enjoy running and achieve better performance.   	 While using RockMyRun, runners report 18% higher levels of enjoyment, 23% less fatigue and 35% more motivation when compared to other streaming services or their own music library.   	 This effect is created through two key components:   	 Expertly Curated Music:   All the music available in RockMyRun is curated by fitness experts, music artists and some of the biggest DJs in the world, including David Guetta, Afrojack and Zedd.  The music is seamlessly mixed so there is no break between songs and a consistent tempo provides a steady stream of music tailored to the pace of the workout or run  Users rate the content so the most engaging and motivating content is featured  Body Syncing Technology:  RockMyRun uses proprietary technology to sync music in real-time to the users pace or heart rate  By syncing with pace, every time the user takes a step it’s to the beat of music, creating a magical, synchronous workout experience that helps keep users motivated and on target pace  When syncing with heart rate, as users increase exertion, the music increases in tempo and energy, helping fight fatigue and increase performance  In addition to the direct-to-consumer market, RockMyRun is being:  Embedded in treadmills by the largest manufacturer of treadmills in the world?  Used by one of the fastest growing fitness chains in the country for their group fitness?  Pre-loaded on flagship Android devices by one of the top 5 cell phone manufacturers in the world?  Embedded into other health & fitness apps to help them better engage users  Ultimately the company will expand beyond running into the broader exercise market as well as mental focused activities such as focus, concentration and meditation Company Highlights  Distribution relationships with ICON Health & Fitness, Orangetheory Fitness, Red Rock Apps, Mio, ZTE  Content relationships with David Guetta, Afrojack, Zedd and 40 other DJs and music artists?  Winner of San Diego's Most Innovative Product Award, Winner of Tech Coast Angels Quick Pitch Competition, Winner of Plug & Play's San Diego's Best Pitch Award, Winner of Tech Cocktails San Diego's Best Showcasing Startup Award

Speech Buddies is on a mission to improve speech therapy for children everywhere. We aim to become "The Speech Company" for parents in the very fragmented, but massive speech Industry - about $50B/year globally. We aspire to be the very best at two things:   	Connecting parents of children with speech impediments to in-home speech therapists who provide the best possible care. 	Providing clinically proven speech tools that turn practice into an interactive game and improve outcomes.   	This customized approach provides the very best outcome for the 10% of children who experience speech & language challenges.   Executive Summary  	Articulate Technologies, Inc. is a Growth-stage company in the Services (B2C) industry. The company has been operating for 46 months.   Company Highlights  	Articulate Technologies currently offers Speech Buddies tools, a set of patented, clinically-proven tools to help children overcome speech difficulties. By teaching correct tongue positioning for the five most difficult sounds – R, S, L, CH, and SH – children learn and feel how to correct a problem sound. Speech Buddies were designed by a team of expert speech-language pathologists and engineers from MIT & Columbia Universities. Clinical studies published in peer reviewed journals show that children learn 2-4 times faster using the Speech Buddies Technology.   	We are already one of the largest DTC brands in the massive industry, fragmented space. No one is focusing on consumers, which is our opportunity. 	Expanding into the vast opportunity in speech services 	Launching the SB Connect Marketplace – parents can quickly and easily book speech lessons for their children. We send our contract speech therapists into the home. 	Also building our Next Generation tools – a “smart” and connected device. Like a “speech therapist in your pocket.” 	This integrated solution is exactly what parents are looking for. The best speech therapists using the best tools = the best solution for their child. 	3 patents; 1 granted, 2 pending 	Experienced management team

Fishidy helps the 40 million recreational anglers in the US catch more fish. Fishidy is the only authoritative, intelligent, map-based social network that maximizes an angler’s time on the water by presenting and cultivating critical location-based information. Think of Fishidy as a mash-up of Wikipedia (interest-based crowd sourcing), Waze (real-time and location-based mapping) and Facebook (social sharing).    	Location-based information is important because 90% of fish are found in 5% of water. Fishidy provides anglers the maps of specific locations to plan their outing for maximum success. We provide the tools to catch their targeted species of fish, and the option to brag and connect using social media. The Fishidy experience is delivered via an iOS mobile app or Android mobile app and a web-based application. Plan and simple, it helps anglers find the most productive fishing waters.    	Fishidy is an Early-stage company in the Mobile industry. The company has been operating for 17 months.    	In a little less than a year and a half, Fishidy has enrolled approximately 300,000 users of its proprietary mapping and social sharing technology. Established industry partnerships include Walmart and Rapala. The company has reached an annual revenue run rate of over $500K with month over month revenue growth of 25%.

As stock investors, we constantly worry about the credibility of the people who give us investment advice. Wall Street bombards us with the "next big stock idea" whether it comes from TV networks, high profile traders or financial advisors. What most people don’t understand is the motivations of these individuals or even if they have a history of trading success. Both founders of worked together in the financial markets for over a decade and became tired of the deception. They developed investFeed to address these problems by creating a platform that provides members with full transparency every time someone makes a trade. With investFeed, everyone can now see the actual trading history of other individuals in order to help in determining who are the most successful people at generating a profit. It gives investors a means of knowing which traders and investors are the right ones to listen to. With investFeed, there is no more wondering!  What Sets Us Apart  	 This groundbreaking concept of an open and free marketplace for stock traders and investors is changing the world of stock investing. With investFeed, every investor will have the opportunity to not only demonstrate and track their own stock trading ability but also directly profit from it by developing a subscriber base willing to pay a monthly fee to follow their own trading activity.   	 For users, investFeed provides a means of determining for themselves who the most successful stock traders really are. They are then able to subscribe to these traders’ feeds in order to receive real time trade alerts, updates on positions held and thoughts on the markets in general.   	 It provides both sides the full transparency that is missing from so many Wall Street institutions. The ability for investors to know that the advice they’re following is backed by a truly successful track record along with the ability for traders to generate a monthly income for themselves based on their own trading success is a real differentiator for investFeed.  Our Keys To Success  	 investFeed currently supports thousands of users. One key to success will be the ability to scale our platform to include many additional trading vehicles such as futures, options and currencies as well as expand into other parts of the industry such as robo-advisory. Another key to success will be large scale distribution of our product. While our direct consumer marketing has proven the demand for investFeed, we will look to gain distribution through large channel partners with a global reach such as financial institutions, hedge funds, quantitative firms and retail broker-dealers. We are currently in active negotiations with several prospective partners.  Financial Summary  	 Within the span of several months, investFeed has gone from a couple dozen users to well over 8,000 and is now generating revenue. We are growing very quickly and our biggest challenge is a lack of capital in order keep up with the growing demand. Our initial seed round was completed in March 2015 when we successfully raised $100,000. In order to fund our rapid growth, we are now in the fortunate position of requiring a second seed round in order to begin the transformation from startup to becoming a globally recognized marketplace network.

PIPR_Description:
We help businesses of any size stay ahead of their largest competitors by implementing our data gathering and control system at very low cost. Our solution relies on leading-edge technology built for the "Industrial Internet of Things.” Our platform's overlay architecture avoids disruption to our customers'  normal operation while collecting and analyzing the data from their existing infrastructure—no matter how eclectic, old, or new it may be. Unlike other solutions, we augment—rather than replace—devices. We demonstrate to customers how the use of our data generates efficiency gains which they can afford. Our customers' infrastructure may be 20 years or 2 weeks old. We connect each system to our network, without any need to replace even one a singe device in our customers’ buildings, factories, or plants.

We sell our solution, which we call “SLX”, as a Platform as a Service  (PaaS). Customers pay a monthly subscription price for our easy to install local node—which uses approximately 5 Watts of power—but has the computing power to collect information, monitor, and control hundreds of devices while maintaining communication with our central cloud-based platform. Our distributed networking and control system combines:

-SLX Local: our Industrial IoT node that lives on our customers’ premises. SLX Local’s small size disguises computing power. SLX Local operates as a server build on a rock-solid Linux foundation. It contains built-in data analysis, altering, and control software required for real-time automation and control of hundreds of disparate systems; and 

-SLX Worldwide: our IoT network operating center, which operates in the cloud as well as at our local facilities for multiple layers of failure protection. SLX Worldwide provides supervisory control and a wealth of data mined in real time and stored comprehensively to provide a wealth of analytics and tools  for in-depth or machine-learned analysis to deliver enterprise-wide, automated process improvement.

Our Mission: ExitHub's goal is to create the largest and most efficient global marketplace and transactional social network for dealmakers. 	The Team: Our company is led by a well-rounded and innovative team, experienced with fintech, startups, small and mid-sized businesses, financial services, and Fortune 500 companies. 	Target Market: Our platform connects company and property buyers and sellers, PE, VC, hedge funds, investors, intermediaries and entrepreneurs. 	The Opportunity:  	- The M&A market is booming, with global deal volume expected to exceed $4 trillion by 2016.  	- There are 23 million small and mid-size enterprises (SME) in the U.S. and 226 million globally (producing 65% of GDP), with new market participants like China and India. 	- Millions of SMEs will change hands within the next ten years due to Boomer retirement, compounded by Millennial and Gen X takeover demand. 	The Problem: The market is fragmented and inefficient. It suffers from geo-political, cultural and language barriers, inadequate big data analytics and information assimetry. 	The Solution: We're building a scaleable fintech platform featuring millions of global company and personal profiles, with multilingual deal flow listings, geolocation mapping, algorithmic modeling, and big data analytics. We offer curated content from industry experts and crowdsourced contributions. 	Our Focus: We are an early-stage startup focused on aggressive growth, seeking to achieve a dominant market share and branding visibility. We're in the process of raising multiple rounds of venture funding from accredited and institutional investors.
Portal_Link: The Transactional Social Network for Dealmakers

PIPR_Description: Antipodal Talent International, LLC (the “Agency") is a startup talent agency that officially launched on June 5, 2015, in Galesburg, Illinois, by Grant R. Gulovsen. While the base of operations is in the heart of the Midwest, the Agency's scope of operations is international, being the first and only talent agency in America that exclusively represents and promotes Chinese models and performing artists in the United States. In addition, the Agency has developed a set of ancillary partnerships that allow it to offer small to mid-size enterprises ("SMEs") in the U.S. all the tools and information needed to get their goods into the Chinese marketplace and, with the help of the Agency’s models and performing artists, market those goods effectively once they arrive.   	The Agency was established to solve the following problem: Although middle- and upper middle-class consumer markets in China are set to triple in size to $3.2 billion USD annually by 2020, it is still very challenging for small to mid-size enterprises ("SMEs") in the U.S. to actually enter the Chinese marketplace. As a result, the Agency is focused on helping SMEs that would otherwise not be able to afford the vast majority of consulting firms that specialize in getting U.S. companies into the Chinese marketplace. Given its unique characteristics as a hybrid talent agency and consulting firm, coupled with a target clientele that is currently underserved, the Agency will be able to stand out from the competition and make a name for itself in both industries.

PIPR_Description: OurCrowd is investing in RevolutionCredit, the first Software-as-a-Service interactive behavioral analytics platform designed to help financial service providers make real-time credit decisions. The technology leverages real-time consumer behavioral data gathered from proprietary RevolutionCredit data modules.   	Making credit available to a sizable and underserved segment: FICO and other traditional credit scoring systems prohibit over 150MM consumers in the United States and over 50% of adults globally from accessing credit at reasonable rates. Recent immigrants, newly independent young people, people with damaged credit from the Financial Crisis, and many others with thin or nonexistent credit history face extreme challenges proving their creditworthiness to financial institutions. These consumers are often either “unscorable” or fall within what is termed the “broad middle” of the credit score spectrum, above chronic subprime but below super prime. For these millions of consumers, they are left with few options to access credit in the regulated marketplace. Consumers are further challenged when credit scores impact decisions outside of lending: credit profiles are often used for rental agreements, cell phone services, and in some states, insurance companies are allowed to use credit scores as an input for developing auto-insurance premiums. RevolutionCredit has created a viable alternative.   	Unique, forward looking analytics platform: RevolutionCredit offers a unique solution for a variety of financial service providers from personal loan providers to credit card companies and utilities companies. The company uses unique, forward-looking behavioral analytics derived from educational modules that consumers can opt-into while applying for financial products such as loans, credit cards, or post-paid services. These analytics have the ability to predict consumers’ likelihood of repaying their debts. The data RevolutionCredit has collected shows that their products allow creditors to increase customer acquisition and retention while decreasing loan losses. Consumers also see benefits as the products allow them to take control of their financial identities and prove that they are more than their credit scores.   	Solid traction from top-tier clients: RevolutionCredit generated $432K in revenue in 2014 and is projecting $1.1MM in revenue for 2015. The company’s unique platform has attracted a significant and diverse client base including MasterCard, Capital One, Enova, and Springleaf. Upcoming contracts include companies such as Ally, Chase, Discover, State Farm Bank, Regions Bank, Lending Club, Avant and others. OurCrowd believes that RevolutionCredit’s strong advisory board, which includes the former CEO of the Fair Isaac Corporation, former Senior SVP and COO of the American Bankers Association, and the former Chief Marketing and Credit Officer at HSBC, contribute to its ability to generate a strong pipeline.   	Veteran founding team with significant relevant experience: RevolutionCredit is led by senior executives who formerly held key roles at credit bureaus, financial services firms, and identity security organizations. CEO Zaydoon Munir has 18 years of experience in financial services, having spent over six years at Experian. CFO & COO Laura Conrad was formerly CFO & COO at Experian Interactive. CTO Rama Thamman was formerly a senior director at IdenTrust where he built innovative infrastructure solutions for the world’s leading banks. Additionally, the CMO and Head of Business Development each have over a decade of financial services experience. RevolutionCredit’s investors include Lerer Hippeau Ventures and Omidyar Network.

Avancen MOD Corporation is incorporated in South Carolina.  Our official corporate  address is Mt. Pleasant, SC. Our engineering and production facilities are in Melbourne, Fl.  
 Avancen  is in a race to reduce patient pain. The MOD® (Medication on Demand) is a bedside device with enterprise software that provides the patient with pain medication when they need it as prescribed by their practitioner. But there is more. There is the information flow, critical data needed and in fact required in today’s healthcare world. Information is essential for the patient, caregiver, and administrator. The MOD® and its system answer what they need to know. Avancen is not in a competitive race with other similar products. We have created several unique devices with supportive IT. 
We know we can achieve significant profits by 2017, and our potential revenues can exceed $1 Billion in the U.S. and greater than $3 billion in the global healthcare market.

PIPR_Description:
Why You Need an Early Warning System ?

Current regulations on train and truck transport for hazardous materials are good and getting better. Hazardous response by fire departments is relatively fast. Truck and train companies are spending billions of dollars trying to make you safe. 

Why then aren’t you safe?

Let’s follow the process of a Hazardous Chemical leak in transport. First a small leak starts. Now your leak is getting worse and someone noticed and has called the fire department. You have a full blown problem on your hands. 

Can this kind of safety problem be stopped? No! 

Truck and Train accidents have release millions of gallons of hazardous chemicals and petroleum products into the environment, jeopardize the health of the public and first responders.  Cost for clean-up, loss of loads and lawsuits that arise are now in the $100’s of million dollars.

Our design uses the concept of The Internet of Things (IoT) and Nano Technology. This idea connects people and things on a scale that once was unimaginable. It is predicted that 10 trillion sensors will be sold annually over the next 10 years to enable autonomous sensing, control, and data analysis across countless industries. 

We have completed the initial design phase are working on prototypes of each device. We have been in contact with American Association of Railroads (AAR) and the Federal Railroad Administration to ensure the product matches the customer need.

We are seeking seed investment capital for prototypes, testing, the railroads test every product that goes on a train and tanker.  Certification and the completion of the integrated software is the goal with of delivery of units starting in the third quarter of 2016.

Outer Worth simplifies retirement investing for the growing 1099 economy by finding your perfect match. After creating a simple investor profile, Outer Worth's algorithm will analyze thousands of possible suitors so that you don't have to. I.e if you prefer to invest locally, or only in socially-responsible companies, but don't have a lot saved up to start with, just add that to your profile and we'll find you a select number of quality matches. This data-driven merit-based matchmaking gives lesser-known funds a chance, and most importantly provides better options for the freelance investor who will never own a 401(k). As an unbiased matchmaker, Outer Worth is able to create authentic relationships with a growing community of loyal users, and eventually be able to create better funds to match the demands of our users. Launching April 2016.

The primary strategy is to acquire, add value, and reposition mobile home parks that are currently generating income yet are under-valued, under-managed, under-performing, and/or improperly capitalized. Our goal is for each tenant to own their home, while the Fund owns and maintains the underlying land and infrastructure such as roads, utilities, and amenitites (if any). This special owner-tenant relationship, and the fact that mobile homes aren't actually very mobile (due to the high cost and risk to move a home), leads to tenant longevity and other unique investment advantages over many other asset classes.  There is a huge and growing demand for affordable housing, yet traditional site-built homes and apartments can't meet the need. At the same time, there is a limited supply of new mobile home parks and a high barrier-to-entry for new mobile home park development.
Purpose: MHPI V, LLC was formed to acquire mobile home parks throughout the U.S. The company will indirectly invest through Affordable Housing Community Fund 6, LLC (AHCF 6) in a portfolio of assets consisting of sixty mobile home parks as well as other assets.  The company may also invest in other assets, including but not limited to real estate assets or securities, in which case the company's primary strategy will be to acquire, add value to, and reposition under-valued, under-managed, under-performing, improperly capitalized, income-generating properties in the United States. Target communities will be primarily either in larger markets or smaller growth markets with diversified employment, with spaces that are medium sized and larger and with homes in average to good condition. The purchase price for such parks is expected to be in the Two Hundred Thousand Dollar ($200,000) to Three Million Five Hundred Thousand Dollar ($3,500,000) range.

Renovation needed for the underlying property totals $900,000. This includes replacing appliances, electrical, plumbing, exterior maintenance, and general repair maintenance on 93 of the units. This also includes general maintenance of common areas such as parking lots and stairs. The borrower will receive 4 draw(s) totaling $3,650,000 over the course of the loan.The initial draw in the amount of $3,050,000 is disbursed at closing to pay down the existing debt, pay for closing costs, and complete renovations on the first 25 units. The second draw of $300,000 will be disbursed after the verified completion of a minimum of 25 units. The third draw of $250,000 will be disbursed after the verified completion of a minimum of 30 units. The fourth draw of $50,000 will be disbursed after the verified completion of all units completely renovated and verified by a third party vendor. $79,083 (approx. 2 months) in interest reserves will be held by Patch of Land. The borrower plans to refinance in less than one year.   	This offering represents $1,000,000 of the $3,650,000 loan. Patch of Land is holding the majority position of this loan. We are opening $1,000,000 to our investors.   	2459 Ketchum Rd   	As-Is Value: $3,590,000 	Renovation: $900,000 	After-Rehab Value: $5,030,000   	An independent third party appraisal commissioned by Patch of Land, shows an After Repair Value (ARV) of $1,377,410 for 2459 Ketchum Rd. The ARV ratio is 72.6% and is in line with the data we found during our due diligence process. Our research shows the residential market surrounding the underlying property in this area of Memphis is stable and supply and demand are in balance.   	In addition, Patch of Land hired an independent Underwriter to evaluate this property. The Underwriter gave a valuation of $7,000,000 valuation based on the forward NOI of year 3. Please see attached summary from the Underwriter.
Property_Title: Title to Cora Properties LLC with Patch of Land holding lien position.

PIPR_Description: MateDetector.com, Inc. is the world's first subscription based social media company that utilizes proprietary wearable technology to connect people with similar interests who are looking for a casual relationship, a serious relationship, and/or looking to meet new friends. Once the MateDetector (wearable device) is programmed with the subscriber's preferences and interests, it will alert them when they are within 50 feet of their perfect mate…anywhere they go!

PIPR_Name: Yonkers 5 Unit Purchase and Rehab - Phase I
PIPR_Description: This is a prefunded opportunity for a Multi-Family Residential property in New York. The subject property address is 97 Waverly St, Yonkers, New York.   	The developer is requesting a loan of $360,000 in order to purchase and renovate the underlying property. The property was purchased for a total of $390,000 in October of 2015. There is minor renovation needed for the underlying property, totaling $75,000. The borrower will receive 5 draw(s) totaling $360,000 over the course of the loan. The initial draw in the amount of $285,000 occurs at closing. The second draw of $15,000 will be disbursed as an initial deposit for the contractor. The third draw of $25,000 will be disbursed once the 3rd and 4th floors are completed. The fourth draw of $25,000 will be disbursed when the 1st and 2nd floors are completed. The fifth draw of $10,000 will be disbursed when the property is completed. The borrower plans to refinance in one year or under.   	The initial investment needed for this property is in the amount of $285,000 to purchase the property. The combined renovation draws for this project will be raised at a later time as they are requested.   	97 Waverly St.   	Purchase Price: $390,000 	Renovation: $75,000 	After-Rehab Value: $600,000   	An independent third party appraisal commissioned by Patch of Land, shows an After Repair Value (ARV) of $600,000 for 97 Waverly St. The ARV ratio is 60% and is in line with the data we found during our due diligence process. Our research shows the residential market surrounding the underlying property in this area of Yonkers is stable and supply and demand are in balance.
Property_Title: Title to 97 Waverly Realty Partners with Patch of Land holding lien position.

PIPR_Description:
VINCENT PAUL GROUP, INC. - is a Texas based Multi-Media Corporation with interests in publishing, among other interests! The Vincent Paul Publishing, is the Publishing Imprint of Vincent Paul Group, Inc. & is the Publisher of Persistence Works Series/ VPP Books (Books Written & Published by Dr. Vincent N. Paul - Prolific Author, Publisher & Entrepreneur).  With 18 Books published & available in Print (Online & in most Bookstores), as E-Books (on Amazon Kindle, Apple iBook & B&N Nook) & as Audio Books (on Audible, Amazon & iTunes). The Books have generated some media Interviews & a 30 Seconds Spot that's been promoted/ aired on Fox News Channel, Daystar TV Network & CBN Turning Point Show, among others. To watch these TV Interviews or the 30 Seconds Spot, see below or visit: www.persistenceworks.com

The Company seeks to raise funding to market & promote these titles across various platforms with a goal of generating millions of sales (both in the Print, EBook & Audio Book versions) & to become  both national & International Best-Sellers ! We invite you to join with us, invest in our Company and help launch the next multi-million best-selling titles - Persistence Works Book Series! 

Few books in the history of the publishing industry became Best-Sellers & Publishing phenomenon. Among those in recent times are: *The Purpose Driven Life, by Rick Warren which sold over 20.5 million copies in two years; *The Da Vinci Code, by Dan Brown, which sold 25 million copies within 2 years; *The Left Behind Series, by Tim Lahaye & Jerry B. Jenkins, sold over 60 million copies over a period of about 7 years; & *The Harry Potter Series, by J. K. Rowling, sold about 250 million copies over a 7-year period.
 
We believe that our Persistence Works Book Series will soon join these league of publishing phenomenon Books/ Authors, as we anticipate sales of millions of copies of our books within the next few years. And this funding would set us on that path of accomplishing this goal!

The borrower has been in real estate since 2003.  Since then the borrower has bought, sold and brokered over 1,000 apartment units and $50,000,000 in real estate.  From 2003 to 2011, the borrower's time was spent on the acquisition side of apartments and analyzing multi-family property throughout the US.  Now the borrower focuses on buying and holding apartment units.  The borrower currently owns and manages over 415 units.
Property_Title: Title to Cora Properties LLC with Patch of Land holding lien position.

PIPR_Description: Hood Hop’s purpose is to enrich the lives of communities by bringing them together through transportation in a social, upscale, creative and affordable way.HoodHop's Mission is to provide a unique transportation service to designated cities and their brightly colored communities full of sub-communities and neighborhoods. Hood Hop will maximize the consumers social- community experience by making each neighborhood within cities accessible and more importantly a 10-15 minute fun filled ride away at a great value.   	Hood Hop is an exclusive transportation service company, initially serving San Francisco and it's widely spread and diverse neighborhoods. The company has been formed as a California Corporation with Paige Johnson as the Sole Owner. Hood Hop will be run by a fleet of Buses that serve San Francisco and it's unique neighborhoods. With pick-up and drop-off stops in various neighborhoods and districts, members will ride the bus lines to neighborhood-“hop” San Francisco and it's amazing offerings.   	As a young girl living in San Francisco, Johnson has always noticed something missing within the community, the ways in which she was circulating and approaching her city and the methods in which are available for consumers to do so. San Francisco is booming with diverse neighborhoods, all offering a unique experience but not easily accessed at an affordable cost or interactive and worth while way of access. Johnson’s vision is to create a bridge between transportation and community engagement with Hood Hop.   	Tourists and travelers will also reap the benefits of Hood Hops service, being able to explore much more of the city than a Taxi or Uber and their high prices and demands will permit. Tourists will also feel a strong sense of each community when riding along the bus lines and will be able to soak up some of the rich culture in just one night. Hotels and Hostels within each city advertise promotions with Hood Hop for visitors to enjoy a weekend pass membership at a discounted rate while traveling. Members will benefit from the low monthly cost of Hood Hop, although guests are welcome as well for a one time low fee, and referrals will gain rewards when bringing guests along. Hood Hop Members will not only benefit from the affordable cost but also feel an immense positive change in the way they approach their own city and are able to interact with the community and network with like minded individuals.

PIPR_Description: This is a prefunded opportunity for a Single Family Residential property in New York. The subject property address is 1591 Church Street, Holbrook, New York. There is major renovation needed for the underlying property, totaling $85,000. The borrower will receive 5 draw(s) totaling $195,000 over the course of the loan. The initial draw in the amount of $110,000 occurs when the loan closes. The second draw of $38,999 will be disbursed once the first phase of renovation is complete. The third draw of $19,666 will be disbursed once the second phase of renovation is complete. The fourth draw of $12,666 will be disbursed once the third phase of renovation is complete. The fifth draw of $13,669 will be disbursed when the final phase of renovation is complete. The borrower plans to sell in one year or under.   	The initial investment needed for this property is in the amount of $110,000 to purchase the property. The combined renovation draws for this project will be raised at a later time as they are requested.   	1591 Church Street   	Purchase Price: $160,000 	Renovation: $85,000 	After-Rehab Value: $340,000   	An independent third party appraisal commissioned by Patch of Land, shows an After Repair Value (ARV) of $340,000 for 1591 Church Street. The ARV ratio is 57.3% and is in line with the data we found during our due diligence process. Our research shows the residential market surrounding the underlying property in this area of Holbrook is stable with supply and demand in balance.
